title: Not bad could do a lot better
review: Stayed for a week in October with friend. Requested a room on high floor which we got. Room spacious with lovely bed , as previously mentioned very little space for toiletries in bathroom, same for clothes and underwear in main room.  Food was good on the whole, with a good choice of different courses. Hotel clean and staff always working very hard. Could do with a other bar , only one they had was a beach bar , which really not suitable for Evening drinks. Hotel is close to beach and shops. At the time we stayed there were very noisy guests !! And caused distress to those nearby. In fact credit to the hotel they were asked to leave , which they did. Be careful when booking your room , go for one overlooking mountains and not bar and swimming pool area. Nearby are all night bars and I was told rave parties on a spare piece of land nearby the hotel. On a Friday and Saturday night. Would not stay here again , I expect more of a adult only , all inclusive  hotel. …

title: Excellent hotel, wonderful holiday
review: Just back from a week at the Alua Soul with my partner and his mother and we all had a wonderful time.  Hotel is about 30 mins from Palma airport by private transfer (definitely recommended).  Greeted with a glass of cava before heading to our rooms.  The rooms are lovely, the bed is huge and sooo comfy!  The air con in the room wasn't amazing but was good enough for us but think it would struggle to be cool enough if it gets any hotter.   We were al inclusive and extremely impressed with all the meals we ate at the hotel, never had a problem finding a table and the food was always being replenished and hot, with fish and meet cooked infant of you - delicious.  The staff in the main restaurant were always chatty and friendly.  First time in a very long time I've stayed at a hotel in peak season when we've not had to rush to get a bed, intact you could come down at lunchtime and still get a bed with an umbrella - unheard of.    The entertainment team, Alberto and Gian Luca, were just lovely, organising things for everyone all day and evening long.  I would say the evening entertainment wasn't my cup of tea but I think I was one of the minority as it was always busy.    Drinks were great in all inclusive, note that you can only have spirits from the bottom shelf but also we weren't aware until half way through the holiday that they had premium brands such as smirnoff and bacardi under the counter that were also available so if youre not offered these, go ahead and ask.    I would definitely stay again and would certainly recommend.…

title: Average 4 star hotel
review: Hi Clare,  thank you for choosing us and for the time taken sharing your opinion. It seems you have enjoyed your experience at Alua Hotels to the fullest! We're happy you have had a great time and an enjoyable stay here. Indeed, our food service includes everything anyone needs. Alberto and Gian Luca would love to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing Week
review: We stayed here as a couple from 5th October for 7 nights on a half board basis. The weather was warm and sunny for the majority of 7 days. This adults only hotel is conveniently located in the busy Alcúdia resort, 5 mins walk from the beautiful beach, the shops are even nearer and the Old Town is within 25 mins walking distance. The hotel was very clean and well maintained. Staff in all areas of the hotel were very friendly.  We were checked in efficiently and courteously by the lovely Kylie. Our room was on floor 4 with an inland  and pool view. It was warm and sunny in the afternoon.  The room we had was of an adequate size. It was as you would expect for the refurbished rooms in hotel chains these days. Minimalistic furniture, white plastic.... Lovely lighting, good air conditioning, sufficient sockets.  There was very little area in the refurbished bathroom to store my toiletries and cosmetics. The rain shower was very powerful and there were several incidents of flooding due to the short length shower screen. There was a magnifying mirror and a hair dryer too. There was no replenishment of toiletries.  The main bedroom had beautiful comfy beds, a big, wall hung, flat screen tv, tea and coffee making facilities. I tried to use the coffee making machine but there were no instructions so I packed it away. There was a bedside digital alarm clock with huge numbers. The light was so bright from it that we had to cover it up at bedtime! There was only one closed drawer within the wardrobe unit, very inadequate. I like to keep my undergarments and certain other things private. I had to share with my husband. There were no doors to the wardrobe which contained the cooler and a very easy to use safe which was chargeable. The air conditioning was very efficient.  The balcony was adequate, 2 chairs and a low table with a drying rack. I had emailed the hotel to ascertain whether men needed to wear long trousers for dinner. I was advised that this was the rule. We packed evening wear according to this rule and was very surprised to see other guests wearing, shorts, cut off denim shorts, you name it... The restaurant was more like a canteen to be honest. I felt very over dressed at times. Some of the food was poorly cooked and some items of poor quality. For the first 3 days the 4 breakfast cereal dispensers provided  a choice of 2 containing chocolate bite size shredded wheat, one had chocolate Rice Krispies the other plain Rice Krispies. I have stayed in many 4 star Spanish hotels and the choice was poor. There were no dried fruit or nuts, no cava at breakfast. The variety of breads improved as the week went on. The pool was supervised, clean and cool but it was lovely to swim in. We made use of the pool towels for which you need to pay a deposit at reception. Our room was situated directly above the area which was used for the evening entertainment. It was extremely loud and apart from a couple of singers not to our taste. In all the hotels I have stayed in, I have never stayed in one without an indoor bar, very casual for a four star hotel.  The menu for the a la carte restaurant was the same for the 7 nights we stayed, I’m not a big meat eater, didn’t fancy the choices and we gave it a miss.  All in all we had a lovely holiday. The staff who never seem to have time off are a credit to the hotel. My view is that costs are being kept to a minimum which reflects in the lack of little luxuries you would expect to find in an adults only four star hotel.…

title: Majorca holiday
review: Enjoyed a week at this adults only hotel.  Spacious room with exceptionally large comfortable bed.  The room was kept spotlessly clean by the hardworking cleaners.  A bottle of water was put in the room each day which was appreciated.  Nice to have a safe (free of charge) and fridge plus English channels on the tv.  We found the staff friendly, especially in the restaurant.  Enjoyed the food and drink on the AI. We came for a relaxing week in the sun and that's what we got.  Hope to visit again in the future.

title: Nice hotel, good location
review: 5mins to Alcudia’s beautiful beach. 10mins to town. 15 to the harbour. 2mins to the bar / club complex above and around Burger King.  Nicely styled room and bathroom, very good mattress, TV with English channels, safe, fridge, balcony, good shower. Questionable WiFi.   Big outdoor pool area. Music pretty woeful and perhaps an over-dominance of space of cafe style tables and seats. Activities not my thing on a holiday but others seemed to appreciate them.  4 beds per umbrella arrangement is odd and hard to get collective agreement on.   Food and drink - definitely cutting corners. No full range of cereal for three days. No fresh juice any day. Meat largely like boot leather. Tasteless desserts. Ice cream runs out. Beer like a teenage homebrew project gone wrong.  You can tell…

title: Overall Good hotel
review: Hello sterei,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the stay and that you liked the hotel, its location and its facilities. We are sorry if the food has not been to your liking, the truth is that we work to offer quality and varied food to everyone's taste. We will also consider your comments to continue improving.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Hotel, Beautiful location and fantastic staff!
review: Me & my partner went here just for 5 nights stay October 2019, weather was bad so didn’t do much. Friendly staff, clean and pleasant hotel. We thought the hotel would be bigger and had more of a choice in food. The pool was super freezing only went in there twice during the stay. Nice walk down the beach 20 - 25 minutes walk . Went on our first night due to the rain coming in, but the beach beds you will have to pay for. Getting onto the coach to the hotel was a nightmare we was waiting for in coming flights just under an hour for other people to get on the coach. The coach journey was supposed to be 40 minutes it took way over 2 hours , went from one end from the island to the other . All in all it was an okay stay hotel was nice, but the transfer and food was average.

title: Lovely half term get away
review: Hello Chloe J,  Thank you for the review and for having spent the holidays staying at our hotel. We are glad to know that you have had a pleasant stay and that you liked the hotel and its facilities. We are sorry if the transfer was not as expected and if the food has not been to your liking. The truth is that we work to offer quality and varied food to everyone's taste.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing break
review: Stayed in Aula Soul Alcudia Bay beginning of October with my partner and we had such a lovely time. The hotel is in tip-top condition, always clean and very welcoming. Receptionists were lovely and checked us in with a flute of champagne, which we have never had on arrival before. Room is nice, massive bed which was very comfy and we had a pool view from our belcony, which is nice if you want to watch the entertainment in the evening from the comfort of your room. There was activities held during the day such as rifle shooting, French bowels and  make your own cocktails + more, evening entertainment consisted of quiz's,Bingo, live music and karaoke. Alucida Bay is in a prime location, beach is only a 10-15 minute walk away and there a lots of shops and resturants near by, plus…

title: Ladies Holiday in the sun
review: This Hotel and location ticks all our boxes and we had a fabulous 3 nights.  The rooms were lovely, evening entertainment was really good.  The staff were always friendly and helpful and the food was exceptional.

review: Hello lesley m,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: not 4*
review: The hotel is beautiful the room is outstanding the staff very helpful  while we were queuing they gave us a class of prosecco nice touch the hotel is 5 minuets walk from the beach  and 12 minutes walk from the port del Alcudia very close to shops

title: Lovely hotel
review: Hello eamonc537,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. title: enjoyed it
review: I e mailed the hotel a week before we arrived requesting a high floor if possible and received a reply saying they could not guarantee but would see what they could do. This was the penultimate weeek before closing, and the hotel was maybe half full if that. We were given a room on the 3rd floor.    It was 9 pm and i think the gentleman on reception was ready to go home. I asked aboout a room on the top floor and was given the answer we have no twin bedded rooms onthe 5th floor. ?  and just could not be bothered.   Rooms were fine a bit clinical but had everything we needed. We have had much better food in other 4* hotels, but one morning in the restaurant at 9.30 bearing in mind the restaurant closes at 10.30 we were eating and were asked to move to another table as ours needed…

title: Superb!!
review: Spent a week in Alua Soul at the beginning of October and no complaints! On arrival we were given a warm welcome from Kylie and offered a glass of cava - a nice touch. We had requested a room on a higher floor and got just that - another plus.The room overlooked the pool and was spacious and very comfortable.There were tea and coffee facilities and plenty sockets.Toiletries were also provided. Food was served in the restaurant buffet style and there was always plenty choice. We were AI and wine, soft drinks, beer and water were all available to help yourself.What a good idea!  Entertainment in the hotel was varied and probably the best we've experienced.We often travelled down memory lane listening to the different artists. The hotel is in a great location with shops and…

title: Break following cruise
review: Hello msls17,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you recommending our hotel. title: Beautiful hotel
review: Loved the adults only hotel. Spotlessly clean good variety of food, entertainment was just that, entertainment team very friendly. Loved the  Sangria & Paella  making & tasting sessions. Free bingo for a bottle of wine before main entertainment was a giggle.

title: Brilliant Hotel
review: Hello suzysueindevon,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. title: Well placed Hotel
review: Lovely place 5 minute walk to beach  food beautiful Service excellent  Friendly staff  They gave us a glass of prosecco  while waiting at reception nice touch  Would recommend this hotel to all I will definitely go back to this hotel

title: Excellent hotel
review: Just spent a week in this hotel and found it very clean very friendly helpful staff. Good variety of food with show cooking. Evening entertainment good with professional acts and tribute singers also movie and music quizz and bingo. The entertainment staff were excellent Alberto and Gian Luca where very friendly and very god explaining the day time games  rifle shooting archery boules etc Alberto was very funny and entertaining really enjoyed are stay and would go back

title: Good hotel, close to beautiful beach
review: Hello Savvybtraveller,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed the stay and that you liked the hotel, its location, the facilities, the food offered and the friendly treatment received by our staff (especially our entertainment team Alberto and Gian Luca, who have made you have fun during the holidays). title: Graham
review: Transfer time was 40 mins from airport.  Check-in was quite slow, however staff very welcoming and friendly and we were offered a glass of cava on arrival.  We were offered the opportunity to transfer to their sister hotel in Aluasoul Mallorca Cala D'or with an upgrade to a sea view - an offer which we did not take up.  The hotel was modern and on the whole clean, although the floor of our room felt quite dirty to the extent that we couldn't walk on it with bare feet.  There was a safe and fridge in the room which could be used with no extra charge.  There was very little in the way of storage space with no drawers to put away clothes.  Air-conditioning was quite variable and it often got unbearably hot in the room overnight even on maximum.    The hotel was smaller than similar…

title: Brilliant Holiday
review: Hello Ryry30,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. title: Good, bad and ugly
review: Perfectly placed hotel for local beach ( 5 min to the beach 10 min to town centre) but far enough away to avoid the noise. Room was clean and well presented as was the rest of the hotel, restaurant was welcoming and the food on the whole very good a well laid out selection. The staff really made the holiday, friendly, helpful, funny with daytime and evenings entertainment which you can take part in or just watch from around the pool  All in all Alcúdia is a great place to visit and the holiday has left us with some found memories

title: Let down by food
review: My partner and I have just returned from a three night stay at the hotel as part of our cruise and stay. We arrived at the hotel via the airport transfer bus provided by TUI which dropped off less than 10 couples. Check in seemed to take a very long time per couple but staff were friendly and efficient.  We went to our room (225) which was very bright and airy with a huge comfy bed. There was however a very odd smell which I couldn't quite put my finger on but it transpired when we opened the bathroom door the next morning the wood had become wet and was rotting (see pics) due to a very low lip on the shower tray.  The hotel caters for an international audience mainly more mature adults (a few young couples were seen) so the entertainment at the hotel includes a mix of…

title: Good clean hotel.. But ?!!!?
review: Hello gilescorenwannabe,  Thank you for the review and for having spent the holidays staying at our hotel.  First of all, we regret if the food has not been to your liking, from the hotel we work to offer quality and varied food to everyone's taste. We will consider your recommendations to make changes and keep improving.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing Break
review: Stayed at this hotel in September with my husband & 16 yr old son & sister in law & partner.. This hotel is spotless clean & rooms are modern... Check in was quick, only because I jumped off the bus & got in there first (heard from previous reviews).. we all had a glass of carva  on arrival.. Firstly the bar staff are amazing.. friendly & work so hard.. a lot of the time with rude holiday makers 👍..  the entertainment team are amazing.. not pushy at all ( like other reviews).. very friendly.. there a credit to this hotel.. The food... was not to our taste at all.. We ate out most of the week.. The other 4 star hotels we’ve been to was nothing like this..  There was one grumpy young lady in the restaurant who basically threw a knife & fork at my son as we were 20 mins before…

We will take into account your recommendations on including more entertainment or music to keep improving and offer the best service.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Plastic glasses
review: Have just returned from a short break and what a lovely relaxing holiday we had. We booked through TUI and chose this hotel due to the good reviews. We are two old school friends celebrating our 50th birthdays looking for an adults only hotel with a pool, a spa and near the beach and this ticked all the boxes! It didn't disappoint. The reception staff were very welcoming on arrival with a lovely glass of cava whilst we were checking in. We were given a keyless wristband which was fab not having to worry about carrying/remembering a key. We had a twin room which was very clean and bright and we had a balcony overlooking the pool...really lovely.  The pool area was also very clean and we noticed the staff work amazingly well to maintain the cleanliness. There were plenty of…

title: Love Alcudia
review: Alcudia is great location and made our holiday amazing so definetly recommend  this destination.Hotel itself was very clean and staff very polite and helpful.I would especialy thank Kathy from reception, extraordinary lady who dealed with one of our issue in  very professional way.From negative point of view please note that surrounding  of hotel especially  on weekend is noisy at night which disturbed our sleep.It can let your holiday down if you are like us and go to bed early because you rather enjoy early walking on beach and sunrises.

title: Excellnet servie in every respect
review: Hello radot230,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. title: Stay here it's good
review: We had a week here with a TUI booking. The location was good for us - we wanted to walk a bit and also to explore local towns and take the bus to Palma for a day. Buffet meals were great and the 4Euro/day deal for drinks with evening meal well worth it. Bus to Palma just up at the main road about 5 mins walk. We walked into Aludia but again you can take the bus.

title: Its Not Good
review: Hello PositivelyBrum,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. title: Relaxing Break
review: Good clean modern hotel with polite staff. Room was well maintaned and Beds were comfy. Good air con. We had buffet breakfast which appealed  to all tastes and was in a nice restaraunt   . 10 minutes walk to beach. Less than 5 mins to bus stops. 15 minutes walk to main port area. Only very minor annoyance was having a non smoking room where people in next room could still constantly share their cigarettes with you everytime  you tried to enjoy your balcony. Even so I would deffinately stay here again  as I felt it was good value.

title: Emily and George
review: AluaSoul was perfect for a couples holiday, clean rooms, great pool area and really good food!! And to top it off the staff were amazing and kind. We look forward to seeing Alberto and Gian Luca again next year, they were great to be around and lovely guys!

title: Alua Soul Alcudia
review: Hotel very clean, buffet food was always fresh with a good choice, formal restaurant a massive disappointment, food was bang average. Entertainment staff were great, bar staff very friendly and reception also helpful. Any issues were dealt with promptly.

title: Could do better
review: The hotel was exceptionally clean, comfortable and relaxing! The jacuzzi, sauna and steam room were excellent and the food was superb. The staff were superbly professional and attentative, and our whole experience was brilliant! Thank you so much

title: Late summer break
review: Greatly enjoyed our stay. Room, public areas and pool all as expected. Good location. Near beach. Food varied and tasty. Enjoyed the 4 euros a day option for dinner drinks. Enjoyed entertainment. No complaints. Loved the two little cats we saw at pool. Please take care of them.

title: Decent hotel
review: On day one of our visit was amazed that processed mashed pototo (smash) was being served in a 4star hotel. Hope things improve further into my stay, as food really not good at all on first night, comparing this to a Protur Plus hotel we stayed at earlier in the year, this is not anywhere close to being in the same league.

title: FANTASTIC HOLIDAY
review: Hello Eastleigh767,  We regret if the first day the food has not been to your liking, although we must say that it is one of the things best valued by our customers, since we work to offer quality and varied food to everyone's taste. We hope you have been able to check and taste other dishes and have enjoyed.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Aluasoul Alcudia Hotel, Puerto de Alcudia, Mallorca
review: Stayed for a week with my wife, its 40mins via private transfer from airport.  Arrived around 10.30am in morning, given welcome glass of cava and surprised to find room available...bonus! Room was clean, decent size although we had twin beds pushed together which wasn't ideal; saw cleaning staff most days and they were very friendly. Food is ok, its buffet style and staple items stay pretty much the same with changes to meat, fish dishes etc. Staff were ok in restaurant, some very efficient and friendly, others not so much and just stood round chatting. We had upgrade to meal in a la carte restaurant and this was fantastic, the level of food quality and service was much improved, special mention to our waiter Tony who was great. Pool area is very good, loads of places to sit and…

title: Great stay
review: Really enjoyed our stay. Fantastic hotel with great facilities and the food was of a very high standard. Pool area clean and not the usual silly sun bed fuss. Room was fantastic very clean and spacious.

title: Amazing food, staff and hotel.
review: Hello Marshy161,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: No Kids Holiday

The evening entertainment is really fun and the food is super tasty and variated every day. It has been a wonderful stay, thank you 😌

title: Relaxing peaceful holliday
review: Just returned from this all inclusive hotel in fantastic resort.  Good things - lovely quiet room immaculately cleaned and restocked every day..  Varied food of reasonable quality and choice considering the number of nationalities stopping there.  Nice pool area, a bit cold for me but well used and lots of beds.  Brilliant Tui rep Wesley, most helpful, goid luck with your cruise job and Entertainment Team, particularly Alberto. Large flat screen TV in room got BBC and ITV!   10 minute walk to amazing beach 13 euros for beds and umbrella which we had for 4 days.  Great bus service used daily by us 3 euros 70 to Alcudia Old Town.  Lots of mouchy shops in Alcudia, Puerto Pollensa and Alcudia Old Town.   Bad things about hotel were slow check in, not Simon's fault, he was on his own…

title: 2nd Visit - Will Be Back Again
review: This was our 2nd visit to the Alua Soul Alcuida Bay and it didn't disappoint.  As before a lovely greeting on our arrival from reception with a glass of Cava.  Our room was next to the elevators but we didn't hear a thing and we had a lovely view of the mountains in the distance.  We were also presented with a bottle of Cava to welcome us back which was a lovely gesture.  Congratulations to the cleaning staff who worked hard keeping the hotel and our room beautifully clean.  The food was very good and there was always plenty of choice.  The entertainment staff, Alberto and Gian Luca, what a pair we didn't stop laughing when they were around. I found myself trying new activities (some Iv'e always wanted to try but never had the nerve before) there instructions and patience was…

title: comfortable hotel
review: Hello Mr_and_Mrs_GoLightly,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays for the second time staying at our hotel. We are glad to know that you have continued enjoying the hotel, the food offered and that you value so positively the kind treatment received from our staff (especially the activities organized by our entertainment team Alberto and Gian Luca).  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: An Unforgettable Holiday
review: we stayed for a week,hotel staff are all nice entertainment do there best and try to involve as much people they can,our room was on the end  of hotel so noise was not an issue,large L shaped room with sofa ,food was fine enough choice for most.the beds are  large and comfortable,we choose this hotel as adults only,maybe should have looked for couples only as the hotel does cater for groups of men who were a bit  loud plenty sunbeds,more choice for cocktails is needed

title: A good break, hassle free
review: Hello hazzyblu,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the holidays and that you had fun with the activities and entertainment organized daily. Just as you have relaxed in the room.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Noisy in the evening because of hotel entertainment
review: Definitely would recommend this hotel if you are looking for a relaxing break.  Getting a sunbed was never a problem, the staff are very friendly and the hotel clean and well run.  Plenty of activities if you want to get involved.  Had a go at archery, pistol shooting, French bowls, table tennis, darts, Sjoelbak.  Gian Luca and Alberto are a credit to the hotel and made our holiday entertaining.  Enjoyed demonstrations, especially cocktail making, Sangria and Paella.   A special thank you to Alberto who kept us entertained throughout the holiday with his enthusiasm and endless energy.

title: An enjoyable stay
review: The hotel is a little out of the centre on a quiet street, just what we were hoping for. It was an easy 10/15 min walk into the centre with some shops and bars along the way. It was also handy for the bus to Puerto Pollensa and the port area of Alcudia- great if it is too hot to walk. Te staff at the hotel were all friendly and willing to help. The food is good, buffet style with lots of variety. Entertainment during the day was lovely- take care at the sangria tasting- it is quite strong especially at 11am after a good night the night before! The room was lovely and spacious with the biggest bed I have ever seen! The room was cleaned each day and towels changed as we wanted.Pool towels are available for a 20 euro deposit and can be changed if needed. We didn't stay around for…

title: End of cruise.
review: Hello teacherBlackburn,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed and relaxed at the hotel. As well as that you liked its location next to the beach and near restaurants and shops, the varied food offered and that you value so positively the kind treatment received from our staff. We regret if the bleeding has seemed something strong, we will take it into account.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Not in the same league
review: Booked in for 3 days at the end of a Marella cruise. The hotel reception is very impressive as are the rooms. A very nicely laid out buffet restaurant with plenty of choice and a tasty grill option.  A really good entertainment bloke Alberto,helped the evenings pass by.  The only real down side of this hotel was the all inc drink on offer. After a week on the boat the standard was very low and I’m sure the beer was watered down.  Shame as overall it’s a very nice hotel.

title: Fantastic holiday to be had.
review: Hello C3270MUphilipm,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, the food offered and the entertainment organized daily (especially the animation guided by Alberto). We are sorry if the drink has not been to your liking, we will consider your comment to continue improving and we must say that the beer is not served watered down and we try to offer a quality beer.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Only downside to this lovely hotel is the music played around the pool is too loud.
review: Just spent 4 days at this hotel after our cruise. Was disappointed with the location and also lack of amenities. Not much to do but sunbathe which was ok until the day we had wind, heavy rain, thunder and lightning. Nothing to do but sit in our room as the only bar was open to the pool area. At least there were UK tv channels to watch. The food was good but lacked imagination, same style of buffet for lunch and dinner. Glad we only were there 4 days. After the quality of our cruise was surprised that Marbella/ Tui tied this hotel into their cruise/stay package. Not the same calibre at all

title: Beautiful hotel.. great location.. the staff are 10/10
review: Beautiful hotel quite modern..but with palm trees outside and plant pots and wood everywhere it really gives it a nice twist.. the location is amazing not only is the beach a 8min wall but there is a burgerking & Lidl just round the corner.. clubs also nearby but it will not disturb your sleep as long as your balcony door is closed.. the staff is 10/10.. not to mention the food.. uhhh I’m drooling <3

title: Bright clean hotel ..
review: Hello newbycarla,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, its location next to the beach and shops and that you value so positively the kind treatment received from our staff.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel, quiet and relaxing
review: A lovely hotel in a good location. bedrooms very bright and spotless . Allthe hotel is kept to a very high standard. Entertainment and food was very good, especially The mowtown tribute band. they were exceliant. The added bonus and the reason I stayed here was that it was adults only.. I would have no problem recommending this hotel .

title: I don't recommend
review: Hello corinnaorourke,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you recommending our hotel. We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, its location, the food offered and the entertainment organized daily (in particular the Mowtown show).  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: One night stay
review: Having read all of the reviews, some good some not so great, I felt the need to write my own review, detailing how we felt about everything, as openly and honestly as possible.  The hotel appearance is lovely, modern and relaxing. There never feels like there is a rush for anything, nor a que for food, drinks or a sunbed. The pool area is nicely laid out with plenty of space and what I would class as a pool bar. Looking at all the previous photos it looked like this was the only bar at the hotel, and this was indeed the case.   The evening entertainment program had a stage made up at the side with plenty of chairs outside, which is great if its sunny, however this did create quite a big problem when it wasn't. There is extremely limited seating around the bar and hotel itself if…

title: AluaSoul
review: The hotel is bright and modern - it looked really good, but the cleaning was not good and nor the wi-fi. We always found dust hair and other dirt even after the cleaning, the balcony floor felt like never cleaned and it was horrible to look under the bed..

title: Holiday
review: Hello dafinahisenii,  Thank you for the review and for having spent the holidays staying at our hotel. We are sorry if you had any complaint or incident regarding cleaning, we will review what happened, since from the hotel we review that the cleaning service is carried out in perfect condition so that everything is correct.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Mmmm
review: Had a great time at the Alusol. I traveled with my friend. The food was great as were the staff in the restaurant. The two guys doing the evening entertainment were absolutely brilliant. Bar staff friendly and chatty.  A la carte night was nice but unfortunately we were very rushed and were out in 50 minutes after eating 5 courses.   The beach is beautiful and could walk out into the sea with fish swimming around.  The pool was lovely.  Not much to do out and around the hotel but we were all inclusive so chose to stay at the hotel each evening and there was always entertainment, be that singers, quizzes and kareoke..  All in all a great holiday and I have booked with my boyfriend for next year xx

title: Holiday in August in Alua soul
review: Hello Dawn P,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate that you have already booked to return next year.  We are glad to know that you have had a great time, that you liked the hotel, its location next to the beach, the food offered, the entertainment organized at night and that you value so positively the kind treatment received from our staff.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Paradise at alua soul alcudia
review: Restaurant manager Toni excellent.  Food ???? All inclusive ??? Not enough choice for drinks or food.  Food tasteless.  Alberto tone it down. All staff very pleasant. Tui shame on you marrying this hotel up with cruise week.

title: Great hotel ,highly recommend.
review: Great hotel , highly recommend . Wonderful room service,very tasty food. REGARDDS HEARTILY. Comfortable rooms ,the option of swimming in the pool and a fantastic animator with whom the water was unforgettable.

title: Stay cruise
review: Hello  piotrnelka,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you recommending our hotel. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the hotel and that you liked the food offered, the rooms and the facilities. In addition to the positive assessment of the treatment received from our staff and entertainment team.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel but??
review: We have just stayed for a week and have thoroughly enjoyed it. The hotel is clean, the food is well presented and varied and it has a relaxed, laid back vibe. We found the animation team (especially Alberto) to be really nice, chatty, genuinely friendly and happy to help. I have to agree with an earlier reviewer regarding the breakfast omelette man, he was just plain rude!! This is such a shame as we found the rest of the dining team (especially Tony and David) really pleasant.

title: An excellent hotel at a high level
review: Hello clairebW9953JJ,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed and that you liked the hotel, the food offered and the activities and entertainment organized by the entertainment team. We appreciate the positive feedback made on the kind treatment received from the staff (especially Toni and David) and we are sorry if you had any problem with one of our employees during breakfast, we will review what happened.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good but not perfect
review: I find it a bit difficult to review this hotel due to its a really nice hotel with nice staff.  Here are my issues apart from breakfast the food is really poor for choice and taste. All inclusive drinks are also quite poor for choice. We have a pool view which means no early nights for us.  The music is Blaring beyond belief until 11.30.  So far entertainment 🙄🙄🙄 As for Tui I can't understand why they have married this hotel up with the cruise we came off OMG night and day.

title: Nothing special.... unfortunately
review: We were at Alua Soul for 2 weeks. During our stay we had several issues... 1. We chose an ADULT hotel for a reason. Unfortunately, the two entertainment guys were VERY pushy and came by every hour to inform that there were a new activity. It was just too much and they didn’t just go by and told us that there was an activity, they had to disturb us every time even though we were asleep or reading or doing something else. Once, one of the entertainment guys made fun of my boyfriend as he was asleep and suggested (for fun) that we should draw a mustache on him. That is seriously crossing the line! 2. The cook in the morning buffet, the GUY only, were SO unfriendly - it blew my mind. He was never there, so i had to wait 10-15 minuts before he came out, or i had to get someone else…

title: Fantastic Holiday in really nice hotel
review: Hello camillavrangstrup,  Thank you for the assessment and we are sorry if your experience has not been as good as you expected. Below we detail your opinion.  *Animation; We must say that our animation team never wants to annoy customers and although the joke seemed unfortunate, they did not do it with any evil if not to cheer you up or have a sense of humor. * Restaurant staff; We are sorry if you have suffered any discomfort or have been uncomfortable, but our staff strives to offer good service and of course a varied and quality meal. * Air conditioning and cleaning; if it did not work well, it should be timely, since it is always checked to make it work properly. Like the maintenance of the rooms.  We are sorry if something has not been to your liking and we have your opinion in mind to keep improving.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Superb Hotel, One of the best in Alcudia
review: Just returned from 14 nights at the Alua Soul and one of the best summer holidays ever. Mainly due to the staff , all of whom go out of there way to be friendly, pleasant and as helpful as possible. All staff were great but special  thanks to Entertainment Team ,Alberto and Jian Luca , and Tony Pons in the bar and restaurant and David in al la carte.  Food was really good throughout , don't miss the al la carte nights  Evening entertainment enjoyable with good mix of fun games and professional acts  Good location far enough away from main centre but with pleasant walks to beach and old town  Only slight complaint day time music often too loud and pitched at a younger audience. please consider more relaxing playlist or the odd day without music

title: Lovely holiday
review: Hello stivhols,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed the experience and that you liked the hotel, the food offered, the daily organized entertainment and the positive evaluation made on the kind treatment received from our staff (especially Alberto, Gian Luca , Toni and David). We regret if at any given time the music has bothered you, although the music is set at certain times and ends at specific times to respect the silence and rest of the customers.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Aluasoul hotel
review: Just got back from a week at Alua Soul, please ignore any bad reviews as this hotel is one of the best I have stayed in whilst on holiday. We arrived about 2pm local time to be greeted with a glass of cava and paid for our stay, we were upgraded to a superior room free of charge which was great as we wanted a double bed. The room was perfect, bed was really comfy and huge! Mini fridge and welcome water, dressing gown, slippers, air conditioning, english tv channels, safe, tea and coffee... everything you could ask for. The bathroom was nice also and our towels were changed daily. The cleaners were also very friendly and did a great job each day. The view from our balcony was spectacular looking into the mountains and some nice views of the surrounding area. The pool is beautiful…

title: Fantastic
review: Amazing friendly hotel. Fun energetic staff willing to help at any point, Entertainment staff are good fun and genuinely want to include you in all activities.  Food is varied and so much on offer and again the staff here are friendly and welcoming. The whole hotel is spotlessly clean. Would definitely return .

title: An amazing family vacation!
review: Hello sdymoke,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you want to come back. We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, the varied food offered, the activities and the organized entertainment. We also appreciate the positive feedback made on the kind treatment received from our staff.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: All inc booze a let down
review: I stayed at the hotel for 6 days with my family in August. We were all extremely happy with the overall experience. On arrival we were welcomed with champagne/ lemon water and got the keys to our rooms. The keys are in a chip on a bracelet, which we found extremely convenient as we were never stressed about taking the keys along. We had a breakfast and dinner package and didn't take the 4 euro/ person/ day deal for unlimited drinks, instead we purchased them at the restaurant. The rooms were beautiful, spacious and very clean. No complaints at all. The restaurant was also very beautiful and with a wide variety of food. Personally I am vegan, my family is not, yet all of us had plenty of choices. I loved that there was even soy milk in the morning for cereal. The staff was very…

title: Unforgettable experience
review: Hello  Diana B,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you want to come back.  We are glad to know that you liked the experience lived in the hotel, its facilities, the food offered (especially the theme nights) and that you value very positively the kind treatment received from the staff. The truth is that our team strives to offer quality service and make customers feel at home.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Best hotel!
review: The selection of drink in the all inc menu was very poor and the better stuff was mainly chargeable. The beer would be far better if not watered down so much. I had a pint of San Miguel in a nearby bar and it was totally different and not flat. And the hotel was full of dutchies who are fussy about beer!!

title: Fantastic
review: The hotel was beautiful. Very clean and the service and staff were excellent!!! All very helpful, positive and service minded. Good , fun activities everyday with fun guys to lead us. Show time acts we’re also of a high standard. All I all a place I would go back to !!

title: Well needed relaxing break!
review: Hello scase69,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you want to come back.  We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, the activities organized by our entertainment team and especially the shows organized during the nights. We also appreciate the positive feedback made on the kind treatment received from our staff.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great Adult break
review: I recently came to Alua soul with my partner on a 4 night stay. We loved this hotel! We work with children so it was refreshing to come to an adult only hotel and escape the kids for a while and just feel as though we were able to chill out.   The food was great, good variety and different things each evening. We opted only for a half board package as we tended to be out and about a bit however this was perfect for us. Only thing I would say about the half board package is that we then decided to take advantage of a drinks offer that they had offered us, as drinks with meals were not included in the half board offer (as far as we could tell). The staff promoted a €4 per night offer for unlimited drinks with dinner (between 6:30-9:00) which I think was good value, however these…

title: Great Time at Alua Soul
review: Hello Saucycam,  Thank you very much for the positive evaluation and for having spent the holidays in our hotel. We appreciate you recommending our hotel in such a special way.  We are glad to know that you have enjoyed the experience and that you have relaxed during the holidays. We also appreciate the positive feedback you make on all aspects of the hotel; food offered, room, facilities, location, activities and entertainment and especially the assessment you make of the good treatment received from our staff, which has helped you in everything you need. Do not doubt that we are delighted to attend you and know that you trust us to spend the holidays.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good hotel
review: This was a very friendly and happy hotel, staff were polite and happy to help. The restaurant was clean and smart but casual dress code ( no need for long trousers guys) food was great and the staff always welcomed you.  Rooms were a good size we had a pool view, free safe, small fridge, the cleaner left us a big bottle of water every morning so that was good. The entertainment was really good, the entertainment team from the hotel were always polite chatty and greeted you every morning telling you what the entertainment was for  the day,  professional singers and bands were hired in for evening entertainment which was great we had a 50's night a drifters night a rock night so something for everyone.  We will defiantly be back

title: Lovely relaxing holiday
review: We had a lovely relaxing holiday and is perfect for a week. The hotel had a variety of food and had different nights dedicated to different cultures, which was nice.  There are activities to do during the day, such as rifle shooting, wine tasting, pool fitness and other fun things. At night, there are activities such as bingo, karaoke, music quizzes and there’s always a show afterwards to watch. The staff were all friendly and couldn’t do enough for you.  My personal favourite staff members are the activity coordinators Juan Luca and Roberto. They made the holiday amazing and made sure everyone had opportunities all day. I didn’t see them stop.  Although the beach isn’t on the doorstep of the hotel, it is only a short walk to it and only 15-20 minute walk to get to the bay,…

title: AMAZING HOLIDAY! THANKS ALBERTO!
review: Hello georginashaw,  Thank you very much for the assessment and for having spent a relaxing holiday for a week at our hotel.  We are glad to know that you had fun with the activities organized both day and night by our entertainment team. As we appreciate the positive feedback on our staff, especially Juan Luca and Roberto. Our team strives to offer a quality service to our customers.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Alcudia Break
review: What a great holiday! This was my first time away in an adults only hotel with my partner and his family. The hotel was clean,modern and had a really fresh feeling about it. The reception staff were great and there to help with any request.especially Kathy.All rooms were cleaned everyday and were spotless. We went all inclusive, again this was a first for me and the food was beautiful. For all meals the was something for everyone! The evening booked entertainment was a little hit and miss as I feel like on first day the Dreamettes were brilliant so the bar was set too high and none of the other booked entertainment for the week were even nearly as good. Other than this I generally Couldn’t fault it at all. But what made the holiday extra special was a member of staff called…

title: Fresh hotel for adults with a lot of happenings
review: Hello JenCAshF,  Thank you very much for the evaluation and for having enjoyed the holidays in our hotel.  We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, its facilities, the cleanliness of the hotel and that the treatment received by the staff has been efficient and helpful. Especially the treatment received by Alberto.  We are also glad to know that you had fun with the activities organized daily by our entertainment team. We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great holiday, relaxing but also lots of laughs.
review: Lovely hotel but ruined by not having an area anywhere for non smokers to enjoy.  Even the smoke from the room next to us came into ours from our balcony.  We had really looked forward to our four days here, but very disappointed to find no area was assigned for non smokers, I have had cancer a few years ago and certainly did not intend on spending my annual hard earned holiday breathing in smoke.  We are not against smokers, if people want to smoke that is fine but should be in a designated area, we felt that we were being discriminated against by not having an area that we could enjoy smoke free.

title: Loved this hotel
review: Lovely, quiet and chilled hotel with plenty to do nearby, under 10 minute walk to the beach and bars and a club are even closer by, food was lovely, room was nice, on the last day we had a late flight and we were able to use the shower in the spa to freshen up which was good

title: Superb Holiday
review: Hello Emma B,  Thank you very much for the review and for choosing our hotel for the holidays.  We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, its facilities and that you found the food delicious. We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing
review: A perfect hotel for a relaxing holiday, adults only, stayed for 2 weeks, definately would go again. The hotel has thought of everything to make your stay as easy as possible, a wristband to operate the room door is perfect, not having to worry about a seperate key when you go out.  The hotel is modern in feel and kept spotlessly clean. The staff are all very friendly and nothing seems to be of too much trouble.  There is a daily activities programme, ranging from aquagym to darts, pool, archery and more. The entertainment team, Alberto and Gian-Luca made every activity fun and varied, always engaging with the guests.  Alberto goes that extra mile to make sure that he engages with the guests, tirelessly entertaining the guests with his good humour and keeps the evening…

title: Nice relaxing break
review: Hello julesr600,  Thank you very much for the assessment and for having spent two weeks of your vacation at our hotel.  We are glad to know that you liked the hotel, its facilities and that the treatment by the staff has been lovely.  We are also glad that you enjoyed the daily activities that take place at the hotel and we appreciate the positive assessment of our team, especially Alberto. Our staff works to provide quality service and make everyone feel at home.  Thank you for the comment about our Mare Nubium restaurant and for considering the food of excellent quality. We hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel!
review: Amazing holiday!! Fab hotel, fab facilities, lovely friendly staff. Would defo go again. Nice walk to the beach. Only thing I would change is to ditch those awful ready-made cocktails and do the real thing 😊

title: Fabulous!!!!!
review: We stayed here for a few days after being on a cruise. It was amazing!!! We upgraded to all inclusive on arrival purely for drinks around the pool as it was so economical. We did end up eating most of our meals here as the food was delicious. There was a huge amount of choice, and it was always fresh and tasty. They NEVER reused food from previous meals unlike many places. The rooms were clean and spacious. It was lovely and modern inside. The shower was always hot and refreshing. The pool was lush! It was massive. It never felt crowded and there were always sun loungers available.  The entertainment team were lovely. Not that there was a lot of it, but there was always a show in the evening, which was good. The staff were always very helpful and friendly. Nothing was too much…

title: Brilliant hotel- highly recommend!
review: Hello SpoiltPrincess,  Thank you very much for the review. And we are glad to know that the experience in our hotel has been incredible.  We are glad to know that you liked the variety and quality of the food. Like the rooms and the hotel in general. We also value that you speak positively of the friendly and efficient treatment of our staff.  Thank you for recommending the hotel and we hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: chill out
review: This hotel is clean, well kept and very chilled environment perfect for a short break away. All the staff are friendly and efficient.  The food served from breakfast to dinner was all well varied, fresh and lots to pick from. A special mention to Alberto, he’s a fantastic entertainer and made a real effort to make sure everyone was happy and enjoying there stay, aswell as providing entertainment during the day and evenings- such as aqua gym, darts, bingo etc.  He’s a real credit to your hotel, we will be back!

title: I love this hotel - especially the animation team!
review: Hello cornishbird890,  Thank you very much for the review. We are glad to know that you have enjoyed the holidays and relax in our hotel. As well as the good assessment that our staff especially Alberto and his animation in the activities; aqua gym, bingo...  We hope to see you again so you can continue enjoying.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Hotel after cruise for a week a lovely hotel
review: had lovely chill out time after our cruise room lovely, food good,the two guys who did the day&night entertainment worked really hard all the time they were excellent, all the staff were very nice nothing was any trouble for them

title: Clean hotel and good rooms.
review: Overall a good stay over a week at this hotel.  Very calm during the day time since there are no kids, and the rooms are really clean and the staff is great.    The pool area could use more parasols though, and alot of guests place their towels on sunbeds with parasols hours before they actually show up.   The breakfast is really good at the buffet restaurant but the dinner was not so great. It lacked variety and quality so we ended up going to other restaurants in Port Alcudia for dinner 6 out of 7 days.

title: Great experience, very good hotel.
review: Great experience, very good hotel, super service. We are thinking of going back next year. Good food. Clean and nice swimming pool. Lots of sun beds available. Friendly staff and very helpful. Just a lovely hotel.

title: The best animator alberto i have ever seen.
review: He is very friendly. We laughed a lot with him. Without him the holidays werent good like this.  We will come back for sure and we hope that we will meet alberto again! Thanks alua soul that we met a person like him. The hotel should have more persons in the staff like him.  Gian luca were also good.

title: Lovely hotel
review: Hi Mikrom2019,  We're happy you have had such a great time with our entertainment staff, which indeed it's excellent. They always try to work as hard as they can in order to provide our guests with a pleasant stay. Alberto and all our staff would love to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely stay at Alua Soul Alcudia Bay
review: We were a little apprehensive about stopping here after reading some reviews beforehand, however we needn’t have worried as literally everything was amazing!  The hotel is pristine and the staff work so hard on keeping it looking good. Reception were really helpful, including helping us break into our case after our lock broke! The food and drinks were all fabulous, we were all inclusive and struggled to limit each meal to two plates of food it was so good! There was always something to eat even if you were particularly picky.  Alberto and Gian Luca, the entertainment staff were also incredible! They both work so hard, were so friendly and always had a smile on their faces! The evening entertainment was occasionally (we stayed for a week and this probably relates to 2/3 nights)…

title: Honeymoon
review: Lovely staff rooms and overall a great experience the rooms were so cool due to air con and nothing too much trouble food was really nice a little repetitive but cooked well and fresh not best entertainment but ok

title: My 40's birthday in Mallorca
review: Hi Kimie,  We're grateful that you have chosen us for such an important experience as your honeymoon. We hope to have reached your expecations. It seems like you have had such a great time! It would be a pleasure to receive you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great Hotel to Just Relax by the Pool
review: Amazing atmosphere with wonderful room. Very nice evenings parties. Nevertheless the food was fabulous. Very close to the beach. A lot of varieties of restaurants.  I would really recommended to visit this place.

title: Brilliant
review: Hi rafehdarwish1979,  It makes us truly happy to know that you have chosen us for such an important celebration as your 40's birthday. How young you are! We hope you have spent a nice holidays and a great time. We would truly love you to come back! It will be a pleasure to receive you!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Couples bliss
review: We had a lovely stay at this very nice hotel for our first holiday together as a couple. On arrival we were treated to a glass of cava and were delighted with our immaculate room (overlooking the street). We went on this holiday to relax after finishing our degrees so it was perfect being able to sit by the pool and enjoy the sun everyday. We also ventured out into the old town and to the beach which was a short walk away. The immediate area didn’t have much in the way of entertainment, but as all we wanted to do was relax by a pool, the hotel was perfect for us!  Alberto the entertainment guy was great, with incredible energy! We enjoyed the games/entertainment he put on in the evening. We didn’t get involved in many of the daytime activities (no one was pressured into things…

title: Pleasantly surprised.
review: My daughter and I have just returned from a week at the Alua Soul. Transfer about 40 minutes,  check in very easy with a nice cold glass of cava.  The basic rooms are very nice, plenty big enough for two, fridge and kettle, excellent TV channels! Pool area really good as there was plenty of space between the sunbeds and plenty of beds and umbrellas available . We stayed for bed and breakfast,  there are lots of lovely restaurants, about a 10 minute walk along the promenade by the beach. As this is an adult only hotel, very quiet and civilised in all areas. Would definitely recommend this hotel for a very reasonable week in Alcudia.

title: Perfect holidays!!
review: Hi Penny,  We're glad you have enjoyed your stay at Alua Hotels. We thank you for taking your time sharing your opinion and recommendations, which will be useful for our future guests. We hope you have had a pleasant time. We would love to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Exceñlent
review: Me and my sister booked via Tui this package holiday which included half board stay at Aluasoul Alcúdia Bay hotel. We couldn’t ask for more!! The staff was amazing! From the argentinean guy, Marcos, at the reception, as well as Katie and Kylie, to Alberto who thought us to make sangria, to Gianluca at the pool to Tony pons and Trini during breakfast and dinner! The room was very spacious and with a very modern touch!  The hotel is situated few minutes feom the beach, which is also very very nice with warm water. We’re leaving Alcúdia very happy wishing to come back soon! Thanks to AluaSoul and it’s team for our stay!

title: Amazing holiday
review: Hi Mariel,  We're grateful you and your sister have had such a great time during your stay at Alua Hotels. Indeed, our staff it's really professional, they always try to work as hard as they can! We hope to receive you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: July 2019 holiday
review: Excellent facilites and service. Staff was extremely nice and it was very close to the beach. The entertainer Alberto tough us how to make Sangria and we had a lot of fun - lovely experience. Will definitely come back

title: Great place
review: Stayed 3 nights as a surprise 40th prezzie, loved the hotel, the area and the weather. Bed is huge and very comfy, staff are great and AI cocktails are spot on.Food was really nice and lots of choice. Deffo be coming back.

title: 4 Night Stay
review: Hi Chris,  We hope you have had a plesant stay at Alua Hotels!  We would definitely love you to come back!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Adult Bliss
review: Hotel reception is very clean and modern, friendly and efficient staff.  Room was ready, very clean and modern and very comfortable big bed. Safe, kettle tea coffee and a fridge in the room which was useful. Pool area was relaxed, clean with plenty of beds and a nice pool. Pool bar staff were friendly, and never saw a queue.  Breakfast was excellent and evening dinners was good but not a great vegetarian choice for my girlfriend. Pasta and salad so didn't starve but nothing exciting.  Staff all worked hard and again friendly. The animation team worked hard and enlisted a good number for the usual activities.  All in all, a good hotel, clean modern, good location with excellent staff.  We will come back, maybe for a week.  Walk to the port in the evening.  Nice walk along the…

title: Highly recommend!
review: Hi RSVNpton,  We thank you for taking your time sharing your complete and detailed opinion and recommendations, which will be useful for our future guests. We hope you have enjoyes our services and facilities to the fullest, as well as the surroundings! Will we receive you again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: almost everything required for a holiday break
review: A lovely hotel that welcomes you with a glass of cava. The transfer is roughly 90 min which is manageable after the short flight. The area is lovely with a short walk to a beautiful beach. From there you can walk directly to the port or a little further to the old town (market days are Sun/Tue). A short bus ride takes you to port de pollenca which is another beautiful spot.   Because all this is situated in the north of the island, the surrounding scenery is lovely mountainous. Thanks plenty of trips from the port to take and water sports are a plenty.   The hotel was lovely and quiet with a lovely ambience. All inclusive is the best way to get your value for money. The rooms are lovely and have benefited from a recent renovation. The food is fantastic with plenty of choice. The…

title: Fantastic entertainment team and great holiday
review: A lovely modern feel hotel in a quiet location with great entertainment and the beach about 10 minutes walk away. Spotlessly clean and an extensive choice of quality food. The Old Town and harbour is about a 25 minute walk away but is well worth visiting, with quaint streets and lovely shops. Also well worth a visit is Pollença Old Town and Port, which has a lovely promenade and again quality shops. Quite a wait for a bus to get there, as they were always full, so recommend getting a taxi. The stars of the holiday were the hotel entertainment team, Alberto and Gian Luca, who work tirelessly to get everyone involved and made us feel more like friends than hotel guests. The hotel staff were friendly, polite and helpful. Those who went the extra mile and are deserving of a mention…

title: Fantastic week
review: Hi Med4me,  We thank you for taking your time sharing your opinion and recommendations, which will be useful for our future guests. We hope you have spent a great holidays at the beautiful Mallorca. We would love to receive you again at Alua Hotels.!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Another amazing holiday
review: Just back from a weeks holiday at this hotel and it was fantastic - would definitely recommend it! From the moment we arrtived at Palma airport to the time we left, everyone was very friendly and helpful. Check in at reception was very quick and straightforward, and the free bubbly went down very well. Our room was very clean, with a balcony overlooking the pool - great. The maids were very cheery and in our experience that is not always the case elsewhere! The hotel entertainment team of Alberto and Gian Luca were excellent and just couldn't do enough to make everyone's holiday a success. Evening entertainment was good by the variety of artists who performed. Restaurant was spotlessly clean and choice of food excellent. Would definitely recommend a stay here.

title: Fantastic holiday
review: Hi bbbmufc,  We're happy you have enjoyed your stay at Alua Hotels. It seems that you have had such a great time at Alcudia Bay. Alberto, Gian Luca and all our staff would love to welcome you again and again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing holiday so much fun!!!!
review: Just back from yet another wonderful holiday with my hubby, sister and brother-in-law and my 87 year old mum.  The staff at this hotel really are the best in the business. From arrival to departure my mum was treated like royalty. We were instantly recognised from the previous two visits and were given the exact same rooms as previous which although they are all the same, to an 87 year old it feels like coming home.  The rooms are large (especially the bed!), with a fridge and free safe and are professionally cleaned every day by our lovely lady, Maria. The food is very good and if you can’t find something you like then you are obviously a very fussy eater. The restaurant staff are soooo helpful and look after your every need (special thanks go to Tony, Sebastian, David, Alba…

title: First class hotel all round
review: Just returned from staying at this hotel for a short last minute break (4 nights) timed to celebrate my 70th birthday.  From arrival to departure all aspects of our stay were highly satisfactory.  The bedrooms are modern,spacious with very comfortable beds and a decent shower in the bathroom.  Food in the restaurant was very good with a good variety of food served at both Breakfast and Dinner. I recommend you take advantage of their drinks with dinner special offer at 4 euros per person per night which covers Cava,a choice of red white or rose wine,beer,water and soft drinks. Excellent value for money.  Nice surprise on the night of my Birthday when a complimentary bottle of Cava arrived in our room. Very nice touch!!  Staff in all areas were pleasant and helpful in all areas of…

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Hi Tony,  We're happy you have had a nice time at the breathtaking Alcudia Bay and its surroundings. We thank you for taking your time sharing such a detailed feedback. Indeed, the important celebrations as your Birthday have to complemented with something special. We would love to receive you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Clean, relaxing and fun - but the air con needs work!
review: The hotel is excellent, first impression is good as you are greeted with a cold glass of cava from very friendly staff. The hotel is very clean throughout, we had a pool view room with balcony which was very good.  The staff here from reception, bar, cleaning and restaurant are absolutely great all are very friendly, polite and nothing is a problem. We stayed all inclusive and the food was of excellent quality, not the usual you expect from AI and I thought the selection was very good. There was a variety of breakfast items from the healthy fruit, cereal, pancake options and of course the typical English. Every evening there was a good variety of choice for starter, mains and dessert plus vegetarian options and they had themed nights for example asian and mexican. The drinks…

title: Great holiday
review: Hi Susan,  We're glad you have enjoyed that much your stay. We hope you have enjoyed our 'all inclusive' options, which indeed, it's perfect to satisfy everything each guest needs. We thank you for taking your time sharing your opinion and also for choosing as to spend your holidays. We would love to welcome you again in Alua Hotels!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing Experience
review: My partner and I stayed for 5 nights at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay and really enjoyed it. The hotel is an all-white scheme which makes the whole hotel feel fresh and new. Upon arrival we were greeted at reception with a warm welcome and a glass of complimentary Cava which set a lovely tone to start our relaxing holiday. Every staff member we encountered were delightful, friendly and eager to help with any questions we had. There was always something to do throughout the day. Whilst we were there, some of the activities during the day were as follows: Archery, rifle shooting, aquagym, cocktail making, wine tasting, paella demonstration/tasting, darts, ping pong. Some of these activities were very busy though (15+ people attending) so sometimes getting to your turn could take a long…

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Just returned from this lovely hotel. Rooms are comfortable, modern and clean. Maid service is excellent. Front desk staff are very helpful and informative. Entertainment staff were very entertaining, even though we never joined their activities. Antonio at the pool bar was a bit “jobs worth” only blight on the horizon. Apart from that we will absolutely be returning.

title: Perfect 2 weeks
review: Hi Northlanarkshire,  We're glad you have spent a great holidays at Alua Hotels. We hope you have enjoyed our services and facilities. We would love to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Brilliant hotel
review: This hotel is in a perfect location to the gorgeous beach, shops and bars.  Easily walking distance to all.    The room we stayed in was just standard room but lovely and clean. Decent queen sized bed and very comfortable.  Our room overlooked the pool and yes you can hear the music from the entertainment but by 11:30pm its quiet, we DID NOT have problems sleeping think some people are over critical.  Food - breakfast is your standard for most hotels and I know the chef will cook omelette on order while you wait.  Lunch and dinner we always found something we would each, never a day there was something we wouldn’t eat.  Evening meals would have themes such as Asian, Majorcan etc but food was lovely.  Some people think finding faults when there aren’t any.  I even tried two types…

title: Family
review: Hi Emma,  Thank you for taking your time sharing your opinion. We're grateful you have had a great time at Alua Hotels. We hope you have enjoyed our food service, as well as our pool area and our entertainment staff and activities. For us it has been a pleasure to receive you an we would love to do it again. Would you come back?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Excellent stay at the Alua Soul Alcudia Bay
review: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 1 week at the end of june and were very pleased with the hotel. Glass of champagne cava on arrival which was very nice. The room was very clean and spacious. We had a queen size bed which was very comfy and the aircon was lovely and cold which was great as it was 30 degrees plus when we stayed here.   Food was very good with plenty of choice and was very tasty. We stayed half board and we had an option to upgrade to a drinks package which was €4 per person per night and we could get unlimited drinks at dinner which included soft drinks, ice cold water and wine from a bottle in which you could help yourself. This was definitely well worth it.   The hotel is in a great location, close to white sandy beach, restaurants and alcudia port. Ideal for…

title: ** PERFECT **
review: we stayed here June 2019 and it was PERFECT. Very helpful staff and the food was fantastic with plenty to choose from. Would certainly stay here again if we came back to this resort. You won't be disappointed

title: Mother daughter holiday
review: Hi oldham_9,  We're grateful you have had a great time at Alua Hotels! We hope you have enjoyed to the fullest. We would love to see you again as soon as possible!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Beautiful hotel.
review: Have just returned from a holiday with my teenage daughter. We had a wonderful time in this hotel. It’s very clean and our room was great. We were all inclusive which was perfect- plenty of choice food wise and drinks were available all day. The staff were so friendly and we had a great time joining in with activities, without being pressured. Alberto the entertainment guy deserves a special mention as he made our time very enjoyable. Pool area was good, with sun beds available and the pool was lovely. All in all a lovely stay, and we would be happy to return.

title: Not quite the same
review: Hi Kat,  We're happy you have enjoyed your stay at Alua Hotels. Indeed, our 'all inclusive' option it's perfect, it includes everything you need to enjoy a pleasant stay. Alberto and all our staff would love to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: lovely hotel but not as near beach as expected.
review: Me and my fella stayed here for 2 weeks mid May 2019. This was our first holiday as a young couple and we could not have had a better experience. Upon arrival, we were greeted with a clean reception and staff that provided prosecco and cookies (always a pleasant way to begin a holiday).  Our room was on the top floor over looking the streets, which we much preferred as it was very quiet at night and the sunsets over the mountains was beautiful to watch. The room was beautifully clean, and the showers were amazing (call me easily pleased, however ive decided i want the exact same rainfall style showers in my own future home after this experience). Breakfast was beautiful, as was dinner (we were half board). Not sure what half of the reviews on here are talking about in regards to…

title: Hot hot hot
review: Stayed here for two weeks from 22nd june 2019. Not what we expected, only one small pool bar which is where the entertainment happens also. No other bars or areas to sit and relax. Hotel is exceptionally clean and rooms are cleaned daily. Rooms nice but not very big. Not much storage space in rooms either. Our room 230 view was pants we overlooked the dining room roof !  Food ok but some days it was difficult to find anything we liked. Lots of fish dishes and strange meats. Not alot of vegetable dishes. Sweets were awful and the same every day. But lots of fruit. The atmosphere in the dining room is not good either . Look out for Alberto the entertainment guy he was the nicest  funny energetic guy and deserves to be recognised xx  All in all we had a nice time as it was very…

title: Great holiday! Gutted to be home.
review: Hi Ally,  We're happy you have enjoyed your holidays, especially thanks to the hard work from Alberto. He'll get so happy to hear about your opinion.  Regarding to the food, our chefs try to satisfy all our costumers providing them with a wide variety of plates and products. But of course, we'll take note from your suggestions to continue increasing our food variety. It's true that there's only one bar in our hotel, as stated in our official site.  Regarding the atmosphere in the restaurant, we'd like to know further about this comment. We kindly ask you to contact us if you want to share more from your opinion, Ally. We'd truly appreciate if you continue helping us to make our hotel better.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing holiday!!
review: Returned from a 5 day/5 night half board stay with my sister at this hotel today. Hotel was modern and very clean wherever you were. In terms of appearance, it's a great place, checkin was quick and we were given a glass of cava upon arrival. Upon arrival we were told we were being offered a different room and given that the couple infront had been upgraded it seemed very positive! The lady asked if she could show us before we agreed. However, the room we were taken to and shown was minus a balcony and a triple rather than double which wasn't the room we had booked and initially seemed a bit disappointing but she said she would try to get us a better room with a pool view. Whilst we had this issue, I cannot fault the hotel at all for the situation. As compensation, we were…

title: Holiday break
review: Hi LivGreenidge,  We thank you for taking your time sharing your complete and detailed opinion. It has been such a pleasure to receive you at Alua Hotels. We hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great holiday would return
