review: We stayed at this hotel in June this year, had an absolutely wonderful time. It was great doing all the activities with the entertainment team, Gian Luca and Alberto. Gian Luca was brilliant taking the time to spend time with everyone individually and having a good laughs with us. Never had to look for sun beds as there were always plenty available, there was a good variety of food and snacks all day and the rooms were spot on. WiFi is free, the safe in the room is also free and we were welcomed with a glass of cava each. Relaxing atmosphere and I will be returning for sure.

title: Fabulous
review: The Hotel was more than what we expected.  It was clean and very tidy.  All the Staff was excellent.  The Restaurant Staff worked very hard as did the Staff that cleaned the rooms.  The rooms have a nice amount of room, the bathroom and shower has plenty of room, which is a change from most other Hotels I've stayed at on holiday.  The pool area is very nice and plenty of poolside beds.  We loved our stay at Alou Soul and will be going back.  I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great Hotel
review: Hi Justin,  We're grateful you have enjoyed our rooms, the pool area and also with our staff. We will be waiting for you to come back!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing holiday
review: This hotel was brilliant, staff very friendly and attentive from reception through to the lady every day who did our bedroom, I can't recommend this hotel highly enough and can't wait to go back again 😎

title: Adults only Aluasoul
review: Hi Inez,  We hope you have had a great experience at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. Can't wait to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: AMAZING!!
review: We arrived late after our flight was delayed, however this was not a problem. The staff throughout the hotel were courteous, friendly and very helpful. The hotel was lovely and the food choices great. The pool area was kept to a very high standard. Only downside was evening entertainment was very limited.

title: Aluasoul  Hotel Alcudia
review: Stayed here for one week in June with my partner good points clean rooms big big beds clean pool area didn’t have to get up early to get a sunbed entertainment was Ok but outside , I think  this was the reason why there was no atmosphere , polite staff   Location was okay but was never near the harbour or near the main strip ,We stayed half-board  breakfast was okay but found it very difficult to find  something to eat in the evening I would say the food was below average ,If you haven’t been to Alcudia before please don’t expect much nightlife after 11 o’clock  there is a nightclub called bananas which is for the younger generation unfortunately we are past that and prefer bars with a bit of music . We wouldn’t personally stay in this hotel again but only because we felt the…

title: June 2019
review: Hi Mark,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and suggestions, they would be useful for us to improve and maybe it would make us possible to provide you and all our costumers with an uforgettable experience. Your suggestions will be taken into account. Would you give us a second opportunity?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: There was nothing that we were not completely delighted with
review: All staff were kind and friendly from reception, cleaners, restaurant and the entertainment staff. Room was cleaned everyday with fresh towels and bottled water large bathroom. Bar staff were superb. The hotel food choice was excellent recommend all inclusive Thank you Alou Soul.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Hi stevenmichaelc2018,  Thank you for choosing us! We're truly happy you have enjoyed that much at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay, it has been a pleasure to receive you. Would we see you again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: June 2019
review: From the reception staff to the cleaners, the restaurant staff, the entertainment staff and even all the guests were exceptional.  We will definitely recommend to others and would be delighted to come back again.

title: Recuperation
review: The staff are the business from front of house to the serving staff to the maintenance. The hotel rooms are really good the food is excellent. The thing that lets it down is the exterior of the hotel it needs to be rendered and spruced up the corridor carpet needs replacing and various other snags need addressing overall I really enjoyed my stayed spent a lot of time in muro relaxing and using their beaches. Alcudia it self isn't my cup of tea not into Irish bars and fake clothes shops selling their wares that are fake I can spot fake clothes from a 1000 paces as I've worked most of my working life in se Asia

title: Very clean and modern hotel
review: Dear Gary,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope that you had a lovely holiday.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely quiet hotel
review: Stayed here for a week May 2019, lovely, very clean and modern hotel. Very quiet during day which was great for a relaxing break, no shortage of beds by the pool, comfy loungers too. Lots of activities on during the day.. archery, zumba etc. Beach is only 7 mins walk away too (and the beach has safes attached to the umbrellas which was great for leaving valuables when swimming). Greeted with cava on arrival which was lovely.   Rooms are good size, beds are HUGE! Fresh towels and water every day, bathroom is lovely and modern. Good wardrobe space and nice sized balcony. TV has good channels too.   Dining experience is good, food was nice and varied, all the kind of meals you would expect from a hotel buffet but then also some different meals which was a lovely change. Nice touch…

title: Lovely Hotel, great location. Dining experience is disappointing.
review: Dear Navigate23682264061,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here. It is wonderful to hear that you had a lovely stay and especially enjoyed the room facilities. We hope that you had a relaxing holiday and invite you to return once again to Alua, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Too short trip for such an amazing hotel!
review: We stayed here in June for 10 days and really enjoyed our time. The pool area is really quiet which is lovely and we were surprised that you do not have to reserve sun beds as there are so many good ones available, only one day did we see a completely full terrace, so that is a bonus not having to wake up wake up early. The food is good and options changed every day which was a nice change to having the same food each time in a bigger restaurant. We were half board and the majority of guests were all inclusive, so we did find at dinner that the waiting staff did not offer you drinks or show you to your seats, which we thought the service could have been better. After 5 days we complained to reception and the response was “you have to ask waiters for a drink” which has never been…

title: Excelent stay in Alua Soul
review: Keeps it's promises, poolarea, all inclusive stay with well tasting meals, nice and clean rooms, kind personnel with a smile and showing proper attention. Short distance to the beach, center of city and shopping. The only thing missing was the coffee machine during lunch and dinner. We can strongly recommend this hotel.

title: Nice and clean hotel with friendly staff.
review: Dear Go22868703731,  Thank you for your kind comment, it was our pleasure to welcome you! We are glad to hear that you had an excellent stay and we hope to see you again sometime soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Sea break
review: The hotel is very nice and clean and in a central but quite location. All staff is very friendly and helpful. Only negative is the dining area. It's very very steril and not very cosy. All an the possibility for enjoying breakfast and dinner in an outside area would be nice.

title: Quality
review: Dear Helene,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fab hotel
review: Only one criticism of this hotel we asked for an early breakfast on day of departure 7 am we found a plate of bread and butter meat cheese and small cake felt they could have put cereals out and toaster on. Otherwise can not fault hotel brilliant stay.

title: Birthday holiday first time Mallarca
review: Great location near beach, pleasant staff, good food, activities in and out off hotel spa treatments and boat trips. Very helpful eg bus timetables, booking day trips. Sun beds and umbrellas including lovely mountain views.

title: Great value for money
review: Dear Adventure06785217709  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Enjoyable week away
review: Really stylish and clean hotel with very helpful staff. Great choice of food and drinks, relaxing and quiet pool area and lovely spa. Rooms are well sized with all the things you need, maids change towels and clear up daily. Would definitely recommend.

title: Lovely Hotel with Efficient and Friendly Staff
review: Dear Bellaw,  Thank you for sharing your experience here. It was our pleasure to welcome you and we are glad to know that you had a lovely stay. We hope to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: June 2019
review: We booked this hotel in one of the TUI stores in the UK and it looked like one of the nicest options we’d come across and the pictures were fairly exact to the real thing!  The hotel is very modern and clean, has clearly had a revamp recently. The rooms are clean and air conditioned and look very smart. I’m really picky with rooms after a poor experience a few years ago and this definitely did the job for me. The bed is SO big and comfy, better than my brand new bed at home!! Bad notes - I’d say the shower could do with a sliding door as while you’re in it you get water all over the floor which is a massive pain! The balcony’s are also a little questionable... a little dated sure but the biggest issue is how overlooked you are! As the balcony’s are at an angle, you could quite…

title: Hidden Gem
review: I really liked this hotel. Clean, great location, lovely pool, great food, fantastic value for money and adults only. 5 minutes walk from the beach, shops and bars. Staff were very friendly. If I really had to find fault with anything it would be the evening entertainment being a tad loud. I slept with ear plugs in and it still kept me awake. It wasn’t too late to be fair but we had to be up at 5.30am the next morning so we were in bed early!

title: Holiday
review: Dear Jill,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay are we hope to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 3 night break
review: Nice hotel good animation some great acts in the evening. Food was ok nothing to shout home about.The serving staff seemed a bit miserable unless you were paying cash, and seemed a bit untidy. But for a week it was a relaxing holiday.

title: Perfect for a short break
review: Dear Mark,  Thank you for leaving your review, it was our pleasure t welcome you! We hope to see you again.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Awesome stay!
review: very smart hotel,wonderful staff,good food,it was a pity that they did not have a lounge bar to sit comfortably and enjoy a drink in a relaxed atmosphere.The only bar area was in a awning with cheap,uncomfortable seating and tables which was very cold at night..would go back to this hotel  but with the lack of a lounge a 3 day break is enough

title: Very good
review: Lovely hotel very clean and fresh. Lots of sunbeds. Walking distance to main road, beach and bus stops. Food was great something for everyone enjoyed the sweets lots of choice could not fault it. Only stayed 4 days but would return.

title: Best holiday
review: Dear Maps40022217021,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely hotel.
review: Fantastic hotel , lovely location  , staff extremely friendly , entertainment crew were great craic , was upgraded to All Inclusive by manager as our room wasn’t ready on day of arrival , manager on duty was lovely , cava on arrival ..... lovely atmosphere .... will defo return 😍

title: Wonderful holiday at a top rated hotel with so many lovely qualities
review: Dear MeathSnoop,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here. It is wonderful to know that you had such an amazing holiday at our hotel.   We look forward to your return, it would be our pleasure to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: May 2019
review: We Will comeback 😊 Nice Room, good beds, Nice view - we loved The morningsun on The balkon, SO good Food 😋 sunbeds for all ☀️😊 Nice intertament in The evening 😊 All The service Was perfekt... kindley, helpfull, smileyling peaple 😊

title: May 2019 stay
review: Excellent 4 star hotel, entertainment team brilliant, Lucas and Ariel worked so well together and went way beyond making the effort of getting to know all the guests by name and encouraging you to get involved. Food was very good with plenty of choice. Hotel was spotlessly clean, bar, reception, restaurant and cleaning staff all very friendly and polite. Only suggestion would be the front outside of the hotel could do with some curb appeal, maybe over sized pots with pretty plants. On our last day we had a early pickup, the hotel offers a cold breakfast, this was a bit of a let down, no toast facility and cereal or yogurt on offer, just bread, jam, ham cheese and cake.

title: A really good holiday where the food and facilities were excellent
review: Dear Jacqui,  Thank you for sharing your experience here. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope you had a lovely holiday.   We hope to welcome you again someday, it would be our pleasure!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nothing bad to say at all 😊
review: Excellent holiday. Staff were very helpful. Our room was excellent with fridge and we had  fresh still water everyday.. The all inclusive package worked well with plenty of variety of drinks. The sangria was especially good and the cappuccino con crema was supreme. The food was excellent with plenty of variety and the sweets were to die for One problem was there was no bar lounge with comfortable sofas. This was awkward on the 2 days where it rained and we  could not sit outside. The room where the entertainment took place was not big enough to accommodate the number of people there. The pool and outside areas were well provided with plenty of sunshades. The entertainment was varied with plenty of choice.The entertainment staff worked tirelessly to keep people occupied.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear Veronica,   Thank you for sharing your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely stay and enjoyed the facilities of the hotel, especially the restaurant and our sangria. Thank you for your comment regarding the inside lounge area,  we took note and will work on improving this element of the stay.  We hope that you had a memorable holiday and it would be our pleasure to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Not  brilliant
review: Great hotel. Very clean and tidy and well maintained. Plenty of room outside with sun beds and parasols. Pool is freezing.  Restaurant caters for all at all sittings. All inclusive is great value. You can go to the a la carte restaurant one evening and it’s well worth doing.

title: A lovely week away in Alcudia, Majorca
review: This is a lovely hotel just one road back from the main beach area, so very peacefully located but within easy reach of the beach and old town.  We stayed one week all inclusive in May 2019.  The rooms are very comfortable, especially the beds.  The shower is powerful with lashings of lovely hot water.  We booked through Tui and all travel arrangements were taken care of.  The weather was a bit 'hit and miss' for part of the week, a bit windy and some rain.  We found little entertainment in the locality, so our focus was on amusing ourselves around the hotel itself.  The pool area is fantastic with ample sunbeds.  The bar is well stocked.  The entertainment, provided by Juan Luca and Ariel was a great surprise to us - we are not really ones to take part in organised activities,…

title: Review by dan and tricia
review: Dear Mumwithteenagers,  First of all, thank you for choosing AluaSoul Alcudia Bay for your holiday. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay and found your room to be comfortable, pool area fantastic and the entertainment positively surprising. Thank you for your kind words, we will pass them to our staff and will continue doing our best to provide the holiday experience of the highest standards to our guests.  We hope to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Adults only mini break. friendly clean hotel.
review: Lovely hotel with friendly staff and a big thank you to gian luka and arial the entertainment team who made our stay fun and entertaining would highly recommend ps would also recommend a pool view room

title: Fantastic stay
review: Dear Dan and Tricia,   Thank you for sharing your review, we are glad to hear that you had a lovely stay and enjoyed the entertainment of AluaSoul Alcudia Bay! We will be happy to pass your kind words to our team.  We hope to welcome you back in the future!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: As good as it gets
review: The Alua Soul hotel is modern and clean & located 2 minutes from bars, restaurants, shops and 7 minutes from the beach.  Our room was exactly like the brochure photos. Large comfortable king size bed, with deep mattress, not 2 singles pushed together. This is one of the few hotels that provides plug sockets next to the bed to charge your phone. The balcony had mountain views and caught the morning sun, sadly no sea view as the hotels on the opposite side of the strip block the view.  The bathroom had a large shower which was modern and fully functional, shampoo and shower gel was provided. A luxury gown and slippers were also provided.    The restaurant was clean, the staff quick, efficient and very helpful. There was plenty of choice and always a local dish to try. I was able…

title: something different
review: Great experience, we will return.  Very friendly treatment  Excellent location, close to the beach, and close to nightclubs to go have a drink.  Excellent food, both in the buffet, as in the restaurant.Thanks animation that are also very friendly and entertaining Ariel is the best

title: Amazing Holidays, Fantastic Entertainment!!!!
review: Dear Siboc,  Thank you for sharing your great experience here, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Stay all-inclusive from 6-16.may
review: My name it's Steven and I've just finished my 10 days holidays and would like to give a special appreciation to the Entertainment boys, specially to Ariel, they made our holidays even better! Amazing activities and always very nice with everyone. I would definitely come back because of them and all of the rest in the hotel too. I definitely this hotel!!  Here it's some pictures of the paella with the Entertainment and the Chef.

title: Relax
review: Dear Steven,  We are so happy to hear that you had an amazing holiday and enjoyed your stay, especially the entertainment. We thank you for your kind words, we will make sure to pass them to the team so that they also feel proud of their job.   We hope to see you back one day!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Short break
review: Lovely hotel, very nice rooms with a big comfy bed. All of the staff are very friendly and helpful. Food is good quality you always will found something. Very good choice for the all-inclusive drink's and cocktails. Why i give not 5 point is the bar. The late afternoon can go very cold. The bar is a build on and   closed with plastic element who leaves a lot cold in. Glass element would be much better and can also opened in warm summer nights.

title: Relax
review: The first time that i'm in this hotel, the hotel is very comfortable there are clubs near tike disco banana. Personal very frendly staff, the girl lifeguard does its job very well in the pool, very attentive to costumers and firendly.  Food very good although little repetitive for 15 days but is very good is well. Ariel and Lucas excellent, sangria professional and all activities that they proposed.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Dear Rosean,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a great time with our entertainment team. We hope to welcome you back someday soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing holiday
review: A nice modern hotel. Rooms nice with large comfortable bed, tea and coffee making facilities and a nice view over the pool. Slippers and bath robe a nice touch but more draw space would be nice. The restaurant  was light and airy but the food was not 4 star quality but you wont starve. Staff friendly and very helpful, overall a nice 4 star hotel.

title: Exceptionally clean and very friendly
review: Hi Dream586264,  Thank you for your stay and 4 stars, our staff devotes their best efforts to preparing options for all tastes, and they will surely continue to dedicate themselves to improvement. However, we will take note of this experience and pass it on to our kitchen staff. And if you decide to come back, your holidays with us would be unforgettable ;  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: 27 holidays around the world
review: The hotel is very modern and clean. The food is very good and a lot to choose from. The bar downstairs also has a lot of drinks choice with snacks also available. The entertainment is very good with many activities to do during the day including archery and air rifle shooting. The evening entertain is very good also with games and live singers. The hotels entertainers Ariel and Gian Luca were very friendly made the activities and entertainment very enjoyable. The pool and spa facilities are very good, the pool is large and the sitting area is big with nice sunbeds. The spa area is a nice area to relax also. The hotels location is great only about a 5 minute walk to the beach and about 10 minutes to reach the port. Our transfer was also very quick only around 45 minutes from the…

title: Wonderful Staff, Lovely Hotel
review: Just returned from a week at this hotel, my reviews are always brief and too the point.  The hotel is nicely placed away from the main street through Alcudia and only a 5 min walk to the beach.  The hotel is modern and extremely well run by the dedicated staff at the hotel, its friendly, clean, quiet and very modern.  The restaurant is lovely and the food very varied with lovely staff especially Big Dave, always a warm welcome at meal times.  The entertainment staff need special mention as they worked so hard everyday to involve everyone and managed to get many of the customers from different countries mingling together and evenings were a great laugh, Ariel and Juan Luca were great fun the whole week. Bingo Bingo, certificate.  The bar has a varied selection and is open early…

title: Great Hotel & A Very Pleasant Stay
review: Hi Devonsurfes,   Thank you for leaving your comment here. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We hope you had a wonderful holiday. It would be our pleasure to welcome you again someday!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Do not go to this hotel at the end of season
review: We spent the second week of our October 2018 Cruise and Stay at this beautiful modern, light and airy hotel and from the moment we arrived at reception we found the staff to be lovely, friendly and very obliging. It is in a nice quiet location but within walking distance to the main road where you'll find shops, restaurants plus lots of other amenities and bus stops with regular services to other places to visit on Majorca. Alcudia town is about a 20-30 mins stroll away (depending on your walking ability).  The hotel facilities were very good and our room was excellent albeit not much drawer space, we found having your room key incorporated into your wristband is another intuitive idea (no forgotten or lost room keys). There was a large variety of food which was very nice and a…

title: Very Good Hotel
review: Hi Mark,  We hope you have enjoyed your experience at Alua Hotels. Indeed, all our staff it's kind and professional, they will always try to satisfy our guests necessities. We would love to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Cruise and stay
review: The first part of the week was good but then the food selection deteriorated dramatically as the hotel was shutting down for the winter. Very disappointing that those guests left at the hotel were treated as if they didn't matter. Rooms were of good standard and staff friendly. Check in takes far too long.

title: No atmosphere
review: We stayed here from 27th to 30th October from a week on cruise hotel was clean but cold as there was no bar no lounge to sit and relax in it rained heavily for the three days we were there therefor we had to stay in they had a few leather couches but they were near the entrance and there was no heating on after people complained on the Monday they switched it on you had to buy drinks at a poolside snack bar ugh!!! Flat beer in plastic glasses no thanks when I complained I was told no bottles or glasses could be taken into foyer ugh!! Food was cold and sparse choice only thing that was edible for breakfast was fried egg and they struggled to fry them 1/10 terrible they ran out of lyptons teabags on second morning I was told other teabags were the same !! Obviously not a tea…

title: LATE SEASON HOLIDAY
review: Went to an Aloua Soul Hotel in Cala D'or last year and loved it.  this hotel was different.  Spotlessly clean everywhere, inside and out.  Facilities were not four star.  No lounge area, or bar area, apart from the pool bar.  When it rained, nowhere to go.  Limited space in reception.  Food was average.  All self service, however they left food out too long, and so many times it was cold.  I ordered omelette every day as it was hot, so good. Bread good.  No proper marmalade, honey or jams, all in small plastic pots. Cereals were in plastic containers and soft!  been there too long.  Lunch time and dinners, salads were the same every day, every meal, set out the same.  Several meals had to be returned as cold.  Desserts dreadful.  Fruit consisted of tinned peached, pears and…

title: A great week
review: Lovely hotel, food very good, rooms clean and comfortable and the only downside for us was the bar area which was outside and fine for the day but in the evening it would have been nice to dress up and enjoy a drink in a proper glass that said I would visit again.

title: Good, Bad and the Ugly
review: Dear Angie,  It's been a pleasure to receive you in our hotel. Our cleaning staff works hard to maintain our rooms clean and comfortable, so their hard work is really successful. Regarding the glasses, we don't use crystal glasses for safety reasons, but we appreciate your opinion and we will take it into account.  When you decide to come back, don't forget to tell us, Angie. We will be waiting to greet you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Last week of the season!
review: We have just arrived home today from the Aluasoul Hotel.  Firstly the GOOD points The staff were very friendly and helpful, as was Shaun the rep. There were FREE, bathrobes, security safe, steam room, sauna, hot tub, and computers in reception. The room was cleaned and clean towels and large bottle of water replaced daily. The beds were comfortable.  The food we thought was OK, although the sweets were boring. The pool was very cold, so it was BAD! The lounge bar was easily the worst of any hotel we have ever been in.it had no charm and no atmosphere what so ever, so it was Ugly.  The first four days of our stay the weather was beautiful, but on Sat the rain started and it turned cold, but we tried not to let it spoil our week.

title: Overall experience
review: We travelled as a couple and were pleased with most aspects of our hotel and its location. Our biggest criticism would have to be the ambience of the pool bar area where the evening entertainment was provided. The lighting was far too bright and made the whole area look and feel more like a canteen. If the lighting could be changed then the atmosphere would be entirely different and could be made to feel more intimate. Also, why not remove the a la carte area and convert it into an inside bar/ lounge area.However, we would like to conclude on a more positive note because having made the aforementioned comments, we did nevertheless enjoy our stay. The room, food and staff we encountered were all good and the location was great.

title: Not up to plalutum standard
review: Hi 948frances,  We're so happy to know you had a good time in our hotel. We appreciate your suggestion about our a la carte area, and also that you shared your opinion regarding our lightning. We want to provide a comfortable experience for everybody, but your suggestions will help us to continue looking for improvements in the future.  Would you want to check out our improvements with another visit to our hotel?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely hotel
review: Had 4 days at hotel after a med cruise disappointed with standard of hotel for 4 star platinum  stayed in better 3stars rep not help full glad we only stayed short time visited other hotels in area which was nicer with more atmosphere and better decor.

title: Nice hotel, great food
review: Dear David,  Thank you so much for visiting Alua Hotels. We regret we didn't meet your expectations. Since we'd truly love to learn from your experience, we kindly ask you to contact us and share more comments regarding your thoughts about our atmosphere and decoration. We'd truly appreciate if you help us to continue improving our hotel.  Once again, thank you David. We truly wish to see you again some day at Alua Hotels, we'll work hard to deserve that chance.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel with a modern facelift
review: Lovely modern hotel just minutes from the main thoroughfare. Because we were staying at the end of October the selection of food was just ok. Very poor selection of desserts however the choice of main course was not bad and tasty enough. Rooms were excellent and the superior room we had was spacious. The weather was awful with torrential downpours but you didn’t mind staying in your room as it was spacious.

title: Great place to stay
review: We really could not fault this place! Very friendly and professional welcome when we arrived, we were even offered a glass of champagne ( shame we don’t drink alcohol, an alternative would have been nice) The room was amazing, clean and very modern, cleaned daily and towels changed every day by a lovely housekeeping team Plenty of areas to relax and chill, and plenty of room at the poolside bar with tables chairs and sun beds We went half board and found the food lovely, my husband can be a little picky but there really is something for everyone. Meat (several options every night) always fish, which was cooked at the buffet, various potato rice pasta choices plus vegetables and a salad bar! Soup and an array of starters and deserts Breakfast was also great, full English if you…

title: Nicely Tucked Away Hotel
review: Hi jaynewi,  We're so grateful for your high vote for our hotel, thank you so much! We're happy that our warm welcome was pleasant for you, however, we regret it wasn't completely satisfying because you don't drink alcohol. Thanks to this experience we will take note from this as a suggestion for us ;)  Your comments are very useful for our guests, so thank you for taking your time too. Will we get to see you again in Alcudia?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Nicely tucked away from the busy streets, but still close to all the amenities. Beach just a short walk away. Cleanliness is fabulous, food fresh and good selection, sometimes a little cold depending on your timing. Good selection of drinks and good availability. Well managed hotel, adult only which is a great plus when looking for a chilled out holiday.  Spa is small but we never came across anyone in their using the facilities. Pool is clean but cold as not heated. Plenty on Sunbeds always some available. The only downside was the amenities when raining as there isn’t a function room, just the pool bar with the plastic shutters down. Great place to stay though, staff and Rep were fab.

title: FABULOUS
review: Hi HonestKenilworth,  Indeed, our hotel is a perfect option for those people who need a relaxing break. We're so happy our condition as an Adults Only hotel made you feel great during your stay with us :) Regarding your comment, thank you for sharing your suggestion with us.   Will we get to welcome you in a new visit?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Long weekend
review: Would stay at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay again. Spotless room. Comfortable bed. Lovely shower. ALL the staff are welcoming, friendly & helpful. Food good quality & lots of choice. Brilliant holiday all round.

title: Couple long weekend
review: Couple first tripRoom lovely and spaciousFood cold or a weird mixture of things, pasta,sauce then a bowl of brussel sprouts?Pool was freezing which would stop me coming here again in later months.Entertainment was quiz or a singer not greatVariety of ages but leaning more to 50+Location good and we walked to beach and old town Was after a short break and tui advertising 45 mins from airport but in reality it was 75/90 minimum.Probably wouldn't stop here againOur room was facing the road so noise from the glass nightclub could be heard through the night and the nice builders who started at 7am across the road!!

title: Platinum it was not!
review: Hi portlandlady,  Thank you so much for visiting Alua Hotels. We're happy to know you spent a good holiday visiting Alcudia, which is a wonderful place from Mallorca. Regarding your comment, did you ask our reception staff for help? If our guests feel uncomfortable in their assigned room due to any issue, they can always visit the reception area and our staff will be happy to help them.  We'll be taking note of your comments since they're very useful and they'll help us to continue improving in the future.   Once again, thank you so much. It'd be a pleasure to get another opportunity and show you the results from our hard work to improve in the future.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Very basic, not a 4*
review: We booked this as a second week at the end of our Cruise,  it was listed in the Platinum section for TUI,  my sister selected this hotel as it was Adults only and had a Spa.  We paid the extra to have poolside view and be all inclusive.  When we arrived we checked in was given a bracelet which depending on the colour showed which level of board you have,  it also acted as the room key.  We reached our room only to discover that they had given my sister and I a double room instead of the twin we had booked,  I called down to reception and advised them this was the case and they asked if we could not share! As I declined this we was then found a room on the other side of the hotel which looked out on to the street (I don't recommend the view) We was promised they would resolve the…

title: Clean hotel
review: Hi ginettewallace,  First of all, thank you so much for choosing Alua Hotels for your holidays, and for taking your time to share your impressions with us. It seems you found interesting our wristband key. Indeed, it works as a key and the level of board.  We regret the incident with your room. If we didn't offer another room on the same day it's because our hotel was busy and there was no available rooms. We were able to give you another room next day and in the same floor than the previous one.  The rooms are cleaned every day, and both the shower and the floor from your room should have been cleaned during the whole week. The sheets are changed every two nights and at after every new arrival. Our reception staff would have registered and solved the cleaning situation of your room if you decided to visit them in the reception area.  Regarding our food service, our staff follows the health regulations to prepare the food, including the temperature. If any of our guests wants their food hotter, they can suggest it to our staff and they'll be happy to do it. We actually have different options of gluten free and many guests who needed it were able to enjoy it.   Regarding the price from our spa, we have no service with that price. In case you want to know further about our spa services, feel free to contact us anytime.  Once again, thank you for choosing us. We'd truly love to be fortunate and see you again in Alua Hotels.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Cold pool
review: Quite away from amenities and shops, just lacks atmosphere, no inside bar with comfy seats, plastic glasses day and night. Rooms very big and very nice, storage one draw for two people and one small cupboard, would not go back

title: If Ikea built a hotel....... - total disappointment!
review: When you pull up to the hotel the area is extremely tired (polite way of putting it!) first thoughts were 'feel sorry for who is being dropped off here' to then find out is was actually us!  Reception is light and airy, and reception staff welcoming although they are quite emphatic that you can not remove food from the hotel (but to be honest you won't want to)....and that's where the welcoming ended. Plus side: you don't have to worry about a key for your room as it's digital and part of your 'bracelet' showing whether you are all inclusive or not.  Don't be fooled by the "Platinum Collection" prestige it has been given.  First 24hrs we were there we had three different rooms, first room not what we had upgraded and booked (asked for a twin pool balcony and got a double pool…

title: Brilliant Stay
review: Dear MichelleW3407,  First of all, thank you so much for visiting Alua Hotels. We appreciate the time you took to write this extended review.   We're glad to know you got interested in our wristband key, which allows our guests to open their rooms and also to show the board they've booked for their stay.  Regarding the room, we regret we couldn't change it on the same day since our hotel was busy. We were able to do it on the next day and following the conditions from your booking. All of our rooms and amenities look in the same way that in the pictures from our official website. It's been reported that your room got cleaned and that your sheets were changed. Regarding our air con, is functioning normally.  Our restaurant staff follows the health conditions to cook our food, including its temperature. If our guests want their food to be hotter, they can always suggest it to our staff. Our staff is always happy to provide their service to our guests, and even before the closing from our buffet service they ask our guests if they want to get more food. Regarding our activities, we provide activities for the liking of everybody: dancing, aquagym, bingo and more.  We regret that your stay wasn't satisfying enough for you. Once again, thank you so much for visiting us. We'd truly be fortunate to see you again in the future.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Perfect hotel for active adults
review: Returned from the Aluasoul 6th October after a great relaxing break. The staff were all very friendly and courteous. The food was plentiful, varied and was served hot, which is a first as food normally needs to be hotter. We found the rooms to be very bright, modern and spotless. Fantastic powerful shower!! We had read on other reviews not to have a pool view room as they were very noisy, but we had one and after 11.30 everything was quiet, although even before then there was hardly any noise to speak of after the entertainment finished. The pool was well maintained and there was never any need to reserve a sun lounger as there were 2 per room and you could always get a parasol even at midday, which added to a very relaxing stay. The bar was well stocked with many premium brands…

title: Mrs Lisa Finlay
review: Hi GillyandGary,  We're so grateful for your high vote for our hotel! Indeed, we offer towels for free for a 20€ deposit that is always returned to our guests. It's fantastic to know you've liked this service. Will we get to see you again and give you another relaxing break?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: JANE AND FRED  FROM NORFOLK
review: Quiet and calm hotel and pool area with lots of sunbeds. Easy access to the beach. Daily entertainments such as pistol and rifle shooting, archery, basket, yoga, pilates, aqua zumba, music/movie quiz.

title: Lovely holiday
review: Came back from here a week ago.i can not fault this hotel.me and my husband thoroughly enjoyed our stay here ..check in was fast and staff in reception where very helpfull .we loved the room.our dining experience was always pleasant with a good variety to choose from.the location is great.we would defiantly return to this hotel.

title: Holiday with friends
review: Hi dawnspafford,  It's been wonderful to meet your husband and you in Alua Hotels :) We're so satisfied to know our hard work was successful and you spent a fantastic time with us. Can't wait to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Nice comfortable beds and nice rooms.    Paid extra for a suite but it was the same size as our friends ordinary rooms!   We had dressing gowns and slippers and so did they!   Why we paid £100 extra we do not know.   Went all inclusive although some nights we went to local bars.   No premium drinks included.   No southern comfort or Jack Daniels included in package.    All my friend had was soda as she only likes southern comfort!   She did have the odd glass of wine which were not the best of wines.   Entertainment on the whole was not very good at least not to our taste.   It seemed like a Butlins resort as every night they gave out certificates to people who won various events during the day!   All in all though we could put up with it and if it was crap we went to local…

title: Not great would not go again....
review: Hi scottie715,  We're happy to know you had a pleasant time visiting Alcudia and its old town. Regarding our rooms, the size and conditions from them can be check out in the pictures from our official website. Regarding our drinks services, our guests can find the information in our reception area and in our restaurant.   Regarding our activities, we provide activities for our guests from all ages. We regret that any from our activities was of your liking. We'll be taking note from your experience so we can take it into account for future improvements. We'd truly love to be fortunate and be chosen again for a future holiday.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Definitely not a 4*
review: We have stayed in this chain of hotels before and knew what to expect!! We were not disappointed the staff as always friendly extremely helpful polite and well groomed. The Hotel is spotless in all areas. A great selection of food to suit everyone that is fresh and delicious. The entertainment even at the end of the season was perfect. Not only would I recommend this hotel I would definitely stay here again!!!

title: Problem
review: Just spent a week at the aluasoul hotel in alcudia in a group of 10. Good points, clean, very friendly staff, modern, food and wine ok. Bad points, only one bar and this is at the poolside and has to serve all drinks in plastic glasses. If the weather is bad, this is where the indoor entertainment is put on and the problem is that it can only accommodate 80 people, according to the insurance policy on the wall, this meant that we had to sit in the reception area, which I think is totally unacceptable. I can't understand how Tui can rate this as a platinum hotel when there is a restricted space for indoor entertainment. Alcudia itself is looking tired and in need of renovation of public areas. Don't think we will be going back anytime soon.

title: Fab hotel
review: Dear Stephen,  Thank you so much for spending your holiday with your group in our hotel. We're happy to know you had a pleasant stay thanks to our modern and clean hotel. Regarding our glasses, they're not made of plastic, they're made of polycarbonate. Our bar is close to our pool area so for security reasons we don't use glassware close to the pool. Regarding our bar, our guests can check out its conditions in our official website, so they should know about its space.  We regret that your experience wasn't pleasant enough, Stephen. We'd love to have the pleasure of seeing you again in the future.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Brilliant holiday
review: This hotel was refurbished in 2017 and is of a good standard.   We stayed all inclusive for 1 week and the food was of good quality. We had no issues with the temperature of the food as reported in previous reviews   The pool and bar areas are great, although the pool itself is freezing!  The location is great and only a couple minutes walk from the shops/restaurants in Alcudia beach.   All inclusive is well worth the money and I would recommend this hotel.

title: Best holiday!
review: Hi fkom,  We're so glad to know you enjoyed our all inclusive service! It exists to provide a complete experience for all our guests, so we're happy to know it was a successful service for you. Regarding the pool, we regret the inconveniences, since the water gets colder in this time of the year. However, we hope the rest of your experience was comfortable for you.  Will we get to see you again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A good stay!
review: First time staying at this hotel and we have come back very happy.  We had a brilliant weeklong stay.  Room was lovely, food very good perhaps not a lot of choice, staff very helpful and friendly.  Pool area very good lots of sunbeds we did not go in high season so it might be different but it was so nice not to have to rush out every morning for a sun bed very good activities during the day and the evening entertainment was very good

title: Another lovely visit
review: We have just returned from our second visit and I must say it was just as good this year. The staff here are exceptional and will do everything to make your stay enjoyable from checking in with a nice glass of carva to leaving. I would especially like to thank the ladies on reception, sorry didn’t get your names , for dealing with our special requests. Thank You  The hotel is kept exceptionally clean the rooms are comfortable and cleaned daily storage may be a bit limited but is quite manageable. Cleaners are always friendly and pleasant. The and coffee are provided their is a kettle and safe free of charge with all inclusive and the wristband is also opens your door.  The restaurants are bright and clean food is well cooked and replenished ar regular intervals. We never had a…

title: IF YOU'RE UNDER 40 DON'T COME HERE!
review: Dear Joyce,  Thank you so much for coming back to Alua Hotels. It seems you truly enjoyed the services from Sylvie and Jakov, we will be sharing your comments with them since they love to hear about our guests' opinions :) Looking forward to receive you in your third visit, Joyce!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Family get together
review: Where do you start with this Hotel... Firstly when we arrived we noticed the complete lack of atmosphere in this place and that carries into your stay. There is only one member of staff on reception to check you in, which takes a while and just to rub it in you have to pay a £30 tourist tax which i wasn't aware of before arrival. Our room is on the first floor facing towards the pool, which also is directly next to the restaurant which means its noisy at all times and on top of that its above the 'entertainment' which is music playing at all times during the day and then continues into the evening until about 11pm. The rooms shower is like a wet room so once you have showered the whole bathroom stays wet which isn't nice, there is no kettle, iron or convenient plugs, no dressing…

title: Fantastic holiday
review: Hello Nile,  First of all, we're so grateful for your visit to Alua Hotels. However, we feel sorry that your experience wasn't as good as you expected.  Regarding the tourist tax, it's an official tax that it has to be paid in Balearic Islands. We always inform about this and also do tours operators through their official website, yet we regret that due any circumstance you weren't well informed about this.  Regarding your room, did you inform our reception staff about your opinion? Our staff in the reception area is always happy to receive our guests who need to share a suggestion during their stay.   It's common that the water is colder once summer is over, yet our guests can enjoy relaxing baths in our Wellness area anytime.   We appreciate your comments and we'll take them into account to search for more improvements for our hotel. Once again, thank you Nile. Our hotel is always open for adult and young guests who wish to enjoy a calm rest in Mallorca. We'd love to have the pleasure of receiving you again at Alua Hotels someday.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good hotel
review: This hotel was perfect for out bi annual get together. Average age 70, 13 adults enjoying each other’s company in a nice environment. Some of the reviews on this hotel are plainly stupid made by people who have gone elsewhere. There are promlens which have been exaggerated, the pool was cold some poolside music was loud, dogs were barking just switch of and enjoy, stop moaning and go elsewhere. Overall the hotel was good, the food was good which befits a 4 star hotel. Staff were very pleasant. We won’t go back only because there are so many places to go in this wonderful world of ours, broaden your horizons and enjoy your life. Most of al, be happy and share the good parts of your experience

title: Family reunion
review: This hotel was ideal for an adult family get together.  The staff are cheerful and helpful inviting participation without being pushy.  As  large party every effort was made to accommodate us, without any fuss, arranging meals and transport.  The food was excellent with plenty of choice.  The only criticism would be the lack of internal sitting areas fortunately the weather was good so we were unaffected until the last day and lunch had to be taken in the dining room as no food available in the pool bar until 3pm.  Overall ideally located for bus routes and a short walk to the baech, though traffic noise could sometimes be quite loud.Be aware tourist tax and towel deposit paid on arrival, could eat into cash, €20 per towel, refundable on leaving.

title: Nice! Clean, comfortable, friendly staff
review: Hi suellewellyn2018,  It's been wonderful to receive your family in our hotel. Our staff wanted to invite you to participate in their activities to make you enjoy even a better time, so it's satisfying to see you felt great with them.  Regarding the sitting areas, we appreciate your suggestion and we will take it into account for future improvements in our hotel.  Will we get to see your family and you again at Alua Hotels?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Positive and Negative comments.
review: If you're looking for an authentic atmosphere, this is not the hotel for you. When we first came in, I even found it a bit too modern. But it is sooo comfortable, and the staff is very friendly. Our room on the fifth floor was fine and had the largest and most comfortable bed we have ever had. Cleaning was perfect, and inobtrusive. Animation by Jacob and Sylvie was great. Not pushy at all, very nice. And Jacob's aquazumba was a special attraction. Plenty of lounge chairs and parasols around the pool. Food was good, and we were offered one dinner in the A la carte restaurant, which was very good too! Alcudia was at 20 minutes walking distance and really worth a visit, although we preferred the non-market days. Less crowded. Puerto d'Alcudia and the beach were really close. We had…

title: Great Stay
review: Hi Lamanca,  Thank you so much for your high vote for our hotel! Our aim is to provide a modern and comfortable hotel, so it's wonderful to see we're doing a good work. Jacob and Sylvie are truly popular between our guests, and we understand why, they're always so active and with a huge smile on their faces. If you had a great and relaxing stay in Alua Hotels, feel free to come back as many times as you want, we'll be here waiting to see you again ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great staff
review: The Positives of this hotel. Close to the old town of Alcudia, and nice beach walks. Food was good for buffet style and top marks for the A'la Carte restaurant the staff were very attentive and caring. The rooms were very clean as was the whole of the hotel, although room size in comparison to some hotels are very small.. Staff were brilliant. Plenty of sun beds, so no need for the early morning towel rush.  The Negative side of this hotel. There is no relaxing indoor bar, all drinks are from the pool bar which for safety reasons around the pool they have plastic glasses. With continuous washing they soon become very cloudy looking. This is a shame when in the reception area there is a space dedicated to a couple of computer terminals which would make an ideal spot for a…

title: Want a relaxing break? Then don’t go here
review: Let me start with the good points as there are some but not too many.  The hotel and rooms are very clean, the staff all seem helpful, the WiFi works well and rooms are quite spacious.  Now the not so good  The rooms are quite spacious but the lack of storage space is a pain, you could just survive for a week as a couple, anytime more than that and you are living out of your suitcase. They could easily have more storage and still have a spacious room.  The volume of the entertainment is incredible. When there is an act on at night it can be heard in all public parts of the hotel so whether you like it or not you are hearing it. There is only one bar in the hotel and that is next to the pool where the entertainment is on so you have no chance of a quiet evening. Most people who…

title: Fantaistic hotel for adults only
review: Dear stef2505,  Thank you so much for visiting Alua Hotels, and especially for leaving an extended and detailed review. It will truly help us to continue searching for improvements for the future.  Regarding the music, our team follows the official policy by government to avoid bothering our guests. In case the noise bothered you throughout your stay in our hotel, our reception staff would have liked to help you and search for a solution.  We want to welcome all adults from different generations, yet we appreciate your suggestions to help us improve our services. Our hotel is a 4* hotel and we will continue working hard to provide the best possible experience to our guests.  Once again, thank you for visiting us.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing hotel!
review: Hotel is well located, not far from beach or shops. There are also some nice little cafes  nearby. Found the market in old town a bit boring, would not return to it, but will definitely go back to this hotel next year.

title: Week away
review: Hi 513noel,  It seems you had a good time exploring Alcudia, that's wonderful! Even if the market wasn't of your liking, there's many interesting activities that you can enjoy in Alcudia's old town. If you want to discover them, feel free to come back to Mallorca, and we'll be happy to be your hotel once again ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice Hotel, very relaxing and great bed.
review: Just the internet isn’t workin bu the pool and the snack bar is boring and quite empty. But the staff is amazing, rooms are great! I was there with my boyfriend and we really enjoyed it. The city is close(15min walk bu the beach) and it’s lovely!

title: Comfortable and relaxing hotel.
review: This modern light and airey hotel with good facilities and comfortable rooms.  The hotel is for adults only so there are no children. We had booked in with TUI on a bed, breakfast and evening meal basis. At check in we were offered the up grade package for drinks with our evening meal for 4 euros a day each which worked out to be good value bearing in mind the price of wine etc in hotel restaurants. The restaurant is very light and airey and is a buffet style lay out.  There was a huge choice of food which changed daily and which we found to be of a good standard.  Staff in the restaurant were very friendly and obliging and they were also very efficient at clearing the tables.  Drinks were also self service with a choice between red, rose and white wine and beer as well as water…

title: relax
review: Hi derek104,  Thank you so much for your kind words towards our restaurant staff, they do dedicate their hardest efforts to offer a pleasant experience in the area. It's wonderful to know you had a pleasant stay with us, and we'd be happier if we get to know that you'll visit us again someday. If you want to do it, don't forget to tell us ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel
review: hi if you plan to stay at this hotel then just remember if you don't like drinking from plastic glasses don't go. if you don't like relaxing don't go.  this hotel is a really nice place to stay, the staff are really nice, the cleaners do a great job,  people moaned about the glasses but its a safety issue so just be aware. this hotel is really for us older folk over 50 its not really for the younger adults.  I enjoyed my stay here for the week,  you can get out and about really easy. there is lidl , Burger King, Pizza Hut.  if you can go to the show a little costly but worth it. and make sure you are ready for the extra charge when you check in I think its about 24 euro a week per adult. don't believe any bad reviews

title: It was an ok holiday
review: Hi lupielou,  We're so grateful for your lovely comment. Thank you for appreciating our safety measure, we want nothing but to make our guests spend a safe and relaxing time in our hotel. Would you want to come to Alcudia and visit us again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A well run hotel and a relaxing break
review: It was a nice hotel, but no so special. The pool area was a little boring, the dining room was very cold and noisy. Within ten minutes you are on the beach. The nice old town is a 25 minutes walk. Overall it was a nice hotel to stay.

title: Bit of a disappointment ...
review: Friendly, hardworking staff, immaculately clean room with an enormous and very comfortable bed, beautiful Old Alcudia just ten minutes away in a 6 Euro taxi, and an easy seven minute walk to Alcudia's fabulous beach. Those are the good points!  We've stayed in many Spanish hotels and have always enjoyed the food offered in their buffet restaurants. But this was one was really, really disappointing. More in keeping with Heathrow Terminal One than a five star hotel - the orange juice (out of a machine) was appalling. After three nights, including one dinner in the a la carte restaurant, we ate out - and never went back. There are plenty of good restaurants nearby.   The poolside rooms are more expensive than street view but the evening entertainment, starting at 9pm and ending…

title: Chill holiday
review: Hello TheGandars,  It's been an honor to receive you in Alua Hotels, and we're satisfied to know you liked our staff's hard work to assist our guests and prepare activities for them. Regarding our food service, we regret it wasn't satisfying enough for you. Our restaurant staff really appreciates to know about our guests' opinions, so we will share your thoughts with them to guide them for nice improvements in the future.  We'd like to have the chance of seeing you again aind give you a better stay. If you'd like to give it to us, we'd be very grateful.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Superb Hotel
review: Have had a fabulous time at this hotel. The bed is the best I have slept in abroad, soòooo comfy.All staff were very friendle/helpful. Sylvia and Jacob were beautiful people. We got involved in most of the entertainment.Food was plentiful in choices and there was a microwave if you wanted it hotter. We certainly will be back

title: Very Well
review: Dear suedonkin69,  It's so pleasant to know our beds have been the best you've ever slept in abroad! It's our aim to provide a comfortable stay for all our guests :) Sylvia and Jacob will be so happy to hear your impressions, and for sure they'd love to see you again in Alua Hotels!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 5 day stay mid September
review: Just returned from a fab weeks holiday. Hotel Immaculate with very friendly and obliging staff. Lovely large room (330) overlooking swimming pool, just a little noise from extractor fan but couldn't hear at night in room when doors closed. Coffee and tea in room also fridge, and free safe. Very large comfortable bed, also pillow service (I changed mine as too soft). One criticism could have done with a shelf if bathroom for toiletries. Large TV with English channels. We stayed half board not a huge selection but was meals were good.  We had a drinks package for 4Euro each per day to use at evening meal to include all drinks which we found very good. The daily activity team were excellent, my favourite was the zumba aqua class. I would also recommend a massage with Mar she is…

title: Good stay in August/September
review: Friendly staff ,  very clean room with everything you would need including a massive comfortable bed. Food was pretty much what you expect at the price, reasonable choice and pretty varied although not always hot. All inclusive included some branded drinks like Smirnoff, Gordons and Bells which was good..  For me the most disappointing thing was that  there was only one bar in the hotel which was next to the pool resulting in all drinks being served in plastic tumblers, hard to enjoy a whisky out of a "beaker" !!  Not what you expect from 4*,    also forces you to be around the entertainment whether you wanted to be there or not.  Some of the acts were quite good but as they have a sound limiter you could hardly hear them.  To summarise I thought the hotel was good value and…

title: Lovely stay in September
review: Hi Relax303068,  It seems you truly enjoyed our beds! We're so glad thanks to them you had a lovely rest during your stay with us. Regarding the tumblers, they're plastic tumblers as a safety measure for our guests, to avoid any type of dangerous issues that can hurt them. However, we appreciate your opinion, and we will take it into account to continue improving our services  Thank you so much for choosing Alua Hotels. We hope that our improvements can be of your liking, as we'd like to have the pleasure of seeing you again.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good points and bad
review: First time in Mallorca.  The hotel is very nice, staff friendly, rooms clean, food is good. Entertainment is brilliant,every night we enjoy at quiz,bingo and games with Jacov. The beach is 5min walk from hotel, also a lot of nice bars and restaurants.  We will be returning next year but in August.  Greetings Jenny & Clark

title: Fab holiday at a fab hotel
review: Dear Jenny & Clark,  Thank you so much for choosing Alua Hotels for your first time in Mallorca! Did you enjoy your first trip to this lovely island? We're so pleased to know you had a good stay in our hotel while enjoying Mallorca :) Such great news to know you'll be back next year! Looking forward to welcome you again in Alua Hotels ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Brilliant holiday
review: The Good Stuff:  Good looking hotel. Great room on the top floor with a huge firm bed. Kettle, coffee machine, fridge, safe and nice size TV (with English channels). Balcony was big enough. Very clean. Friendly staff. A 10 minute walk from a busy but lovely sandy beach. Evening entertainment was better than your average TUI adults only.  The Bad stuff:  Reception are so slow it's painful. The chef must have lost his seasoning as the food was bland and that includes the poor selection of desserts. The pool was colder than the sea. The Zumba Aqua class music after 3pm every day was really, really loud.  We were half board (thank gawd), there is a Lidl just around the corner which was great for drinks etc. 2 x Sun loungers on the beach, with parasol is 6.50E for the day, pop down…

title: A wonderful break in Mallorca !
review: When I first went to the Hotel I was a bit wary but when I arrived there is was clean, and we were met and were given our room within a short while after having a glass of Cava.  Room - Our room was on the top floor and away from the pool area (we were happy to be away from any noise which may happen later in the evenings).  Our room was clean and it was far better than I thought it might be.    Food - You will never please everyone - but I found that the breakfasts were good and varied (the fruit juice was watered down too much).  Lunch and the evening meal were varied and the food was ok.  The hotel was full you had varied people to cater for from the Continent and also from the UK so there will be some items that you may not like but normally there is something there for you.…

title: Honest Review
review: Dear Brian,  Thank you so much for choosing Alua Hotels, we're grateful for the time you took to share this detailed review with us! Thank you so much for your kindness towards our staff members, they definitely feel happy to provide our guests all help and attention they need to enjoy the best possible experience in our hotel. Sylvia, Lucia and all of our staff have been so happy to see you and of course they'd be so happy if you visit us again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good but could be better
review: Be prepared. This is an honest review of the Aluasoul Hotel Alcudia Bay.  I have been home for 3 weeks collecting my thoughts about this hotel before submitting them to this site. To make it easier to read, I have listed the good points first and then the not so good points I feel need addressing.  Good Points: •	Modern hotel •	Very Clean •	Large bedrooms •	Adequate air conditioning •	Helpful and friendly reception •	Enough sun loungers for all •	Plenty of free soft drinks and beer •	Breakfast has the usual menu of fried or continental •	TUI Rep was helpful and friendly  Not so good: •	Hotel Evening entertainment is very poor •	Evening entertainment finishes at approx 11:00pm and bar closes at 11:30pm •	Evening entertainment is very quiet and is hard to hear •	Not enough tables…

title: Great location
review: Dear Rob,  Your review is very complete and useful, thank you so much for taking your time to write it. This way it's easier to study in which areas we've done a good work and in which of them we need to continue working hard to improve.   Regarding the H&S issue you've mentioned, our staff will be happy to help you regarding your suggestion, so thank you so much for contacting us. We regret thet your stay wasn't as pleasant as you expected. However, we'd love to have the chance of seeing you again, so this will encourage us to continue improving our hotel, so then we can get another opportunity.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great staff
review: Upon arrival at this hotel we were given a glass of Cava however we did have to wait around 30 mins even though there was only one other couple in front of us but receptionist was lovely and helpful and the area was nicely decorated and clean, also the best bit was the room key on the wrist band never seen before but it’s brilliant. The room was very nice, large comfy bed and bathroom with amazing large shower. Pool area was good with plenty of sun loungers and pool was nice (cold but once you got used to it it was fine). Food was okay plenty of choice but quite often cold which may be due to the very cold air con in the restaurant. Biggest let down was the entertainment always a singer except for one night out of 7 and none of them were particularly engaging except for Amelia…

title: Lovely hotel in a great location!
review: We stayed here for three nights recently. The room was beautiful with balcony and good views.We stayed half board but on the first night we decided to go out to a nearby bar and cafe for dinner as the food in the hotel wasnt to our liking.It was better on the second night, breakfast was good. A lovely hotel within walking distance of the port.

title: Aluasoul last minute burst of summer
review: Dear Diane,  We're glad to know our rooms have been of your liking! Since our guests wish to have a relaxing break with us, we put special emphasis on maintaining a good quality of design and comfort in our rooms. We regret our food service wasn't satisfying enough, however, we wish to work harder and better so our guests can enjoy the breakfast and all of our meals! If you wish to visit Mallorca again, feel free to come back to Alua Hotels, we'll be so happy to greet you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Very nice!
review: Very friendly,  spotlessly clean hotel. The staff were very welcoming and helpful. Food and drinks were great. very peaceful, relaxing hotel to stay in! Lovely pool area and restaurant. Perfect distance from Alcudia old town and in walking distance of the beach which proved to be very touristy.

title: Greate hotel
review: Dear amandatopmom,  Indeed, Alcudia is a very interesting spot from Mallorca, that's why we've chosen it as the location of our hotel. Did you enjoy the visit to the old town? That's wonderful! If you wish to visit Alcudia next summer or anytime, we'd love to greet you again at Alua Hotels!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: My wife and I chose this as it is an adults only hotel. Very clean hotel with lovely rooms and friendly staff. We were checked in quickly with a glass of cava and given our wrist bands which conveniently are the key to your room. The restaurant is well decorated and roomy and the food good albeit often repetitive but that has been our experience at most hotels. There is an alacarte restaurant also. It wasn’t packed so there were plenty of sun beds. The pool is very nice, not massive but IT IS COLD! 5 minute walk to the beach and port, 20 minute walk to the old town of Alcúdia.  Evening entertainment and the biggest plus... NO KIDS 😄

title: Fabulous Holiday
review: We just arrived home from a fabulous 14 night stay at your Hotel. We had a smooth check in with a glass of cava. We decided to upgrade to the 4 euro dinner drinks package which was well worth it. The room that we had was on the end of a corridor and was very spacious(third floor).I would like to thank all staff, day time entertainment was,I feel the best we have had. A mention for Jakov and Sylvie who didn't push you if you did not take part. We would like to thank tui rep Shaun who couldn't do enough to help. We would like to return again soon.

title: great day time entertainment
review: Dear David,  We're so glad to know our dinner drinks package was satisfying for you! We truly want our guests to enjoy a complete experience in our restaurant, so we're happy to know we're doing a successful work. Jakov, Sylvie and all our staff would love to greet you again! :)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Happy Holiday!
review: Great hotel and great staff. Very efficient check in process with a glass of Cava. Rooms were clean and adequate although not luxurious. Free safe and good selection of english television channels were a bonus. Hotel is about a 10 minute walk from beach across a main road.  Food was good and included a reasonable vegetarian selection although sometimes wasn't very hot - always warm - but this is now fairly standard for a buffet style service in Spain. All inclusive option covered a good range of snacks and a range of  "branded" spirits as well as local ones and there was a good range of cocktails. Bar and restaurant staff always had a smile and were very helpful.  Day time entertainment was, for us, the best we have had. Special mention to Jakov for dance classes, pilates/…

title: Aluasoul Hotel
review: Dear David,  It makes us so happy to know the day activities from our entertainment staff have been of your liking! We truly wish our guests to relax but also to spend a funny time with us. Jakov loves to prepare energetic and wonderful activities, so he'll be glad to hear about your impressions.  If you enjoyed your holidays with us, would you like to visit us again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A great adult hotel.
review: We booked this holiday at short notice and was looking for an adult only hotel. This hotel was lovely very modern, plenty of sun beds no need to get up at the crack of dawn, food and drink good all in all we had a fabulous time.

title: Nice hotel, great holiday
review: Nice, clean and good rooms, good beds. Good system with the bracelets for opening your room and charging any drinks. Breakfast and dinner buffets were very well organized and tasteful. Location was OK, close to the beach and public transport

title: Amazing holiday
review: Hi Remco!  Thank you so much for appreciating our wristband key! Indeed, our guests can easily access to their rooms, as it's also a useful indicator of the drinks' packages that our guests have ordered. Want to enjoy another wonderful holiday with our wonderful selection of food? You're always welcome at Alua Hotels :)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Honeymoon
review: Where to start... Hotel is lovely clean and fresh. Nice modern rooms with comfortable beds.  The front desk staff are very very helpful and professional.  Lots of choice at breakfast and dinner. The wine upgrade for 4 euros a real bargain.   We were in Majorca to cycle more that sit on the beach. The hotel is very cyclist friendly with a room to lock the bikes. Nice spa to relax and loosen up after hours in the saddle.  The whole experience topped of with a night in the a la carte restaurant. Fantastic service and a delicious steak.   Would stay again with no hesitation.

title: Great holiday,
review: Dear airfish1,  So, did you explore our location with your bike? That's wonderful! Alcudia is one of the most precious places in Mallorca and it's so easy to visit walking or going on bike. Whenever you need another relaxing break, don't hesitate to come back, we can't wait to see you again! :)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Ideal place to chill and relax
review: Stayed at AluaSoul for our honeymoon this August. We really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is in a good location within easy walking distance of the beach and main centre. Hotel is very clean and the staff are very polite and friendly.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Had a lovely four day stay after a week cruising. The reception staff were great, took a while to check in, but with a glass of champagne in hand who cares!! Neat wristband which acts as your doorkey and allows you to buy drinks etc depending on your board basis, we were half board, as after a week all inclusive on the ship we still wanted to fit into our clothes!! However for €4 you could upgrade to the drinks package for dinner, well worth it. The hotel is extremely clean and well maintained, very friendly staff and rooms cleaned daily, again to a very high standard. Always sunlounges available whatever time of day, full daily activities to keep you active if you want it with two lovely entertainment crew always willing to assist. Located just off the main road it's very…

title: Absolutely loved this place!
review: Wow Paul,  Thank you so much for such a lovely comment! It's a pleasure to work hard and then check our guests have enjoyed their stay with us :) Have you liked our wristsband key? It's a very comfortable tool right? As always, we want our customers to have a comfortable and relaxing holiday.  Will we get the opportunity of greeting you again in our hotel?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely
review: Couldn’t have been happier with Aluasol. The hotel was very modern, nicely air conditioned throughout (except in the hallways), the food was lovely and the staff were all very friendly and helpful. Upon arrival (at 4am) we were greeted with a glass of champagne and they had even laid food out for us in the restaurant. There was never a day that we couldn’t get a sun lounger, and the restaurant was never too busy either. Overall, I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice relaxing, child-free holiday.

title: Nice stay
review: Dear Joel,  It seems you loved the warm welcome we give you to our hotel. We loved to do it! :) And it's so satisfying to know your holidays were so pleasant and relaxing. We will continue working hard so our guests can always enjoy a lovely rest with us.  We'd love to see you again, Joel!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: * The Real Truth  *  #52
review: We stayed at this hotel as an add on from our cruise.... we were not disappointed... this chic hotel very modern clean and contemporary. Welcoming staff and a glass of champers on arrival what a start👍 our room was spacious with fridge minibar and safe large tv(if you wanted it) and the biggest bed ever We have a pool view room definitely worth going for that.... We were half board they upgraded us to All in drinks ether at lunch or dinner for €4 per person per day....it’s self serve if you do this so don’t sit like a lemon waiting for table services... The restaurant offered a selection of food for everyone.... themed nights including Asian, Mexican, English were fab...there’s salads a go go.... fish meat and always chips along with various pasta dishes all followed by a wide…

title: A visit
review: This hotel used to be our favourite hotel but made it Adults only so cannot go now until my granddaughter is 16 but called in to have a look while in Alcudia and it is still a lovely hotel and very modern now so I would recommend this hotel and location

title: One week
review: Dear Jacko,  It's such an honor for our hotel to be your favourite! Indeed, now our hotel offers a fantastic Adults only experience. We'll be happy to wait to see you coming with your granddaughter, but if you decide to visit us before, of course we'll give you a warm welcome!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: anniversary holiday
review: Okej hotel but not good service at dinner and you can not take even tap water if you dont pay extra.Rooms are not so big but they are okej. The cleaning service is very good.  At breakfast there was only ham /pork. No chicken or beef for those who do not reat ham.Bad service at dinner. Dinner is pertty blend and its only ok.
