title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Hi Himzonja,  It's so nice from you that you appreciate the work from our cleaning staff, as they really work hard to maintain the cleanliness from our rooms and all our facilities.  Regarding the water, our water is osmotized and treated in our hotel, since tap water from Mallorca can't be drunk. Our drinks service is available only in AI service or paying for the drinks package for dinner.   Regarding the food, we also have turkey, vegetable cold cuts and chicken cold cuts. However, we appreciate your comment and we will share your impressions with our restaurant staff.  Thank you for choosing Alua Hotels. We'd love to be fortunate to be chosen again for your next holidays.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fantastic hotel
review: check in was very quick & easy, room was lovely with comfortable bed,lacked storage but not end of the world..air con wasn't the best we have had,had a top floor room &  payed & upgraded but wouldn't bother again as didn't feel it was worth the money..had peaceful nights sleep for the 7 days we were there,hotel is situated in a built up residential area so while laying around pool traffic & dogs barking can be heard which is a shame,...food was ok but husband struggled but he is a fussy eater so did go out & eat a few times..the hotel really lacks a indoor air conditioned entertainment area,we feel that real let the hotel down.. having to sit outside at night in the outside bar area wasn't for us so didn't stay in hotel in the evening which was a shame!! would we return again…

title: Wonderful staff
review: Spent a week at the hotel and it was thoroughly relaxing. Beds were incredibly comfortable although the air conditioning fan was really rather noisy.  The staff are what set this place apart. Everyone we encountered smiled, chatted and always, always seemed genuinely pleased to be there.  The work rate of everyone was 100% and they are what make the hotel. Sylvia and Jakov are brilliant and work so hard. Jakov's aqua zumba is a treat, he's so funny and puts so much effort in.  The one thing that loses a star for me is the food. I was really, really pleased to see a vegetarian corner at the end of the buffet. However: some days the food was a bit strange. There was a Mexican evening and no protein food for vegetarians (not even a bean chilli) - we ended up eating cheese with…

title: Very good for half-pension
review: Hi giraffeonastick,  Your holidays have been truly relaxing, right? That’s fantastic! It’s so nice from you to say such lovely words about our staff members. They work really hard to provide a helpful and friendly service to all our guests. So do Sylvia and Jakov, and they will be so happy to hear your impressions!   Regarding the food, thank you for sharing your opinion about vegetarian and vegan food. We will take note of this as we wish to give a wide selection of food with options for all our guests. And also because we wish to see you again in the future. ;)   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A lovely place
review: Very friendly, clean room, everything you wish for if you don't stay at the hotel all day.  It is a good idea that you can't reserve a pool bed with towels. It is very calm because itis adults only, the animation at night is o.k.

title: A nice vacantion
review: Hi kderycke, thank you for appreciating our policy for the pool area! We want our guests to have a pleasant rest in our sunbeds and this is why we control sunbeds can be available anytime. Would you want to enjoy another relaxing holiday with us? ;)   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel
review: It was a lovely hotel, the staff were fab, very polite, hardworking and helpful, however I didn’t find there was much entertain catered for younger adults like myself and my husband as we are only in our late 20s. We did enjoy overall, possibly pay another visit

title: Great hotel
review: Here now. Fab hotel. Brilliant food. Brilliant activities through the day from Silvie and Jakov - they are super and excellent at making you feel part of the hotel community. Room is probably best I’ve had overseas. Stunning bedroom including the biggest bed I’ve ever slept in. Immaculately clean everywhere.  The one downside is the sound limiter at night time. All singers were restricted and nobody could hear what they were saying or singing. Spoils a brilliant hotel.

title: Great hotel
review: Wow Mark,  It's truly an honor to know our rooms are the best you've been in during your overseas holidays! Regarding the sound limiter, thank you for sharing your thought with us, we will search for solutions as we wish our guests to enjoy our fantastic activities and performances during the evening.  Silvia and Jakov wish to continue preparing lots of entertaining activities for you! ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Friendly and clean BUT??
review: Loved the room, clean, modern and great wifi and aircon. Brilliant check in on arrival, bubbly and the receptionist was really informative. The pool was a little cold and sometimes struggled to get 2 sunbeds together. When initially dropped off, seemed slightly concerned by the location however once you get youre bearings you find there is plenty around. Great stay

title: Overall great
review: Hi Kim  We're so happy to know your stay in our hotel has been so great! The objective from the reception staff is to give helpful information and a nice attention to all our guests, so they'll be happy to know you're happy with their service!  Would you want to visit us again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fantastic!
review: Very pleasant and in quite a good location. Hotel is quite small and some of the rooms have an ugly view unless you upgrade to pool view. A La Carte restaurant has fixed menu with no choice and tiny portions. There is no bar other than the pool bar so get used to having all drinks in scratched plastic tumblers.  Sorry to sound negative, but we did enjoy our stay despite the cocktails in beakers with no fruit or embellishments.

title: Great adults only hotel
review: We stayed for 1 week in this adults only hotel. From the moment we checked in it was great. Fantastic, friendly staff and very helpful and this includes all staff in the hotel. Lovely modern decor and meticulously clean. Food on offer was fab and very tasty. A Large Carte restaurant was beautiful and service was really good. I really can't fault this hotel, if I was to find fault with anything it would have to be the evening entertainment! Music was not good at all and their sound was very poor but I do realise that was probably because the hotel is located in a residential area . All in all we had a great holiday and I would definitely visit this hotel again!

title: Brilliant!
review: Hi Deborah,  It's so satisfying to know you had a fantastic holiday in our hotel! This encourages us to continue working well, as also we take your comment into account to improve our entertainment service.   We would love to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Staff make the place
review: Myself and my gran spent a week at this hotel, and love every minute of it. Your close by shops incase you fancy a little treat. The hotel itself was brilliant! The staff are kind and so welcoming! The rooms are spacious and clean, maids came in and cleaned it everyday unless you didn’t want it to be. Not that it was used that much, but the WiFi worked perfectly, didn’t have any problems with it. The food was perfect, there was always something different to try, every night. Some nights they had themed types of food, I.e Mexican etc. We had a ‘night out’ one night to ‘Son Amar’, it was a dinner show, didn’t really think I’d like it, wasn’t my type of thing, but it was absolutely AMAZING! If anyone gets the opportunity to go see it, GO! It’s definitely worth the money! The…

title: Great 👍 relaxing holiday
review: Dear Charlotte,  Thank you so much for your lovely review! We're so glad to know you enjoyed our services, especially the food from our restaurant. We prepare themed nights so our guests can taste different flavors from all around the world, so it's great our decision to prepare these special nights is successful!   Don't be sad to be back home, because you're always welcome in our hotel whenever you decide to visit us again! ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Can’t fault this hotel
review: Great hotel for couples and adults without children running around. Staff were fantastic with the events pair especially working very hard to get everyone involved who wanted to be, loved aquarobics and aquazumba! Good variety of food on all inclusive and restaurant staff also very attentive and pleasant.  Reception, Lutz was great and helped with local knowledge. A wonderful calming place to stay and will return if we come back to Mallorca.

title: Stay part of holiday
review: Lovely   Clean and fresh hotel, staff plentiful and helpful, beds are very comfortable. The bathroom clean and shower very good. Food is plentiful and hot. The pool and bar area very clean .overall the hotel os great.

title: excellent
review: Hi Amanda,  It's so satisfying to us you have enjoyed many of our services! We're grateful to you for thinking our staff is helpful, as it's our aim to give a helpful and nice attention to all our guests. We will continue working this way and even better. Would you want to visit us again in the future? ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Duncan Fox
review: Excellent hotel, service and meals. No problems and complaints. Rooms are in good condition, they are  cleaned every day. Peaceful place with good atmosphere, children are not accepted, which was possible to get relax and have a rest from everyday problems.

title: Great hotel
review: Hi Kamila,  Indeed, our Adults Only service puts special emphasis on giving a comfortable and relaxing experience to our guests, so it's great to see we did achieve this goal during your holidays with us! If you ever need to disconnect from the daily routine again, we will always be happy to welcome you again.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely holiday
review: My wife and I did a 7 day cruise with a 4 day stay at this hotel. When we arrived at the hotel it took 40 minutes for the two ladies on reception to book us in.  The hotel was clean, the room was clean, the balcony was ok, although the balcony walls were a bit too high,the food in the buffet restaurant was always coldish, the staff were pleasant enough, apart from the stuck up zumba/aerobics tutor, towels were changed daily, but the thing that really annoyed me, was that we had paid £2366 for our cruise n stay with what I thought was a full drinks package onboard and at the hotel with half board food at the hotel. We were accosted by a non english speaking waitress because I had poured 2 orange juices to accompany our dinner but we had the wrong coloured wrist band that allowed…

title: Enjoyable relaxing holiday!
review: We stayed here for 14 nights all inclusive.  Everything about the hotel was lovely.  The rooms are an adequate size and you can fit all of your clothes and toiletries into the storage available. The bed was amazing! We were very grateful for the fresh bottle of water every day and the fridge was a great addition to the room. Food was good with the usual all inclusive buffet variety, all cooked and prepared well. There were different themed evenings that were a nice change. Drinks were good with a vast selection. The sangria was particularly good (made by Martin. He is a very happy welcoming chap.)  The daytime entertainment was adequate but it would be nice if silvi and jakov joined forces for a bit more fun/ team activities... a ping pong championship, water volleyball...??…

title: Highly recommended hotel!
review: Hi Gillian,  It's pleasant to us to know you had such a fantastic holiday in our hotel. Did you enjoy your sleeping time in our beds? That's wonderful! We love to take care of our guests' comfort. Our staff member Martin appreciates your kindness towards him, and Silvi and Jakov will take note of your ideas to prepare even funnier activities! Of course they'd love to do them with you so, will you visit us again? ;)  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel, excellent people
review: We've spent one week in AluaSoul, together with my wife.  - good location, close to the beach, shops, bus station - clean, nice rooms - very good food, lots to choose from, everything fresh and tasty, there was many meals, there were snacks in between, and even some fruit or smoothies brought to us straight to the swimming pool area. All inclusive highly recommended! - the staff was very friendly, welcoming, helpful and hard-working. The staff in this hotel surely is one of the best things about it. Thanks Jakov and Silvie! :) - the hand bands that are used for door opening and paying are a huge plus- you don't have to worry about carrying around a key or a wallet.  All in all- highly recommended! Thanks AluaSoul!

title: Great break
review: Hi Patryk, it's been a pleasure to receive both your wife and you in our hotel! We're so thankful for your comments but especially the one about our staff members, Jakov and Silvie will love to know about you! Our entire staff is looking forward to welcome you again in our hotel so... will we have the chance?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A Wonderful Holiday
review: The rooms are clean, simple and functional. The hotel looks great. The location is good too- it takes 5 minutes on foot to get to the beach.  The food was delicious and there was lots of it. Every day different things, both standard stuff for everyone, and exotic items for those who want to try something else.   But what really made our stay wonderful- were the people. Starting from nice cleaning staff, through polite, happy and helpful staff in the restaurant, pool and bar, ending on the best entertainers ever- Jakov and Silvie! The activities that they have organized were very interesting and fun- both sports and dancing- aqua zumba for the win!   Thank you for a great experience.

title: Aluasoul alcudia bay.
review: Returned again to the aluasoul alcudia bay. This hotel is fabulous. Spotlessly clean. Staff are all very friendly and helpful. The beds are very comfortable. Stayed on a bed and breakfast basis and the breakfasts really are something special. Plenty of sunbeds available. Needless to say I shall be returning again,

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Chris,   We appreciate your lovely review so much! It's so great our efforts for giving you a fantastic holiday were successful. We can't wait to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Return visit
review: What a lovely hotel so clean and the staff are really pleasant the rooms lack a little storage space but it’s not really a problem the food was of a good standard perhaps they could work on serving it a little hotter but the selection is very good the evening entertainment is perhaps a little repetitive and would benefit from different acts but if you want a relaxing evening then it ticks the box the location isn’t great but it’s only a 15 Min wall to the beach a visit to the old town is recommended it’s truly beautiful

title: Overall not great value for money spent
review: Hello Spenna,  We're very happy to read your words. We'll take in mind hotter food! And also less repetitive entertainment. So nice you liked the baches and our services! So great your stay was comfortable ;)  Don't doubt to come back Spenna, we'll be waiting for you. Thanks for leaving your opinion.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great child free hotel in good location!
review: I’m writing this review on behalf of myself, hubby, Mum, sister and brother-in-law.  We stayed from 10-20 July and booked independently (flights with EasyJet from Southend Airport - brilliant). We had requested the same rooms as we had last year mainly so that my 86 year old Mum would feel at home. Kati on reception carried out our request and instantly recognised us on arrival at which time we were given a refreshing glass of Cava while going through the checking in procedure which was quick and painless. As last year, the rooms were great - clean, fresh and what can I say about the bed - enormous! We had a small problem with the air conditioning which was fixed within a couple of hours. The free safe gives you piece of mind and a great idea having a plug socket inside to…

title: Relaxing break
review: Arrived July 9th check in was good lady on reception was pleasant and efficient.we had 2 to rooms although not tougher we were on the same floor, rooms clean,water left most days in room, tea and coffee in rooms. Pool area was good. Always got a bed around pool area, food was good. Only one bar but seemed to cope with everyone. Safe in room was free,WiFi was good got it in room and around the pool. Beds were comfortable. Entertainment was ok loved the blues brothers. Some of the older staff around bar not so pleasant mainly one women was a bit off. But all other staff were pleasant. Entertainment team there were two. Activities were good was something to do if you wanted. They didn’t push you. Male one was we thought was quite rude on occasions made me feel uncomfortable at…

title: Good break
review: Dear KarenEdm0nds,  It’s so satisfying to know you enjoyed your stay in our hotel! Our staff works hard to maintain the comfort and cleanliness in our hotel, including the rooms, where also beds provide a pleasant experience to our guests.  Regarding your comment, we regret if any of our employees sounded rude for you. Our staff is one of our greatest assets and their service is one of the most appreciated things in our hotel. If you felt our staff members were rude might be due to some communication error or a misunderstanding because of the language.  Our staff would be so happy to give you another holiday in our hotel, so if you decide to do it, don’t forget to tell us!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Hotel a little souless
review: Hotel staff very welcoming. Food excellent plenty choice. Location ideal for touring other local areas we went on bus only 1.45 euros to either Pollensa or can pic a fort. Would stay again. Old town worth a look very quaint and traditional.

title: Comfortable Hotel
review: Hi!  Thanks for your comment. Pollensa is such a beautiful town, and the old town looks incredible! We also love it ;) We're very greateful you liked your stay. Next time we'll do everything in our hands to get you the best experience!  Thanks for your consider.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Hotel
review: After a week's cruising we were looking forward to our stay in Alcudia.  Think we were spoilt on the cruise as our expectations were high and we found it lacking in some areas but on the whole a comfortable stay.  Shaun, our Tui rep was great and even booked a lovely restaurant for us in the old town (Satyricon). He told us that if we saved our taxi receipt we could claim it off our restaurant bill and also gave us a voucher for a free glass of wine each (which we forgot to claim!)  Martiniano at the pool bar was always happy and efficient and Lutz on reception was good fun and very helpful. Positives:  Plenty of sunbeds, spotlessly clean, good location, food and drink on the whole good (we were all inclusive) but sometimes could be hotter, entertainment good (what we saw as we…

title: Hotel stay after cruise
review: Very nice hotel although I think standards had slipped slightly meals were good and varied selection for breakfast and evening meals but all the hot food could have been hotter,room was nice but lacked storage after being on the cruise we had quite a bit of luggage. The night we had in the alacarte restaurant was lovely which was free staff were very good.

title: lovely hotel
review: Hello Sheena!  Thanks for your consider. We hope you had a good time with us, as we did with you. We're happy you liked atacarte restaurant! Don't doubt the next time you come you'll get your meals much hotter! As you wish! We want to provide the best experience, so you'll change that 4 to a 5!  Thanks Sheena for trusting us!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Wonderful holiday
review: Lovely adults only hotel, rooms very spacious and clean, our room had pool view which was ideal.  The food was very nice with plenty of choice.  Ideal hotel for relaxing and chilling.  Entertainment in the evenings was good and you could join in with the daytime activities if you wished ie riffle shooting, archery, aqua zumba  beach only 15 min walk amd the old town 30 min walk,  would definately recommend

title: Don't expect a quiet hotel.
review: Hello Sharman!  Thank you so much for rating us with a 5! That means a lot to us and helps us to improve and keep going forward! We're happy you had a great time and made use of our activities ;)   Will you be visiting us again? We wish so.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Excellent hotel! Highly recommend it!
review: Arriving early hours of the morning we were welcomed by receptionist Bill who was very polite and welcoming We were offered a cold buffet even at that time.went to our rooms which was a nice surprise,veery clean and airy.we found the food was very good and plenty of choice much so we upgraded to all inclusive which was well worth it.plentyof entertainment around the pool if you wanted to participate.Evening entertainment was every night and very good.Cant find anything negative to say about this hotel, will certainly be visiting again.

title: Wonderful week
review: I stayed for one week with my family and we had a fantastic time. The hotel was exactly as described. We had one superior room and one twin room both with pool view. Facilities in room were great, storage is limited but perfectly adequate. We were all inclusive and found choice of food to be great with various themed evenings. When restaurant was closed plenty of snacks available to help yourself to at the pool bar. Plenty of sun chairs available and a lovely pool to swim in. Pool area, hotel and rooms all kept extremely clean. Entertainment team were brilliant and a huge thank you to Jackov and Sylvie for all their hard work. We loved the daytime activities and the evening entertainment. All the staff were brilliant. I would definitely recommend this hotel. It is in a brilliant…

title: Great food and better service
review: Hi Sonia it's been a pleasure to receive your family in our hotel. Thank you for appreciating the services from Jackov and Sylvie, their aim is to give you an entertaining stay with us so they're happy to see it's been a successful work with you. Would you want to repeat the experience again?  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Sad to see this hotel isn’t what it says on the (tin) brochure
review: My husband and I visited this hotel in June and we can not be happier with our choice. Newly renovated, the hotel is perfect for a quiet holiday as a couple. The food was tasty and with lots of variety. I honestly don't understand the bad reviews given by others. We will definitely go back.

title: Lovely holiday
review: Wow Sarah, thank you so much for your trust in us! We thank you for appreciating the changes we've made in our hotel, we always look for improvements in our services. We can't wait to welcome you again in our hotel!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: excellent hotel for a relaxing holiday
review: This hotel was part of a cruise and stay my husband and I treated ourselves to, to celebrate our ruby wedding.  The cruise part in the first week was wonderful but it was kind of going from 5* down to a 3* coming to this hotel.  If fact, we had been to this hotel 18 years ago, as a family and we remembered it with fond affection.  How much it has changed.  I think the worst noticeable difference is the staff.  The difference between the professional, friendly and efficient staff on the cruise has been replaced by people who seem not to care whether we have an enjoyable holiday or not.  Ok, maybe the cruise staff were exceptional.  But taking the staff aside, there are many more annoying and irritating areas where this hotel falls flat.    First, and possibly worst of all... this…

title: Very decent all inclusive
review: Went with my sister to this adult only hotel, keeping it short and sweet, all aspects of hotel high standard, food very good & drinks selection, wine really nice, very clean hotel, rooms very comfortable beds excellent, superb shower, evening entertainment very good, Lupe went out of her way to help with whatever she could, very entertaining chap doing water Zumba etc, dance class& walked us to local market & so polite & helpful a credit to the hotel hotel in walking distance to beach etc, nice welcome on arrival & chilled glass presecco , points to address (our view) pool to cold, I mean really cold, puts a lot off getting in, legs numb when getting out 🤔 not enough storage in room for cosmetics etc & drawers for small items of clothing would I go again & recommend to friends…

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: Dear Wanda,  Such a lovely review from our hotel, thank you so much! We're so happy to know your sister and you had a pleasant experience in our hotel, especially that you could enjoy the walk to the beach. Such a beautiful view, right? We would be happy to welcome your friends, and welcome you again too, of course!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing and enjoyable. Great adults only hotel
review: Booked hotel for a birthday treat for my wife and I had my reservations before we left because of some bad reviews, on our arrival at the hotel I was apprehensive as to what we might find, didn’t have to worry about anything!! From the moment we checked in we felt relaxed and welcomed,the lady on reception was lovely and that set the tone for the rest of our stay, recently renovated the hotel is bright and modern,room is lovely and bright not great storage space but I think it’s that we are used to plenty drawer space and are not used to things being on display this is not a criticism but an observation, staff warm friendly and helpful, food was good and plenty of choices, pool area is large with plenty of loungers and umbrellas, entertainment staff excellent and work tirelessly…

title: Excellent ,friendly and beautiful hotel
review: Dear customer,  We're so happy to know your expectations from our hotel have been fulfilled! We appreciate your comments so much, especially it makes us happy to know the birthday treat was successful, we hope you both had lots of fun celebrating her birthday. Thank you so much for your comments, and we will continue giving our best efforts to give a wonderful experience to our guests.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Room for improvement but not much
review: Stayed here for two weeks as All Inclusive. Check in was a breeze and you are given a glass of bubbly or lemon water as welcome. Check in staff were very pleasant and efficient. Highlight for us, is that the wrist band is the key to your room. Bonus!!!  We booked into the spa for a treatment. The spa area is very clean and has a steam room, sauna and jacuzzi. Rooms are provided with robes and slippers for use here while you stay. Rooms are clean and modern decor. Shower facility only in bathroom, which I love, but is not for all. There is a safe in the room, free of charge. A small fridge, kettle with tea/coffee etc.. You are provided with water.  We had a poolside room, which has the sun till late in the night.  Not ideal for early sleepers as the evening entertainment is held…

title: Relaxing stay
review: Stayed here 6/6-20/6. was just what we wanted from our holiday. Relaxation, good food, great weather. Staff were friendly and helpful. I was in my wheelchair but felt welcomed. The hotel is equipped with 2 lifts and a great disabled toilet near reception. We stayed in a superior room but were offered an adapted room which we declined as I could manage as long as there were lifts available and I didn't have to climb stairs etc. I took a portable grab rail to help me in the shower.  The food was excellent, buffet style. Heaps of choice. Only minor niggles, better shower door/curtain required to stop flooding the floor, sunbed cushions required, storage space tight for 2 weeks. That in no way spoilt our holiday. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Thank you.

title: My husband and I stayed here after having a week cruising.
review: Dear customer,  We're happy to know you felt welcome and comfortable in our hotel. We've put special emphasis on the access to disabled people as our aim is to dedicate our best efforts to please all our customers. We're glad to know you had a pleasant stay and we would love to welcome you again in Alua Hotels.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Truly brilliant relaxing holiday
review: We were loking for an an adults only, all inclusive so we could just chill out and relax.  The Aluasoul was perfect for us as a couple. The hotel is spotlessly clean, the food was excellent and lots of variety. Great shows on almost every night too.We couldn't fault anything!

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Dear customer,  Thank you for trusting Alua Hotels, we're glad to know you enjoyed our adults only services! We will continue looking for improvements so our customers experience can be even quieter, as we will also continue developing more options of food in our restaurant. We would loveto see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: A first class hotel without the hsassle of children
review: My wife and I have just returned from an eleven night stay at this hotel.On checking in with a lovely lady called Kati we decided to upgrade to all inclusive.What a brilliant decision because the food was great with a very good variety and a good range of drinks to pick from.The hotel and rooms are kept immaculate and in over 4 decades of going abroad we have NEVER encountered spare sun beds all day long.All the staff we met always had a smile and time for us.This holiday was booked only 5 weeks ago due to circumstances at home and we couldn't go to where we wanted to go originally.This hotel was recommended by a Tui shop .My wife and are so pleased our original choice was fully booked because we have both had one of the best holidays abroad we have ever had.Please note these…

title: beautiful break
review: excellent check in experience, bright and spotless room and indeed the whole hotel Excellent location, everything with in walking distance faultless breakfast, dinner could have been a bit hotter, but good variety with excellent service great value for money and would definitely return

title: Brilliant holiday
review: Dear Conor,  Thank you so much for your high rating! We're glad to know you enjoyed our rooms services and that you found our location pleasant. We're also happy to know you liked our wide variety of food. Regarding your opinion, we regret the inconveniences. We will make sure that the food is always well prepared so our customers can taste a wonderful meal in any moment of the day.  We would love to meet you again in Alua Hotels!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: R Lloyd
review: Just returned from a brilliant week at this hotel. staff are friendly and very hard working, reception are so helpful with any questions, food is a very good standard (and hot if you don't wander about with it in your hands). Thomson rep on hand every day. You don't have to be out of your room until 12 on your last day which is good if your flight is later in the day. The beach is a short walk but well worth it as it is beautiful. Lots of shops and bars close by. A special mention goes to Jakov and Silvie as they were brilliant with the daily entertainment they work very hard and are always happy, smiling and funny. We met some lovely people and fond memories. Would definitely go back.

title: excellent hotel
review: Dear customer,  Thank you for choosing Alua Hotels for your holidays! We appreciate your high rating so much.  We're glad to know you enjoyed the services from our staff, and we appreciate your impressions about our reception team and our entertainment team members Jakov and Silvie, we will make them know about your experience.   We're glad to know the food service has been pleasant as also the different spots of the location. It's great you were able to meet lovely people, and you're always welcome to continue sharing experiences with more guests in Alua Hotels.  Thank you for trusting Alua Hotels!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Very nice hotel
review: We found this hotel to be very good, all of the staff were exceptionally helpful. The food choice in the buffet restaurant both for breakfast and dinner was quite amazing. One night we dined in the a la carte restaurant , anyone staying there should really try this, 5 courses of first class food and superior service. For this class of hotel we found the drink prices very reasonable, a glass of wine for instance was €2.70. Plenty of sunbeds, no need for anyone to get up early as there were still beds available at 3pm. One small niggle was the lack of drawers (1) in the bedroom but overall great venue.

title: Great base
review: Newly refurbished hotel, everything very clean and modern. We were half board and couldn’t fault the food. We had a huge room at the end of a corridor- more like a suite! Huge bed and very comfortable. Huge tv too! Great base for exploring, five minutes walk to the beach front, lovely walk along to the port. Fab bars and live acoustic music at the port. Old town is definitely a must visit- so pretty. Puerto Pollensa is easily reached by bus, also worth a visit.

title: A lovely hotel
review: Dear customer,   We would like to express our gratitude and thank you for taking your time in writing your experience at our hotel. We hope you had a nice holiday and enjoyed your stay with us.   We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Amazing 4 days!
review: My daughter and I stayed for a week from 2/6-9/6/18.  The check-in process with Mary-Anne was very efficient-quick and hassle free with everything clearly explained.  All the reception staff are excellent-very helpful and knowledgable.    This is one of the cleanest hotels I have ever stayed in -the pool area is washed down daily, the rooms are kept very clean.    It is a little way away from the beach -approx 7-10 mins walk but we actually preferred this and felt the hotel was in the perfect location.    My daughter is a vegetarian and loved the selection of salads and vegetables that were always available.  The food at the buffet was replenished regularly and was in my opinion good.   The evening entertainment was held outside and was of a good standard and very enjoyable with…

title: Cracking Hotel and Staff
review: Dear Caroline,  it's lovely to hear about your stay with us! We hope you had an amazing time and thank you for your trust in us. We are glad to know you had a nice stay and enjoyed your holidays in Mallorca.  We appreciate your recommendation towards us and are glad to know you enjoyed the location.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: after cruise holiday
review: The hotel is new and very nice, the rooms are fantastic. Very nicely decorated. By the sea you have to walk 10 minutes of easy walks. The food is good although the offer should be strengthened.  The staff is kind and special thanks go to reception Kati and Jakov fitness trainer. He helped me solve the problem with the spine with professional yoga and pilates exercises. Entertainment is varied.You can find a lot sport and fitness activities. Night entertainment is lovely...a lot of live music and good preshows.We especially liked Sangria school and Paella. Pool was pretty cold so we went every day on the beach. Spa Zone is also nice. You can join at sauna, gym and jacuzzi.  See you at October.  Greetings.  Megan & Travis

title: Lovely Holiday
review: Just returned from a week here. A nice hotel. Rooms spotless, cleaned everyday, clean towels everyday.  Staff were friendly and efficient, especially the bar staff. Entertainment in the evenings not bad, mostly music shows, ie Abba tribute, Rod Stewart tribute etc. Excellent Flaminco dancers on our last night and the guy playing the guitar was fab.  Things to do in the day such as Rifle, Pistol shooting, Archery, Shuffle  Board, Aqua Zumba etc. Jakov and Silvie worked very hard to keep guests entertained.  Pool area was spotless everyday. Pool area was hosed down every morning if there were any issues then the maintenance guys were all over it.  Pool was freezing cold though. Restaurant was very clean, food we thought was very good. Lots of choice, salads, fresh fruit always…

title: Chris
review: Dear customer,  it's lovely to hear about your holidays with us! We're very glad to know you enjoyed your holidays with us and had such a nice time.   Thank you for your kind words towards us and our service, we work to ensure our customers have the best possible stay.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Adults only
review: The hotel was very good , plenty of sun beds at any time of day , the hotel was very clean our room over looked the pool which was nice , we had a super king double bed which was great. The food was just ok reasonable choice problem was most of it was luke warm , we were all inclusive and if you missed breakfast there was nothing till lunch except some cakes in a small fridge ; if you missed lunch they put out like warm burgers and chips , so they could improve on the food side as it wasn't great but just ok. Staff were friendly location was ok about 15 minutes walk from large beach and another 5 minutes to the harbour which was a nice place. Would i go again properly not . But its ok for a one time holiday.

title: relaxing stay
review: Dear Chris,  Thank you for your comment and for choosing us for your holidays! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff took good care of you.   We will take into account your suggestion regarding the improvements with the food.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 3 Star hotel masquerading as a 4 star
review: We stayed  here for a week in June. The hotel is modern with clean lines and design. The staff were pleasant and helpful at all times. Our room was very nice. The bed was huge and very comfortable.  We had tea and coffee making facilities ( including a nespresso machine). Our room overlooked the pool and we enjoyed sunshine through the afternoon into the evening. Our view was over the mountains which we enjoyed. The only downside was that the evening entertainment was outside by the pool. Not so good if you wanted an early night! There was a Lidl shop nearby which was very convenient and the beach was just a short walk away. We would recommend this hotel to others and would definitely visit again.

title: Fabulous holiday
review: Lovely hotel with fabulous, friendly and highly competent staff. Beach five minutes walk away and main strip 5/10 minutes walk. All within easy reach but not too close for comfort. In house entertainment was impressive. Ideal holiday for couples thogh younger couples may feel slightly put off as age group was mostly over 50.

title: Quiet and relaxing stay
review: Dear Fran,  We are delighted to know about your holidays with us! It's a pleasure to know you enjoyed your stay with us and had such a nice holiday. Thank you for your trust in our hotels and for your kind words towards our service. We work to guarantee our clients' satisfaction on their holidays.  Once again, thank you for choosing us, we hope to see you back again soon. Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Great location
review: Our stay at AluaSoul Hotel was great! The atmosphere is relaxing and calm, with great food, a beautiful pool, and a really clean and inviting interior! Our suite was a great size with a large bed and nice balcony to sit out on. We loved going down to the outside pool bar in the evenings for drinks and the nightly entertainment which ranged from impersonators, musicians, and games. The pool was freezing cold in May when we were there though!! About a 10 minute walk to the beach/shops/restaurants its a great location and we loved walking around to see the town. Highly recommend hiring a car in Mallorca, as we also found it very easy to park very close to the hotel. Beautiful place to stay and have a holiday!

title: Could not find fault !
review: Dear Olivia,  Thank you very much for your review! We're very glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us and had a nice holiday in Mallorca.   Thank you for recommending our hotel and for choosing us for your holidays, we appreciate your trust and we will be pleased to see you once again in the future!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Good Hotel
review: Very welcoming hotel. All the staff friendly and helpful. Spotlessly clean. Good location nice and quiet but minutes from bars and restaurants. Nice flat walk to the beach . To walk into town you can walk on the seafront or the road with lots of shops. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Very relaxing time
review: We stayed here in May and found it relaxing and it was nice to know you not got to get up early for your sun bed,  the food was good , also British tv so that was nice if u needed to chill in your room , staff was very friendly and helpful would recommend

title: Great holiday at a great hotel..
review: Dear Wayne,  It's lovely to hear about your holiday with us! Thank you very much for your review and for your kind words towards our colleagues. At Alua we work to ensure our customers have the best possible stay they can.   Once again we thank you for your recommendation and your trust in our hotels.   We hope to greet you back very soon! Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Good central location in Alcudia
review: Excellent stay well recommended. Service, rooms, food and staff all great. Entertainment every night, something for all tastes. Location perfect for the beach, shops etc walking distance to all. Recommend Old Town Alcudia especially market days. Will definitely be back and looking forward to our next stay.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear customer,  It makes us very happy to know you enjoyed your time with us, thank you very much for your review and for sharing with us your time with us!   We're glad to know you enjoyed the entertainment and found the location of your liking.  We hope to greet you back very soon! Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Great last minute break
review: Lovely hotel. Good Location within easy walking distance of the main town. Nice and clean. Food could be a bit more adventurous and at times was not overly hot but otherwise fine. Entertainment was adequate. Good clean pool area with lots of sunbeds. We enjoyed our stay and would consider returning.

title: spotless
review: nice quiet area, rooms very clean c,leaned every day and fresh towels every day. staff very friendly and helpful. only real downside was only one bar and that was the pool bar.Entertainment was by the pool bar and although some nights were good others were dire.Only 10 mins walk or so into ALCUDIA itself so no real problem. Buses very regular into both Alcudia and Puerta Pollensa

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Dear Anne,   thank you very much for your review and for letting us know how your stay went with us, which we are glad to read was great!   We thank you for your kind words towards our colleagues, we will let them know about your thoughts, we're sure they will be more than pleased to hear this. We will take into account your comment regarding the possible improvements at the pool area.  Once again, we thank you for your review and we hope to welcome you back again in the future.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: late booking
review: Stayed at the Aluasoul for 4 nights after a tui cruise. On arrival we were given a glass of fizz and a warm welcome.  The hotel had been refurbished to a good standard all white with lots of nice lighting.  The room was a good size with a large bathroom and shower, there is not a lot of storage but ok for a week or less, there was a fridge and a free safe 😊. The hotel is in a very good location with plenty of pedestrian crossings, close to the beach, Marina, bars, restaurants and the old town (approx 20 minutes walk) which has a large market on Sunday and Tuesday.  As other reviewers have mentioned the bar area is very small and can get very busy at times. They have entertainment every evening and whilst we were there the two guys in the suits that sang (can't remember their…

title: Excellent Holiday
review: Dear Susan,   How lovely is it to hear about your holidays with us! Thank you for your review and for your recommendation, we appreciate you taking the time in writing your experience at our hotels. We hope you enjoyed your stay and had a nice holiday.   Also, thank you for your kind words towards our hotel and colleagues, we will let our team know about your appretiation towards them.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: very average
review: Only booked two weeks before departure due to special offer when in travel agents.We had a nice relaxing week away with no complaints for price paid.Hotel is clean rooms are nice size air con can be noisy hotel staff helpful especially at reception.Cant put finger on it but for some reason just lacks wow factor which sounds a bit harsh on everyone at hotel doing their best to make you comfortable during your stay.Arrived home today feeling refreshed and relaxed but not rushing to want to go back if that makes sense Sorry!!!!

title: Disappointed and not all inclusive
review: I have never felt the need to write a review on trip advisor but I feel the need to inform other holiday makers about our stay at this hotel resort.  This hotel needs a lesson in all inclusive and what to expect from a 4* Platnuim. We have stayed in 4* & 5* hotels all over the continent and this hotel has many lessons to learn. 4* Platnuim you expect a certain level of quality that this hotel does not have? This hotel is what you expect if you were 3* quick break only, then you couldn’t complain, but this is a very bad example of what they and Thompson advertise.  Plastic glasses? Yes obviously by the pool but as adults only to drink out of plastic glasses by the bar and indoor bar area is a fine way on how to ruin your drink. Drinking beer and wine out of plastic glasses in the…

title: Not 4*
review: Dear customer,  We are very sorry to hear about your experience with us. At Alua we work to ensure our customers have the best stay they can possibly have and deserve.   Regarding the plastic cups, we apologize but we cannot provide any glasses by or near the pool according to the Law we follow, the law of coasts and seas.   Also, we will take into account all of your suggestions regarding possible improvements at our hotel such as the food or room service.  We apologize once again for these inconveniences and hope to have the chance of welcoming you back again in the future.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Lovely Hotel for a Holiday in Alcudia
review: The food is awful Luke warm and a very poor choice you have to pay for meals at pool bar they are not all inclusive and the drinks are served in plastic glasses there is only one bar in the hole complex and the restaurant you can only have wine beer or soft drinks no waiter service you have to help your self and the drinks.The only bar on the complex is very restrictive most drinks you are charged for and the staff are not very welcoming at the bar or restaurant and when I complained the soup was almost cold I was just ignored buy the staff clearing the plates the rooms are fine and the pool is freezing cold things you are not told when booking this hotel beware this is definitely not 4* or all inclusive

title: Not 4*
review: Dear customer,  We are very sorry to hear about your stay with us. We would like to let you know that for us, the most important objetive is to make sure our customers have the best stay they can have, that's why we take advantage of these comments to use them as an improvement opportunity for our clients.  Above all, thank you for your comment, we hope to have the chance of welcoming you again at this or another one of our hotels.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Great position
review: From the moment we arrived at the hotel, we were made to feel more than welcome.  All the staff that we met throughout our stay were approachable, professional and friendly, from the staff on reception to the ladies cleaning our rooms, no one could have been nicer.  The entertainment staff were also excellent. They made a real effort to meet everyone and let us know what entertainment was available, the evening entertainment was also very good, something to suit everyone.  The All Inclusive meal selection was outstanding, so much to choose from at every meal, the catering staff excelled themselves. The Al La Carte choice for swapping one of the evening meals was also very good. The hotel is situated in a nice area, easily accessible to the beach and local bars, and if you want…

title: Didn't disappoint
review: 4* or 3*, who cares it was fabulous. The room was fresh, modern, with a great bathroom and the best shower ever, big TV with loads of English speaking channels, helpful staff, excellent food and lots of it, and entertainment in the evening. This was a 4 day stop at the end of a week long cruise. It was just the way to finish a great holiday. Also no children.

title: Nice hotel but 3* + not quite 4*
review: Dear Anthony,  Thank you so much for your kind words towards our hotel, we are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and had a nice holiday.   We are thankful for your kind words towards our colleagues and will let them know about your kind thoughts, we're sure they will be pleased to know that our dear guests are happy with the service they provide.  We hope to have the chance of welcoming you once again in the future.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Fantastic hotel!
review: Arrived at the hotel and was welcomed by a glass of bubbly and a sandwich which was nice.  To be fair the hotel was really nice and in a good location. Fridge and the safe was free which was good.  We did book a double room but was given a twin, we didn’t bother to moan because we liked the room. The location was good out of the way but close enough to walk to where it was all happening also only about a 5-10min walk to the beach which was a lovely beach. The only things I would say that doesn’t make it a 4* was the restaurant which was poorly ran and the food choice wasn’t that great and sometimes waiting for stuff to be topped up. The other thing was not having another bar inside the hotel. The entertainment was hit or miss but is like that in most hotels. The staff was very…

title: Definitely not 4 Star
review: Dear Andrew,  Overall we thank you for letting us know how your stay with us went. We're glad you had a nice and warm welcome to our hotel and initiated your holidays in such a good way.  We apologize for the disappointment given with our restaurant, we will take notice of your comment to see how we can improve our service and give a better offering to our guests.  We will let our colleagues know your appreciation towards them, we’re sure they will be happy to know you’re satisfied with the service you received.  We hope to have the chance of welcoming you once again.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Fabulous holiday
review: I visited this adult only hotel with a group of friends for a week, half board. The hotel is set in a quiet location but only a couple of minutes walk from a local Lidl and other shops as well as only 10 minutes from the beautiful Alcudia beach. The hotel itself is very modern and the rooms were spotless everyday. We were welcomed by a friendly reception team and our rep, as we were half board we upgraded our stay to get unlimited drinks at tea time for only 4 euros a day, definitely worth it! You also don’t need to worry about a room card as your wristband doubles up as one. The food was great with hot and cold selection at breakfast, and themed nights at tea time. They also had a vegetarian/vegan corner although some nights were better than others they offered more than other…

title: Not a 4 Star TUI Platinum hotel
review: Where to begin!! The good points - bright modern adults only hotel with fabulous reception staff, with special thanks to Mary Ann for assistance when due to illness had to cancel our flight home. The bedroom was white and bright with the largest bed I've ever seen. Bedding was changed every 2 or 3 nights. Bathroom needed an extractor fan and a small stool perhaps.  There were always plenty of sunbeds by the pool and the entertainment staff were good. The spa and gym area looked impressive. Bad points - the food was appalling, especially breakfast. Cereals were coco pops or other chocolate cereals with warm milk!! In fact I went to local Lidl and bought my own cereal. Bacon was un describable. If you like cheese and ham for breakfast then this for you. Evening meals were very hit…

title: Beautiful Holidays
review: Dear Gillian,  First of all we would like to express our gratitude for you taking the time in writing us a review based on your stay with us. It helps us improve our service.  We apologize for the inconveniences and will take note of all of your comments and suggestions regarding our service or the food. We still hope, regardless of those issues, you had a nice holiday and enjoyed your vacations.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again in the future.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Holiday
review: We stayed at the hotel for a week. We had a great time and a great holiday. We  visited many places around. If you do not like to busy.. May is great for visiting Alcudia.  The hotel's food is good although it would include a bigger selection. The rooms are beautiful and all praised by the maids. Entertainment is amazing, all day you can choose fitness or sport, dance activities. We enjoy a lot.  Every night is lovely live music and good vibe. Flamenco guitar and dance was brilliant! Only what we don't like is hard mattress in room.   We recommend the hotel and wish you a great sunny days. Greetings.

title: Lovely, relaxing holiday environment
review: Dear Cindy,  We thank you for your review. We hope you had a nice time whilst staying at our hotel and enjoyed your holidays. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our food but will take into account your suggestion regarding the selection.  We thank you for recommending our hotels.   We hope to welcome you back again in the future.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Ok for a few days
review: The hotel was very clean and comfortable staff were also very friendly. But when it comes to the bar and food the food was very basic always warm not hot and the drinks at the bar was always measured there was no waitress waiter service. For a 4star platinum hotel I was very disappointed, will not be going back

title: Great hotel, convenient for Alcudia
review: Stayed here in early May and were very pleasantly surprised.  All the staff are friendly and helpful, the hotel is spotless, beds large and very comfortable and the rooms are reasonably spacious with balconies.  If you have a pool view you will hear the entertainment but it finishes at 11.00.  The pool was cold in early May but no doubt it will warm up soon.  Plenty of sun beds and no one reserves them with towels, which is a pleasant change and it isn’t necessary at all.  Food is great, buffet style with plenty of choice.  I’ve previously stayed in two other hotels in the area and this is by far the best.  Even the room air con works well and is quiet, a real bonus.  I reported a fridge malfunction and it was fixed within 20 minutes, very efficient.

title: Lovely getaway
review: Dear customer,   thank you very much for taking your time in writing your experience at our hotel. It's lovely to know you had a nice holiday.   We're happy to see you enjoyed our facilities and service, such as the food.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Recommended
review: Had a really lovely time away with my boyfriend, nice weather and the hotel was luxurious. We stayed on a pool side room which was cleaned everyday and we caught the sun on the balcony in the afternoon. Plenty of sunbeds but pool was absolutely freezing! Only downside was the food got quite boring after a few evenings and lunches. Waiting for eggs in the morning for breakfast took forever and was quite frustrating waiting for eggs, cereal was stale too. Me and my boyfriend are in our 20's and we found some of the older couples staying at the hotel to be very rude and looked down on us, like we shouldnt be allowed there.Plenty of times i had older women give me dirty looks and bump into me to try and unsettle me. Other than that i had a really enjoyable time and the hotel was…

title: Nice break in the sun
review: Dear Autumn,   thank you for taking your time in writing your experience at our hotel,we hope you had a nice holiday.   Also, we will take into account your comment regarding the food and let the gastronomy department know in order to improve our service. We apologize for the issues given with other clients, please let our colleagues know the next time in order to prevent these situations from happening again.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Beautiful holiday
review: This hotel is highly recommended, the staff were excellent all the time, food very good, the drinks were plentiful, the pool was lovely, the weather was not so good, i’m Still working out who to blame for that

title: Lovely Holidays
review: We visited Mallorca for the first time. Hotel is Adult only and we like it. Everything is very close to visit. Alcudia old city, port...  The hotel is nicely decorated and clean but there are some things missing. There is no indoor bar or heating on the outside terrace. Why? The evenings was very cold.  The all staff is very good but specialy thanks reception and Entertainment, Aquaaerobic was the right refreshment, we also enjoyed the evening music and quizzes with Jacov and Silvie. Abba tribute show was really good.  We'll be back in the autumn with friends.  Greetings.

title: Great hotel, Lack of food choice
review: Dear Jasmin,   How lovely is it to hear about your holidays with us!   Thank you for your review, we appreciate you taking the time in writing your experience at our hotels. We hope you enjoyed your stay and had a nice holiday.   Also, thank you for your kind words towards our hotel and colleagues, we will let our reception team know about your appretiation towards them.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts.

title: Good Hotel but not 4*
review: Very clean hotel, friendly staff. Wi-fi was brilliant you could get this by the pool and in the room for free. Pool area was lovely and plenty of sun beds still free in the afternoon, however the pool was freezing! food quality was good but the choice of food was very limited and repetitive which was the only downside to this hotel. Only a short walk to bars, shops and the beach.  We travelled as a couple in our 20's, and felt a little out of place with the amount of elderly couples there, it felt like you were being watched as to why you were there and made us feel a bit uncomfortable - obviously this is nothing to do with the hotel but more to what guests you have staying at the same time as you! We knew about the island tax before going, price wise we had to pay 46 euros for…

title: J smith
review: Dear Hannah,  Thank you for your review, we appreciate you taking the time in writing your experience at our hotels. We hope you enjoyed your stay and had a nice holiday.  We will take into account your comment regarding the food choice and will let the food department know about this in order to improve our service.  We hope to greet you back again soon.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels&Resorts.

title: Reasonable Hotel, Awful food
review: Hotel is very clean if a bit clinical. Everything is white with lots of plastic plants. The pool area is ok but water was cold and you might struggle for beds in high season. The staff are great and nothing is too much trouble, but we had two main issues. The bedroons and the food! There is very little storage space in the bedrooms with only 1 draw and a small amount of open hanging and shelving. The open shower means water gets everywhere if you're not careful. Food choices were not great and definitely struggles for its  4* rating here. However there is a great offer of upgrading for unlimited ( help yourself) wine, cava and beer with your evening meal rather than having to shell out for all inclusive drinks. Only €4.00 pppd. Great offer. The wrist band also doubles as your…

title: Relaxing friendly holiday
review: stayed here in October and I do believe it had not long changed over to adults only. All staff here are so friendly and helpful, from the main desk, to the cleaners, to the bar staff, to the restaurant, just everyone was so polite and friendly. The rooms were cleaned on a regular basis and if we wanted anything we just asked the maids and they were always quick to help. The restaurant is bright and spot less, it has a lovely window over looking the pool which was lovely to sit at. Always easy to get beds by the pool even at 2pm. It was in a quiet area but within walking distance to the port and the strip, so ideally located really. I would come back again but do think there is room for a little improvement such as the entertainment which I thought was terrible and definitely…

title: Great short break
review: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for your comment, we are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful relaxing holiday. We will continue working hard on proving our guests with the holiday experience of the highest standards.  We look forward to welcoming you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Four Star? There is 4* in  B**l S**t
review: We stayed at the AluaSoul for 4 nights in October on a half board basis. Hotel is lovely- recently refurbished and very modern. Check in was very pleasant- helped by a glass of bubbly! Our room was comfortable - although lacks storage- not a problem for a few days, but could be difficult for a fortnight. Breakfast was fine- usual variety on offer, however found dinner to be a bit hit and miss. Pool area was nice- no problem getting sun beds ( it was October after all) a decent size pool but it was VERY COLD !! We were very lucky with the weather when we visited it was a minimum 25 degrees ( hotter than our summer!!) I would recommend this hotel, it’s in a good position just off the main road, very quiet but only about 5-10 minutes from the lovely long beach and plenty of bars…

title: All inclusive holiday
review: Dear Kata,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, it is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a great short break in our hotel.   We look forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Ruby Wedding Anniversary
review: Have just returned from a a break in this hotel which was enjoyable despite the hotel rather than because of it.  For a start this is not a four star hotel, nor should TUI be promoting it as part of their Platinum range.  It is interesting to note that one of the qualifications for Platinum is that the hotel should be 4-5 on Trip Advisor, yet when looking at the last 50 Trip Advisor reviews 23 were made by first time reviewers and  31 were made by people who had previously completed three or less reviews - these are numbers so far above average that it makes one wonder what has made people rush to join Trip Advisor and leave a review?  Good Points: Hotel recently refurbished so has a nice clean feel to it, Junior staff (maids, bar & waiting) all very friendly and pleasant. Free…

title: Nice relaxing hotel
review: Lovely quiet hotel newly refurbished Beds are very comfortable and rooms very clean  Staff are amazing, very friendly and can't help you enough especially the bar staff Loads of sunbeds, but pool cold! Only 1 bar but never busy  Entertainment good, quite laid back in day  Food is as expected at the end of the season but always can find something nice to eat

title: Newly renovated and it shows
review: Dear Debbie,  Thank you for sharing your experience here, we are glad that you had a lovely time and enjoyed your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.  We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Girls trip
review: We had a great 10 days here.  We had read that the hotel has been renovated recently, and it shows. Décor was stylish and fresh. The room was comfortable, with robe and slippers provided.  TV had the usual English channels.  The bathroom was clean and tidy and the shower efficient. Shame there was no room for even a small bath.  The following were all free: 1.	Safe 2.	Fridge 3.	Kettle and coffee 4.	Wifi (reception in the room was particularly good) Often you have to pay for these.   We had read a previous review where there was an altercation about helping yourself to “free” drinks at dinner. The facts are simple: 1.	Drinks are free if you’re all-inclusive 2.	You have to pay if you’re half board However, there’s a way round the latter. At reception, we were offered unlimited…

title: Alcudia holidays
review: Dear Dave,  Thank you for your review, we appreciate your taking the time to describe and share your experience here. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we would be happy to have you back sometime soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Friendly hotel
review: The staff and facilities were great. Clean and quiet at this time of year and all inclusive was brilliant. Would definitely recommend and was only a short distance to amazing beach which is a bonus! Good market in the week and options of wine tours available which is a nice change of scenery.

title: Amazing all-inclusive hotel
review: Alua Soul Alcudia Bay is a newly renovated hotel with nice interior design. The rooms are very modern and beautiful with a private balcony. I would like some more closet space since there wasn't enough room for both my and my friend's clothes. But this is a minor issue.   The food in the buffet is great - new items everyday and many different foods to choose from. If there's something you aren't satisfied with in the restaurant, the waiting staff will gladly help you.   The pool area is large and the perfect place to relax for hours and there's a bar by the pool where you can get drinks and other beverages from morning until night.  The staff arranges several activities during the day like wine tasting, sangría workshop, pistol shooting, etc. These activities are worth a try.…

title: Very friendly staff nothing too much trouble in this hotel
review: Dear Lasse,   Thank you for leaving a detailed review of your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. We are pleased to hear that you had a lovely time in the hotel and hope that it was a memorable experience.  We hope to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great Hotel
review: We have just returned from Alcudia alua soul and I am pleased to say we enjoyed every minute. We were a little concerned about some of the reviews but honestly we cannot understand why some people have criticised the hotel . We arrived to a lovely glass of car a and a very swift check in by pleasant reception  staff . We paid 36 euros tourist tax which is a government tax . We also paid 20 euros each for pool towels this deposit was returned when we checked out. We were given a room on the 5 th floor with an enormous  bed.  The room was at the rear of the hotel with a view of the mountains over Alcudia town we could also see the sea. Room was kept immaculate lovely bathroom free safe and fridge bottled water replaced every day if you needed more you only had to ask. Furniture…

title: Perfect break
review: Dear Joyce,  Thank you for your feedback, it is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay, especially our staff and a la carte restaurant. We hope you had a lovely holiday, and we look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Short Break
review: Stayed here in October and the hotel is great, very clean and spotless and the staff are polite and friendly, the pool area and pool is nice although the pool is cold but that’s not a big issue on a hot day, the rooms are great and clean with air con which is nice on a night, mini fridge in room and tea and coffee making facilities, the food in the all inclusive restaurant is nice enough, you can eat all day too if your all inclusive, great selection, would stay here again if I return to alcudia.

title: Love this hotel!!
review: I arrived here for a weeks stay and have loved everything so far... still 3 days to go and other than an odd rainy day, all good so far. The hotel is spotless and the food is fabulous. If you are all inclusive then you should know you get Gordon’s and Smirnoff as part of the Al! The staff are all lovely and friendly .. would 100% come back here... 👍big thumbs up!

title: Holiday
review: Dear Rachel,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely holiday and enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing stay
review: Lovely hotel .great staff . Especially the bar staff .Food is ok  would like more spanish food but can always find something nice to eat . Hotel rooms are lovely and very clean . Pool area is great , plenty of sun beds . We would be happy to return to Alua Soul Hotel .

title: All inclusive best choice made
review: Dear Mick,  Thank you for your comment, we look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 3 day holiday
review: I spent a week with my wife at the AluaSoul hotel in Alcudia at the beginning of October. We’ve been in this area few years ago but the hotel belonged to another company so we decided to give it a try after the new opening. I liked the renovations, the lobby is all white and spacious and we were given a glass of Cava upon arrival which I really appreciated. Buffet restaurant is good, with a decent selection of fresh vegetables, hot and cold foods and desserts and the service is super fast, wether sometimes even too fast while removing plates. Our room had a super comfy bed and a balcony, everything was clean and didn’t hear any noise coming from the street, the area by the way is very quiet. Lots of white clean towels and plenty of essentials (shampoo, shower gel, etc.) in the…

title: Tranquil & friendly like no other!!
review: Came to rest & enjoy my vacation in a quiet environment! This is a truly welcoming & tranquil escape for adults!! Chose it specifically because it is an "Adults Only" Resort!! Great location!! Will be back

title: Indifferent
review: Dear Christina,  Thank you for your comment, we appreciate it. It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 4 star hotel with a few faults.
review: Stayed 3/10 for 7 nights. Stayed in room 516 pool view. Room fine no issues.  Main problems 1.Meant to be Thomson Platinum? Food consistently luke warm, didn't have a hot meal all week,breakfast and dinner. Wine supermarket plonk,just drinkable. 2.Bar,dreadful,doubles a pool bar during the day. Plastic glasses! Most very worn and well used, not even disposable? Drink prices for half board  diabolical. 13 Euro for a Bacardi and coke and a Baileys,not even large measures in plastic glasses! even the bar staff seemed embarrassed. 3 Pool area very ,concrete jungle, pool very cold, never saw it cleaned.sun cream scum at one end most days. 4 Evening entertainment, no atmosphere at all, felt sorry for the acts "going" thru motions. Hotel really needs to get its act together if it wants…

title: Anthony chaffe maerdy south wales uk
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are constantly working on improving our services and we appreciate your feedback. We took note of your comments regarding the food and the bar and will take them into account.   We would like to mention that we follow the regulations of Local Government that forbid the use of glass material in the pool areas. We use polycarbonate instead.   We thank you for taking the time to share your comment and hope that you enjoyed your holiday in Majorca.  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Alua Soul Alcudia Bay
review: We recently stayed for 2 weeks half board. We knew that drinks during dinner were (oddly) not included in the brochure price so we paid 105 Euros extra on arrival to include this. It did seem expensive but actually it made sense if you base your calculation on the four star prices charged in the hotel bar!  Having said that,this is a quality hotel. We found that the food is as good as, if not better than, other 4 star hotels we have experienced.  All Aluasoul staff were obviously very efficient & happy to be of service . Our room was clean & modern with a huge bed and flat screen T.V.  BUT the equally modern bathroom was fitted with a power shower above a very shallow shower tray. The drain in the shower tray could not hope to cope with the flow of water which quickly overflowed…

title: Lovely stay
review: On arrival really warm reception and treated to a nice glass of bubbly. Fantastic room and lovely food in the restaurant. Great facilities enjoyed being by the pool with cocktails and staff were great. Would highly recommend and will come back again.

title: A good and a relaxing stay at this hotel
review: Dear Jemma,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comment, we appreciate it. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.  We will be happy to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing
review: The hotel felt very up to date. Lots of daylight, modern furniture and nice colours. Beds were great but not much space for hanging you clothes. There was only space for one suitcase. There was a good gourmet restaurant but we had all inclusive and the buffet wasn't very exciting The average age of the visitors was quite high. The pool area was large and big enough for everybody. Poolbar served food as well as drinks. The staff in the hotel was nice, helpful and very friendly and they had good knowledge of several languages. The only thing I missed was to be able to have my meals out in the open.  This was a very nice hotel with very good service an I can recommend it.

title: Relaxing Week
review: Dear Akytt,  Thank you for sharing your experience. We are glad that you enjoyed your holiday in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay and we hope to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Sunny September
review: Lovely hotel. Fantastic staff. The hotel is lovely and clean the beds are very comfortable. Food is great with a wide variety for everyone. Entertainment is a laugh which is always good and Mauro is wonderful and encourages everyone to join in. The pool is great the only thing it needs is a few more plants but the hotel will be working on this soon and certainly would not stop us coming back

title: A very average 3 nothing to brag about
review: On first impressions the hotel is amazing. Adults only, newly referbish, comfy bed what more could you ask for.    Well after spending a week here I personally wouldn't shout about it or recommend it.   The food always seemed to be lupe warm even if you arrive at the restaurant when it opens. If you pay for a pool view room you can't see the pool or anything around you if you're sat down on the balcony. And if you don't have a pool view room and you are on floors 1-4 you'll have an apartment block and a big tree in your view, so i recommend a top floor (5) room.   The reception staff were never helpful. Any questions I had for the area I was told to speak to my thomson rep. I once requested an iron for my room and it took a day to arrive. And when I questioned to why the safe…

title: Relaxing break
review: Dear Dann,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are grateful to receive your feedback as we are constantly working on improving our services and it is important for us to know the details of your stay. We took note of your comments and will address the issues you mentioned.   We hope that you enjoyed your holiday and had a nice time in Majorca.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel
review: Hi we have just returned from a weeks stay at the Aluasoul Alcudia bay on half board basis  First the positives : .The hotel is immaculate with a minimalist feel .we had a standard room on the 4th floor we never heard any noise from our neighbours or  from the floor above .The room is spacious with 2 queen sized beds we never had any flooding from the rainfall shower as reported by other reviewers .Food at breakfast and evening meal was plentiful with excellent choices of hot/cold food there were always plenty of empty tables at both sittings . My only moan was that the odd couple of guests were coming into evening meal with their  swimwear clearly showing under their tops and shorts there does not appear to be any dress code for evening meal We booked this hotel as it is…

title: Nice clean hotel
review: Dear Anne,  Thank you so much for your kind review, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope you had a wonderful holiday! We also took note of the dress code, the bar and will take it into account. It is our greatest pleasure to know that our staff took a good care of you and provided you nice memories.   We would be happy to welcome you again.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing holiday
review: We Enjoyed our stay here, rooms are clean and tidy and staff are friendly.  The beach isn't too far of a walk and there are plenty things to do around the hotel.   Food is good and there is plenty of variety. Overall a good hotel.

title: Holiday
review: Vert clean, good food and the straff was very helpful and smiling🙂 we will come back next year. The wine was very good and lots of different activity next by. Its the first time in Alcudia. The sea has good temperatur, but the pool was to cold.

title: Good service and quality food
review: Dear Leiv,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that your first holiday in Alcudia was a wonderful one!   We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fatastic vacation
review: Unique place where the staff are excellent, attentive and polite. I want to book again for the next year so can highly recommend it. 10 Points for the pool area that made possible a good time for sleeping and reading. The snack bar on site which serves really good food for the all inclusive guests made my afternoons perfect.

title: Very nice
