review: Dear Alexander,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your holiday and had a lovely time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.   We look forward to seeing you next year!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Excellent place and staff..!!
review: We had a great stay in this hotel. Friendly staff, nice rooms and good food. Every night entertainment and nice themes with cocktail bars, caves bars etc. Close to the beaches only a few minutes away.

title: Very happy
review: Good hotel, excellent staff, food decent but not wow (but the nubium restaurant downstairs very Good). Good base for the area with old town about a mile away, beach very close. Away from main strip so peaceful quiet location. Left very happy :)

title: Everything Perfect
review: Hello Gemma,  Thank you for sharing your experience here, we appreciate it. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay and we hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Loved it! Fantastico
review: I stayed there for one week with a friend and we made great experiences: Really friendly staff, lots of great food, great customer service, clean hotel, good organized, atmosphere was really relaxing, all together we have nothing to complain,

title: We will come back
review: Dear Aylin,  Thank you for your nice review, we are glad that you had a nice stay in our hotel and hope that your holiday was wonderful.  We look forward to your return.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: one week in september
review: I loved my stay in Alua Soul. Checked in for a weekend with my bff Francesca for my birthday's trip. As I turned 30 I needed to enjoy my trip as much as I could 😁 The room was super bright and clean, great food (I'm italian so very picky when it comes to food), lovely and very attentive staff. Last but not least the glass of Cava to greet us while arrived totally got me in the holiday mood!  Very recommended.

title: Nice hotel but please read ....
review: Aluasoul Alcudia is approximately 50 minutes' drive from Palma airport. Bright, clean and recently refurbished to a white minimalist style. Good aircon, hairdryer, telephone, refridgerator and coffee/tea making facilities in room (but not replenished daily). Huge spacious firm beds in rooms overlooking pool. Apparently, the twin bedded rooms overlook back of hotel. Complimentary glass (cheap but not bad) Cava and bottle of water on arrival. 10 minutes' walk to the nearest beach but pool next to a noisy main road. Lidl and shops nearby. Good evening entertainment and varied activities during the day. In-house spa and very small gym, sauna and steam room. The spa's jet power shower did not work. The jacuzzi was cold and no access for disabled persons. Couples mainly, no children.…

title: Great
review: Dear Pia,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. We welcome constructive criticism and took note of your comments to address the issues and improve our services. We are glad to hear that you found our staff helpful and attentive and we hope that you enjoyed your holiday.  We truly hope to have the chance to welcome you again.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Two week holiday
review: We had e very good week here at AluaSoul in Alcudia. Very good staff and the rooms were very clean and nice. A bottle of water every day was very nice. I can highly recommend this Hotel. You must be over 16 to stay here which suited us. Very helpful staff and I can only say: Thank You for a wonderful week. I hope we can come back soon.💕

title: Weekend Break
review: Dear Emmijanne,  Thank you for such a lovely review, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a wonderful week in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.  We look forward to welcoming you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Definitely not 4* but 3*
review: First year under new ownership. Complete renovation. Rooms immaculate, I had kingsize bed. Food excellent and staff friendly and efficient. Highly recommended on all fronts.  I travelled solo and was given an upgraded room without asking. The poll area is large with plenty of loungers.   The all inclusive deal is good  value,three meals a day.  Spirits were regular brands. Snacks available all day poolside.

title: Relaxing
review: The staff very helpful and supportive, nice experience , good hotel and management, good facilities and for sure I will back again to relax again In same hotel, I recommend anyone to stay in same hotel and try it

title: Was great there
review: Dear Zaid,  Thank you for leaving your review here, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely holiday.  We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Excellent place with super friendly staff!
review: Staff were so helpful and they made my trip amazing! I was having so much fun and the facilities range was over the limits really looking for coming back there as soon as I get holidays back in game :)))

title: Fairy-Tale Beautiful Place
review: Dear Evaldas,  Thank you for sharing your comment here, we appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely holiday.  We truly hope to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great weekend
review: I had a wonderful experience their, and would definitely recommend going back.  Excellent staff, very friendly and make you feel welcome, beautiful ambiance, highly recommend!  When I return to Mallorca, I will definitely be back!

title: Very nice
review: Stayed for a couple days last week very homely and inviting the staff was very lovely to very nice for a couple days or a week rooms are very clean and walking distance from the beach just loved it  in total good for the money to will be coming again

title: Highly recommend
review: Dear Ellie,  Thank you for leaving your comment here, we are glad that you had a wonderful holiday in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay and hope to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great place for a stay
review: Me and my fiancée stayed here unfortunately only for a couple of days, we were able to sunbathe by this big swimming, we had a great view from our hotel room.  Food was excellent, couldn't applaud the staff more they were very attentive and friendly.   Reception also helped us with our way around, and gave us a few recommendations of other restaurants and bars. Rooms were spotless and beautifully decorated.  I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Thumbs up
review: Dear Rhiannon,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Awesome hotel
review: I'll be short. AluaSoul in Maljorca is a nice hotel, with a great customer service, quite facility and clean rooms! My experience of staying in the hotel is only positive and I would recommend it to my friends.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Stayed here for a week and what an amazing place, friendly staff, clean rooms and facilties, great food and highly recommended to anyone.   The rooms are comfortable, the food choice is great and the staff are always there to help with a smile.  I will definitely be using this hotel again on my next trip

title: Great hotel
review: Hello Darren,  It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope you had a fantastic holiday. We look forward to having you back in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fantastic Holiday!
review: So what can I say...Great hotel, very friendly staff, rooms are immaculately clean and food was to a high standard. Very spacious pool area was a plus as I like a bit of space at the pool. Also enjoyed the entertainment and had a lovely massage, will definitely be back.

title: wowza
review: Dear Jason,  It's a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay, especially the pool area and the staff. We hope you had a memorable holiday and we'll look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Exactly what we needed for couple of days
review: We're currently on the last day of our week stay at Aluasoul Alcudia Bay and I can honestly say I could not have wished for a better holiday. The hotel make you feel so welcome and at home from the very first moment you arrive. On arrival, we were given a glass of champagne each, so straight away we were put into the holiday spirit. The lady at the reception desk on our arrival was absolutely lovely, as are all the other members of staff we have met during our stay. From kitchen staff to bar staff to cleaners, everyone was so welcoming and friendly.  The hotel rooms are absolutely stunning. You're provided with a flatscreen TV, a safe and a mini fridge which comes in handy, especially as we only opted for the half-board option. We also chose a pool-view room upon booking which I…

title: It's not bad, but certainly isn't platinum.
review: We've just spent a week at this hotel, travelled as a young couple.  Whilst there is nothing fundamentally bad about this hotel, it just doesn't get the platinum bit quite right.  A quick run down:  Rooms Spacious, clean, well-equipped. A couple of gripes: paper thin walls, two beds pushed together as opposed to a double bed and awful tea and coffee choice.  Food Buffet restaurant is good, lots of choice and some nice freshly cooked meats daily. It does get a bit samey, maybe some more themed nights would be good.  We had a meal in the a la carte restaurant as part of our package, again this was really good, apart from dessert which was essentially jelly and ice cream. I certainly wouldn't choose to go and pay to eat there. The staff that were there that night perhaps were…

title: Fabulous Hotel great location :)
review: Hello Victoria,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. We appreciate your feedback as we are constantly improving our services. We took note of your comment regarding the staff in the restaurant and snack bar and will be working harder on improving these points.  We hope you had a nice holiday and we'd love to welcome you back one day in order to deliver a holiday experience of highest standards.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Mr Williams
review: We recently enjoyed a weeks stay in the Aluasoul, the hotel was fantastic and the staff were happy, helpful and friendly. We paid extra for all inclusive and the food was nice just needed a little more choice. We thoughly enjoyed the pool and spa area was a great addition to the hotel. The location was great we really enjoyed walks down the beach to the port in the evenings always lots going on. :)  On the whole we enjoyed our stay although one improvement to be made.. would be the cleanliness of the rooms could of been better, our sheets weren't changed all week which we've had previously in a 3* hotel and the bathroom wasn't cleaned either this was disappointing as a maid came round every day.. but overall we enjoyed our stay and would be happy to stay again soon :)

title: Decent hotel in Alcudia
review: Hello Lucy,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely time in our hotel! We took note of your comment regarding room service and will pass it on in order to improve our services.   We truly look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Almost perfect
review: what can I say one of the best places  I have stayed in great hotel  food 5 star and the staff where so helpful would recommend  to anyone the entire hotel was spotless myself and the wife and three children had such an enjoyable time that we have already read books for next year and are taking another family with us

title: Not what it's says on the tin
review: Four star hotel no way!! We were half board we were told off for taking cold water at the evening meal by the head waiter in front of everyone in the restaurant, and we were not the only ones!! Some staff had an attitude towards guests others very kind!! Hotel management took on board our complaints and there was some improvement! The bar was tiny for the size of hotel it was outside no air con in 38 degrees and plastic glasses, the entertainment was poor!! Rooms were clean although we paid extra for superior not worth it as all pretty much the same!! Thomson's need to review again as this is not a four star hotel !!

title: Caters more for the older generation
review: Hello,   We regret to hear that you had rather disappointing experience. We appreciate your feedback, as we are constantly improving our services, taking into account all comments of our guests. We took note of the issues you mentioned and will work on delivering a better experience to our guests.  We invite you to return to the hotel so that we have the chance to demonstrate to you the improvements made.   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Late availabilty break September 2017
review: I have mixed feelings about this hotel,the hotel itself is very impressive after the upgrade and change to adults only and never had any problem getting a sunbed.It was just under a 10 minute walk to the beach which isn't too bad.The pool is of adequate size and there is a small shallow pool that is virtually redundant now there are no kids here although I'm guessing it was very different on all these points when it was a family hotel!.The room itself was very nice although the sink was too flat and not enough room for toiletries around it and also next to the shower which was a decent one.Disappointed also to end up in a twin room when we booked a double!.Very impressed with tv though which was very large and had a good selection of English channels and handy if you wanted to…

title: love mallorca
review: Hello Steve,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. We appreciate your feedback, as we are constantly improving our services. We took note of your comments and will take them into account. It is important for us to find the points for improvements to be able to deliver a better holiday experience.   We do hope that you come back to our hotel to find a holiday that you are expecting. We will be happy to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fantastic holiday!
review: Stayed a week in room 423 which overlooked the pool area. Huge bed which was great and the room had a good size fridge. The balcony was a bit small but ok, not overly private from the adjacent rooms with a view toward the hills in the distance. There was nowhere in the bathroom to lay out your stuff which is a bit of a pain but minor. Staff were friendly and all appeared to be genuinely happy in their work. The food also is fine for doing the job. It is not fine dining by a long way but there is a fair choice and its just a matter of timing as to how freshly cooked it is. Puds were a bit of a disappointment but the wine is excellent value.  The lobby and rooms are very well fitted, personally i dont like the concrete finish to the pool area, grass would be much better in my…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Before travelling to this hotel, I was bit doubtful about my stay, as I read some negative comments, which made me wonder how will the hotel look like. Lucikly, it has exceeded my (not very high) expectations. One of my biggest concerns was pool area, since I saw some pictures of it not being finished, however, it is looking just fine  for the 4star hotel. I was amazed by the rooms as well, the pictures reflected the reality pretty well and small balcony was a wonderful plus. Inside restaurant was nice and waiters were friendly, however everything was to be served by yourself. Additionaly, there was a snack bar available for the all inclusive guests, which was not very impressive, but sufficient. A la Carte restaurant could be booked for one evening for those staying in the…

title: Holiday
review: Hello Matúš,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely holiday! We will continue working on improving our services to deliver a holiday experience of highest standards.   We hope to have the chance to welcome you again!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Brilliant!!!!
review: I booked this hotel for me and my girlfriend because it has been refurbished and the reviews I have read were quite positive. After spending few days in the hotel I have to agree with the good reviews and I would like to add one as well. Rooms are excellent, bed is huge and there is plenty of storage space as well. Bathroom is fresh and with a nice colours. I also like the lobby area, which is modern and very simple. Outdoor bar is big enough to serve all the clients and seating all around the place is sufficient too. I personally have not try the pool since I am more of a sea person, but it seemed clean and also quite large. Food in the restaurant was lovely and I got to try something else everyday. I still have to try a la carte restaurant, but I am sure the experience will be…

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Hello Jusi,  Thank you for your comment, we are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful holiday and we hope to have the chance to welcome you again someday!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Highly recommended
review: We spent a week at this hotel.we have high expectations as we usually stay in 5*.This hotel was great.friendly staff ( especially the entertainment staff Mariella and Maro).The food was great and a good selection.Its a relaxed atmosphere and always a sunbed so no getting up early.The pool bar is good woth nice staff who are always happy and upbeat.hotel is close to the beach and shops.dont listen to bad reviews as i feel that was due to teething problems when the hotel was refurbished.i would deginately stay again and reccomend !!brilliant holiday 🦁

title: Great holiday !!
review: I would like to thank the AluaSoul hotel for making my first holiday in Mallorca so enjoyable. Starting with the staff /receptionists, bartenders, waiters, entertainers.../, I have to say, I was amazed how friendly but also professional they were. I also have to highlight the great feeling I had when walking into my room, since it felt really new and modern. I  loved the small balcony, with a view of the mountains and the pool. Furthermore, I appreciate having safety locker in the room which was free of charge and very easy to use. Talking about common areas and restaurant, I think plenty of seating were provided and there was not a occation that those places were overcrowded even if the hotel was fully booked. I loved the small SPA, that was a great addition to the hotel. Last…

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Claud,  Thank you for sharing your comment here, we appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely holiday.  We truly hope to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: VERY GOOD HOTEL
review: The stay in this hotel is coming to an end and I can say that it has been incredibly positive. The staff is superb, rooms are bright and large, with modern furniture and TV with many channels to choose from. The view from our room was lovely as we got to see the pool and mountains in the background. Restaurant is lovely and not too large. SPA is also available for those, who like to relax in the nice sauna or jacuzzi. For active people, who wants to stay fit also during the holiday, there is a fully equipped gym which can be used free of charge. The pool is also large and there is no need to wake up early to reserve a sunbed. This hotel is a great choice also for a beach lovers, as magnificient Alcudia beach is not more than 5 minutes away. I wish we could stay longer ! Gorgeous…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Tana,  Thank you for leaving your review here, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely holiday.  We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Wonderland hotel
review: Plenty has previously been said about the initial reviews of this refurbished hotel but we found the hotel to be particularly keen to provide a quality service. Staff appeared to want to help at all times, food was as good as we have had at any European all inclusive hotel including those which are a lot more expensive and have an extra star! However the selection was limited. This is a relatively small hotel which does not have extensive facilities but it is very friendly, clean, modern and I would say excellent for a week away. International brand drinks as part of the all inclusive package is also a very unusual benefit which we have not seen for the price we paid. We had a last minute difficulty with the late departure from the hotel and were not happy with the service we…

title: Nice place to be relaxed!
review: The hotel is excellent with modern facilities and really friendly staff and service. Food was really nice and drinks had good prices. My room was very clean, modern, had all the facilities you would need. Do not forget to use the pool. Great views around the hotel itself. I would recommend!

title: amazing
review: Hello Zootmusic,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are glad that you had a wonderful stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.  We hope to see you again someday!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Brilliant holiday
review: I would like to thank AluaSoul and its staff for a great experience. It met all of my expectations and there were just small details that could have been improved. Overall, the rooms and its cleanliness was good and it had plenty of daylight too, which I personally love. It was very modern and felt really new.                                                              The restaurant was bit smaller than expected but there were always enough free tables. Food was good but I would suggest more healthy options for health freak like me, but this is just personal taste. The pool area and the bar was nice, with a lovely and professional staff. Entertainment was great and all the activities were suitable for adult audience. If you want to book a hotel which is not overcrowded, but…

title: Deserves 4 stars!
review: Hello Diekind,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are delighted to hear that you had such a lovely holiday and enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Light and new hotel
review: I have been enjoying my holiday in this hotel since the day one. Quick and kind receptionist made a great impression upon arrival and when seeing the room, the excitement about the holiday only increased. The rooms are spacious, bright and with plenty of storage space, supplemented by the balcony to enjoy the morning coffe. Restaurant is lovely and there any many options to choose from whether you have sweet or salty teeth. Pool area is very large and there are enough sunbeds so there is no need to wake up early to be able to get one. In general, the location of the hotel is very good due to the short distance from the beach and city center full of restaurants and small shops. I would definitely recommend this hotel for everybody. Definitely want to come back again

title: Outstanding!
review: We holidayed here in August for 2 weeks. The reception staff were helpful and we were offered champagne on arrival. Our room was bright and airy, the enormous bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was lovely with a large shower. Some people had previously complained about the water from the shower spilling onto the bathroom floor, but we didn't have any problems - you can adjust the shower head and water power.The rooms were cleaned each day and bottled water and tea/coffee was replenished. There is a fridge in each room and tea/coffee making facilities and the safe was free to use. The restaurant food was the best we have ever had at all inclusive with lots of choice, even for fussy eaters like me! Pool snacks were also served twice during the day. Waiters also brought…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Hello Graham,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we appreciate it. We are glad that you had such a wonderful and enjoyable holiday and had a great time in our hotel! We will continue working hard on providing our guests with exceptional holiday experience.  We will be looking forward to your return next year!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Definitely not a 4 star!!!
review: Nice and modern hotel, we booked this in February and after reading all the bad reviews we was going to try and cancel it,So glad we didn't because we couldn't fault anything.The bed was the most comfortable bed I've slept in and I've been in some good hotels in my time , the food was very good with a wide choice , the drinks were good and quite a lot of premium ones.Entertainment team was good Mauro and Mariela nice friendly people and bar man Jesus very nice guy,all the staff were friendly from reception to cleaners. Room cleaned everyday and towels changed , I would defiantly return to this hotel and recommend this hotel to friends.7 min walk to beach and 10 min walk to harbour, we ate out one night just because we fancied a nice juicy steak and went to a restaurant in Muro…

title: Loads of better hotels close by!
review: Hello,  Thank you for your review, we are glad to hear that you had such a wonderful holiday and enjoyed your time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!   We look forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Relaxing!
review: We booked this hotel on the basis of it being fully refurbished, and a 4 star platinum, it was unfortunately terribly disappointing.  Despite the refurbishment meant to be completed, it was clear when we arrived it wasn't.. in fact the time we spent around the pool was disrupted by the partitioning in the bar area being taken out.... cue dust and noise.  The flooring in the corridors was appalling, not sure if it was temporary whilst painting was still going on or not but it was dreadful.   Thankfully we hadn't booked to stay all inclusive as the food was shocking. The 'chefs' had no clue whatsoever, we watched one trying to carve some meat... he's certainly never spent a day at cookery school. Very limited choice, uncooked burgers, flies buzzing around the salads, very limited…

title: Dreadful Experience
review: We had to wait three days for maintenance to secure the toilet to the wall. We were half board I had a glass of water in the restaurant and was told in front of a full restaurant of people that water was not included and I needed to pay for it, I queried this then the restaurant manager came over and repeated the same although on reflection he was looking at me when I filled up my glass I then went to the reception and told the person in charge what happened he said there was a sign I advised him there was not so the three of us went back to the restaurant to prove that there wasn't which attracted again the guests who were eating. I felt that I had been singled out and accused of taking something that wasn't mine . To top it off the air con broke down last night but no one…

title: Modern Hotel, not 4* and beware of the NOISE!
review: Hello Darby,  We regret to hear that you had this unpleasant moment in your holiday and we apologize for causing any distress. We took note of the situation and will make sure that it does not happen again.   We thank you for your comment. We are working hard on improving our services and we appreciate your feedback.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Loved it
review: We are 25 and 26. We chose this hotel based on it's location.....Puerto Pollensa is our favourite place but it was too expensive so this was just a 10 min drive away.  On first arrival to Aluasoul Alcudia Bay our first impressions were good. The staff were all very friendly and we have a very quick check in. Our room was on the first floor (Room 123) which was actually a disabled room I think as the bathroom was a large wet room with bars etc.  The Room The Bed was lovely and comfy with new memory foam mattress. We also had a fridge with we used to store snacks in and a small wardrobe with hangers in. There was also a safe which was easy to use. The room was a little on the small size as when the cases were opened out there was very little room. The problem we had was with the…

title: Colin and Diane Swinefleet
review: Stayed as a couple in July and had a great time. Can not fault this place or staff. Arrived quite late due to late transfer but there is always food available. Salads laid out for midnight snack and late flights. Would love to return with all the family next time. Great that it's adults only. Mauro and Mariella do a great job as do all staff .

title: Great value 5 day break!
review: Hello Pam,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a wonderful time in our hotel.  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: August Holiday
review: After reading some negative reviews of this hotel prior to coming i was a bit apprehensive about it, but i am very pleased that they were wrong!   Hotel is lovely and clean with modern decor to match.  Rooms are bright, and have a huge comfy double bed. Only bad side to rooms is there doesn't seem to be much storage but this is only minor. Also had to request for the bed sheets to be changed after 5 days as they had not been done and were clearly dirty.  Pool area is great, no rush for beds in the morning, you can come down at anytime of day and will get a sunbed (maybe not in the best position if your a sun worshipper!) area very clean and isnt too cramped!   Food - i stayed half board with the extra added on of your drinks for dinner which is worth it! The dining room is very…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Hello Nicole and Scott,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we appreciate it. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful holiday and we will be awaiting your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely relaxing hotel
review: Staying for a week all inclusive and so far can't fault anything. All staff and reps have been helpful with any questions and very friendly. Room is amazing and kept very clean! Buffet restaurant has had a good variety so far and yet to eat at the al a carte. Huge variety of drinks in the all inclusive options, but only slightly negative thing is they do like you out of the bar sharp. Hotel is only a short walk from the beach and local bars.  Pool area always kept clean with cups etc being cleared away really quickly. So easy to get a sunbed, they are never all taken. Would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Lovely 11 nights
review: Hello Katie,   Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you had a lovely holiday and enjoyed your stay in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Myself and my fiancé were slightly apprehensive about our choice of hotel after we read some awful reviews. However, we stuck to our choice and we are so so glad that we did. We were half board and arrived late in the evening (midnight). The hotel had put on a cold dinner for us and we had a bottle of water waiting in our room. The rooms are very nicely decorated and clean, could not fault them at all. Yes, it does look like the workmanship in the bathroom has been a little rushed and the overhead shower squirted all over the bathroom, but this did not affect us at all and we couldn't be bothered to move rooms as this was the only problem. The pool area is very clean and we never had a problem getting a sunbed, no matter what time we arrived at the pool. Good variety of drinks…

title: Great Hotel
review: Had a fantastic holiday at this hotel, lovely room, great food, entertainment team of Mauro and Moriella were brilliant with plenty of activities from shooting through to cocktail making keeping everyone occupied. Poolside beds always available unlike a lot of hotels where it's an early morning dash to secure a good spot. Hotel is also well situated, so 5 minutes to the beach, 15 minutes to harbour and 30 minutes to the old town which is beautiful. We upgraded our room to get pool view and a few other goodies which was money well spent. Evening entertainment is a bit patchy but we enjoyed most nights. I would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Dear Kevin,  Thank you for leaving your review here, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a lovely holiday.  We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: excellent hotel
review: A really lovely, clean and welcoming hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Plenty of sunbeds, with a large clear fresh pool. Food was very good, plenty of choice.  Rooms were clean, fresh with reasonable space. Bed was very comfortable. Overall a really nice hotel within easy walking of the beach and port.

title: A fantastic stay!
review: Hello Sharron,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel
review: Really nice hotel with a wide variety of food and drink. Great entertainment throughout the day and in the evening. friendly staff in a friendly area. only ten minutes from the beach and 5 from the nearest shops.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Hotel fantastic, rooms lovely, large, airy dining room, great pool and plenty of sun beds. Great location, 5 minutes walk to a beautiful beach. Staff very polite and friendly, bar and restaurant staff can not do enough for you. Mauro and Mariela are fabulous, very friendly, they organise a great range of activities through the day and entertainment at night. Highly recommended.

title: Holiday
review: Jello Neecey,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time in our hotel and we hope to see you return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Mini paradise
review: We upgraded our room to a suite and it was worth the extra money. Lovely clean room and the cleaners did a nice job every morning. Food was quite expansive but not always the hottest. Most of the bar staff are brilliant but 1 or 2 are trying too hard by doing 2 or 3 people at once which can lead to wrong drinks being poured. Thomson need to rethink the transfer time as we landed at 19.15 and got to our room at 23.15 because of the waiting in the coach to leave the airport, the journey and the check in time here. Lovely beach and loads of shops towards the port area.

title: Holiday
review: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, we are pleased to hear about such a fantastic holiday of yours! We will keep doing our best to deliver the holiday experience of highest standards to our guests.  We will be hoping for your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Holiday!!
review: From when we first arrived at AluaSoul we had a good feeling about this holiday...the reception staff were very friendly (exactly what you need after only 3 hours sleep and a very long night) we were checked in very quickly and offered a glass of champagne as we stood waiting for the paper work to be sorted. Our room on the second floor was immaculate and the bed probably one of the biggest we've ever seen! Not huge rooms but big enough to be comfortable. The housekeepers are fantastic...keeping us tidy...which is no easy chore, trust me! Very helpful when I asked for extra coffee etc too!  The only thing we could say about the room that's not so positive is the fact we paid for a pool view...which we have but it can only be seen if we stand up! Not sure why the view is blocked…

title: Lovely holiday
review: Friendly staff, clean hotel, lovely pool, the food is always tasty and there is lots of options at every new time, the entertainment every night is good. There is lots to do in the day like water gym, wine tasting, shooting. Overall a very nice hotel

title: Brilliant holiday
review: Hello,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad that you enjoyed your time in our hotel! Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Sun and fun filled
review: Have had a brilliant week at the alua soul alcudia bay, when first arriving the staff were all so friendly the rooms have a very modern feel and are all very clean. Our Thomson rep ruby has been brilliant at helping us to learn about what's in the area and booking us onto some excursions.   The excursions that we did were brilliant, but also the hotels day time entertainment was very good Marco and Marcella were very welcoming and provided lots of good activities to do making it fun for everyone!! There is also free wifi in the hotel which is all over the resort and access to a computer also!   The food in the hotel was very good having lots of choice meaning there is something that pretty much everyone will like, the pool area by the hotel is really good and have plenty of sun…

title: Relaxing holiday
review: Hello Shannon,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are pleased to hear that you had such a wonderful time and enjoyed your holiday in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!  We hope to have the chance to welcome you again sometime soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely hotel, lovely holiday
review: We couldn't be any happier with the hotel, we've had lazy mornings (sometimes not getting up until 11am) and found a sunbed next to the pool easily.  The rooms are big, clean and modern, with memory foam super king beds with soft pillows. The bathroom lovely, I'm now wanting to go home and redecorate! We had a problem with our air-conditioning not working the first night, but within 10 minutes of telling reception it was fixed.  Entertain staff are lovely! Lots of different actives like rifle shooting, yoga, aqua relax, bingo etc and no pressure to join in if you want a real chill out. Bar staff couldn't do more for you either, coming to your table to ask if you want a drink in the evenings and all sorts.  Lots of range of drinks to have with all inclusive, cocktails and cava…

title: Loved it!
review: We had a fabulous stay here, all inclusive for 2 weeks for my birthday. All inclusive is definitely worth the money, we had every drink possible, multiple cocktails every night and it was so much fun! Bar staff were brilliant and had even memorised our order by the third day, constantly going out of their way for us.  Restaurant staff were fabulous, always smiling and friendly and up for a chat. Really enjoyed the a la carte option also and went twice! They gave a different menu the second time which was just as good and great to have the variety!   We loved the spa and had chocolate body scrubs done.  Refurb is still ongoing in a good way! The hotel are listening to everything everyone says, the menu changed while we were there and drinks are cheaper!   Always a sunbed…

title: Amazing!
review: Hello Bjkiwi,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful holiday and enjoyed your stay at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay! We will continue doing our best in delivering the service of high standards to our guests.  We hope to see you again sometime soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Beware of noise
review: We have just arrived home from an amazing stay at Alua Soul. We stayed for 4 nights and could not find a single thing wrong with this hotel.   We arrived late on Monday night so we missed dinner, however the hotel had set out a cold meal of cheese, meats, salad and bread so we did not go hungry.   The rooms are lovely.. (the beds are huge), very clean and everything you would need for a stay. The bed sheets were only changed once whilst we were there but we had no problem with that, and as we left our towels on the shower floor, they were changed every day.   The food is great, you will never go hungry! Lots of choice for breakfast, lunch and dinner in the restaurant, as well as snacks, ice creams etc at the pool bar. There's loads of drinks to choice from as well from the pool…

title: Very pleasantly surprised - lovely hotel!
review: Hello DJJones,  Thank you for your comment! We are delighted to hear what a great holiday you had in our hotel! We will continue working hard on improving our services to bring the unforgettable experience to our guests.  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: I wasnt bribed to write this one....
review: The hotel has recently been refurbished and it shows - the hotel sparkles especially the restaurant.The staff are very helpful and friendly and the staff clearing tables in the restaurant are very efficient and friendly.The food is good and a wide choice.We had a superior room overlooking the pool in the last two weeks of June 2017.Not sure if it  was just an "end of term" problem but for six nights our sleep was disturbed by about 500 teenagers arriving at the neighbouring  Disco Club between midnight and 1 - 30 a.m and leaving between 3 - 30 a.m and 5- 00 a.m - they sounded like a large football crowd in full voice.Apart from that an excellent holiday.

title: Lovely holiday. Recommended
review: We have just returned from a great holiday at the Aluasoul in Alcudia. The hotel has recently been redecorated and looked great. It is well situated for the beach, shops and only 2 bus stops from The old Alcudia  town - which you have to visit. The room was nice and comfortable with a useful balcony. We were on half board which we upgraded to include drinks with our evening meal. I would recommend others to do the same. The meals were all good although the menu might get a little monotonous if you stayed over a week. My only concern was that the hotel bar was very expensive if you were not on fully inclusive - €2.50 for a bag of crisps, €4 for an orange juice! We only used the bar once and we missed out on the evening entertainment- which looked and sounded good.

title: Could be better....
review: Hello Mike,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely holiday! We took note of your comment about the bar and will pass it to our management team.   We will be looking forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Not 4* platinum
review: Overall i was pretty satisfied staying here. 99% of the staff were great to be honest. Having a safe / fridge at no extra cost was a bonus. Food wise it could be improved as a lot of the time it was either warm - cold or not cooked . Shame really as most of the time it did look appealing ( so when i was watched going up more than once it was because the food was cold) but couldn't eat it !! The other issue i have is that paying for water with my food in the evening. I went HB but had to pay 2.50 euro for a glass of water. Why cant they just give you a glass at meal times??..they do so in the mornings and yes they switch the soft drinks machines off at Dinner !!   If you are HB and you will miss your Dinner ( for whatever reason) you can have a lunch instead just asked reception…

title: Nice stay
review: Hello Teddy,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience in such detail! It appears that there was a confusion - while you had your holiday in Cala d'Or, AluaSoul Mallorca Resort, this section on TripAdvisor is for AluaSoul Alcudia Bay.  Nevertheless, we appreciate your comment and we are glad that you had such a lovely holiday! We took note on your feedback and will address the issues mentioned.   We will be looking forward to your return!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Good stay
review: This hotel is basic and not 4* luxury it claims to be pool closes at 6pm the one bar (the pool bar) closes at 11pm on the dot Food is ok, tea and coffee machine switched off after breakfast so don't expect a cup of coffee after your evening meal, no drinks allowed by pool no waiter service anywhere no minibar in room, our Rep Shannon was a disgrace the welcome meeting lasted about 3 minutes was never told of any excursions, air con stopped working, refurb was a rush job and still have child's pool!! I could go on and on, people on here who say don't listen to negative comments are obviously not well travelled, I have stayed in hostels and 5* hotels and this hotel is a 3* at a push, they are charging platinum prices and giving you silver plated!!!!

title: Lovely relaxing stay
review: We have just returned from a fantastic 2 weeks all inclusive stay. Swift and very informative check in with Mary Ann, a super, clean and spacious room with a view on the top floor thank you (non superior) Food excellent in every sitting. Breakfast was good with cereals, full English and usual pasties always available maybe the addition of porridge could be a good idea. Lunch and evening meals always Meat and fish dishes freshly cooked veg  with a salad bar cheese and crackers in addition to sweets and fresh fruit. Cordoned off area as you enter the dining room I'm presuming is for superior guests. Maybe a hand gel dispenser on entry as in other hotels and the daily menu displayed giving you an insight into the food to be served. Also themed nights e.g. Indian, Mexico etc would…

title: Could do beter
review: Hello Mandy,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience in such detail! We are delighted that you had a wonderful holiday and enjoyed your stay at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!   We will be looking forward to your return!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Holiday 2017
review: 1 week away with my daughter .   First impressions good, however did not get a twin room, we had paid for, on asking why was told there was no twin rooms in the hotel on the pool side. Offered twin on opposite side with no view smaller and very bland .However the bed in original room , was a twin with a double mattress on. Reception staff explained they could nothing about it , anyway we were mother and daughter so it's was ok! Attitude was not good.   Rooms , modern well equipped again , clean , safe , air con , broke I was fed up of complaining . Stopped in the end. Just wanted to relax.  Pool area great  plenty of beds . No atmosphere !   Entertainment on the evening .. No polite words for this. We left the hotel every night 😁  Ala Carte restaurant: Awful, plate cracked food…

title: Lovely Stay
review: Hello Den,  Thank you for your comment. We regret to hear that there were issues during your stay and we will make sure to resolve them. We are glad to hear that you did have a nice holiday and enjoyed your time in Majorca.   We hope to have the chance to welcome you again so that we can demonstrate the improvements made.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: See you next year!
review: Decoration is fine. No problems with cleanliness.   Staff are really nice.   Pool area is lovely.   Rooms are ok but lack ironing board and iron.   Have to pay for bottled water and the bar could be open for longer.   Needs some more choice for evening meals but the food is good quality. Had a beautiful salmon fillet.   Has all the amenities around and only a five minute walk to the beach.

title: Lovely for a relaxing break
review: This hotel is newly refurbished and has been decorated nicely. The reception area looks impressive and the rooms are light and airy. You can't go hungry here, huge selection of food, pretty certain anyone could find something to eat.  The staff are very friendly and the entertainment duo- Mauro and Mariela work hard to entertain people but without being too intrusive if you don't want to join in.  A couple of small quibbles; the room cleanliness needs working on, the floors aren't cleaned it seems. They provide water in the room but I had to ask for more when it ran out plus the glasses provided weren't changed. The communal areas such as toilets in reception area need refurbishing next, they aren't in keeping with the re-decoration. There isn't much in terms of evening…

title: Amazing!!
review: Hello Odell,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable holiday and a lovely time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay! We took note of your comments and will address the issues. We are working hard on improving our service and we appreciate your feedback.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you again at Alua!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Mrs christine pickford
review: One of the best holidays of my life, the staff at the hotel were very friendly, I definitely recommend going all inclusive. We opted for a superior room which was really nice, the pool area makes for a really nice place to relax, and the hotel is in a handy location for the beach, pharmacy etc but also not too loud, the area is really nice couldn't recommend enough will definitely be coming back!

title: Great stay
review: Hello Kateaislinn,  Thank you for sharing your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful holiday!  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Nice hotel
review: I have just returned from the Aluasoul was there for a week from 19/7/17 . I could not fault the hotel the staff all very friendly and helpful. The room was with pool view and was spotlessly clean . The dinning room was large and airy all tables and chairs set for couples and not squashed together. Food was excellent loads of choices and varied each day . There is entertainment on every night which in my opinion were very good . The pool area was big ,spotless plenty of sun beds people did put towels on beds but still plenty to go around what ever time you went .The Activities team were very polite and friendly only asked if you wanted to participate but not in your face there was loads of activities to do . I will be going back and like to thank all the staff for having…

title: Lovely staff
review: Spend 1 week her with my best friend! Lovely staff, nice pool area, alt a lot to choose from in the breakfast buffet:-) would without doubt come back here some other time. You can also pay a 20 euro deposit to rent beach tovels, super practical!

title: June 2017
review: Hello Lejlaobr,  Thank you for your review, we are delighted to hear that you had such wonderful time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!   Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Perfect hotel for a relaxing break
review: Me and my partner booked this before the hotel had it's face lift, and upon reading the reviews on here just after the opening we can admit were a little bit apprehensive about our stay but I can happily say that we were beyond pleasantly surprised. First of all the food is great, we stayed half board and upgraded to unlimited dinner drinks and there was always such a great choice of food, being that breakfast or dinner.   There were always plenty of spare sun lounges around the pool which has stunning views of the mountains. Beach is 10 min walk max, and If you wanted to venture into the town centre it was only a 20 minute walk max.  The room was lovely, we paid for a superior room with a pool view, and there was a complimentary bottle of water waiting for us in the room, which…

title: Lovely relaxing holiday
review: Hello Pete,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely holiday at Alua! We will continue the hard work to provide the service of the highest standards.  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Holiday!
review: This adult only hotel is just perfect for a relaxing break. Newly refurbished, every area of the hotel looks amazing! The best I've stayed in. Rooms are very clean. Good range of quality food at meal times. Great location for the beach and old town too! Highly recommended!!

title: Pleasant stay
review: Lovely hotel with excellent facilities and entertainment. Good choice of meals and nice food.  Only criticism is that there could have been nicer deserts to match the main meals, and our room floors were not cleaned and bedding not changed during our entire visit. An improvement in these 3 area would make this an excellent hotel.  Regards

title: Best holiday
review: Hello,  Thank you for your comment, we took note and will work on improving the areas mentioned. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again sometime soon!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: 2017 holiday
review: Nice hotel, friendly employees and the food is perfect.  I Definitely recommend for everyone. The drinks are Nice and cold and the swimmingarea is a very Nice area  to relax! And good for activities like pingpong, football, aerobics, gymnastics and yoga. There is also a gym and spa

title: Amazing Time
review: Hello Ross,  Thank you for your comment, we will be awaiting your return!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Week away
review: Our stay at this hotel was really good. the entertainment team Mauro and Mariana were very friendly and there was always something to do. There was a good choice of meals available in the restaurants and at pool bar. The rooms were very nice and the beds comfortable. Overall a very good hotel.

title: Great HOILDAY
review: We have just returned from an amazing week at this hotel and will defo be going back next year. rooms are beautiful food amazing and staff even better ..massive shout out to Marcella AND mariuo..sorry spelt your name wrong there were fab and friendly and not to pushy but take the time to join in you wont regret it..staff were fab and nothing to much trouble  .No stress for sunbeds Jesus kept our glasses full and great sense of humour our only gripe was Men not dressing for dinner  my hubby put full length pants on some men had flip flops on at dinnerGreat location we will be booking for next year see you then.x

title: Fantastic staff, brilliant hotel
review: Hello Abmccann47,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy that you had such a lovely time and enjoyed your holiday with Alua!  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lovely Hotel
review: I am ludicrously picky when it comes to travel and I have travelled widely - but I can confidently state that this hotel is great.  :: The staff are fantastic; friendly but very professional and hard working  :: The food is sensational ::  The rooms are spotless, with enormous beds and fabulous showers :: The pool is beautiful with plenty of room for 'proper' swimming.  Alcudia Old Town is a little gem, about 20 minutes walk away or a short taxi ride. The beach, about five minutes' walk, stretches as far as you can see but is best visited when the sun has lost its intense heat.  We stayed five nights and it was the perfect spot for a short, sun-drenched break. I recommend the AluaSoul totally. No, I haven't been paid to write this. I'm just your average package holiday punter.

title: Fab, Relaxing Week
review: Hello Rebecca,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and enjoyed your holiday! We will continue working hard on improving all elements of our guests' service to provide the experience of high standards.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Apprehension
review: We stayed her for a long weekend, flew out early Friday and home Monday evening. Hotel was lovely clean, modern and friendly!  Food was great with plenty to choose from, changed every meal time and different every day. I would recommend going all inclusive as drinks are very expensive!  Room was absolutely lovely, Bed was huge and very comfortable. Shower was fantastic! Towels were changed every day if you left them in the shower. Air conditioning was very good. Our balcony faced the pool. Coffee making facilities but these weren't refreshed (we were all inclusive so think they should have been) lovely dressing gowns (didn't use as too hot) and Slippers. Arm band doubles up as Key for room which was great! Safe in bedroom. Late check out was €45 which I think was a bit much for…

title: You get what you pay for... an honest review
review: There are good and bad in this review, so please read both sides of the story... I'll start with the bad!  - We stayed half board but found out that there would be no drinks included. None. You only get one bottle for free as a welcome to the resort. Not only that, but the drinks are incredibly over priced in the hotel. Worst being €12 for a single Bacardi and Coke. I don't think I've ever come across a more over-priced drink anywhere in the world (and I've been to many places on many continents!). I would advise stocking your mini fridge with bottled water and cans of soft drinks from the local LIDL.  - Breakfast is OK but dinner is pretty awful. And I'm not usually one to complain about food. On the surface it looks like there's lot of choice but the food is very bland and low…

title: Fantastic holiday!
review: Hello Brendan,  Thank you for your comment. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we took note of the issues you mentioned to continue improving our service. We would like to mention that the official rating of the hotel is published on our website, and it is a 4-star hotel.   We hope that you had a wonderful holiday and hope for your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Room321
review: We booked this holiday independently and not through Thomsons and we can only give high credit to the amazing booking experience from start to finish - very efficient and friendly personnel. The front desk staff and management were very efficient and always happy to listen to any little criticisms and rectify as soon as possible. We stayed in superior rooms on the 5th floor which overlooked the pool. The bed was enormous and sooo comfy, great facilities i.e. coffee machine (which we didn't use), kettle with tea/coffee which was replenished when requested, fresh bottle of water every day (although I think only the case if you were AI), a fridge, toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. We had read a lot of reviews regarding overflowing showers but didn't have any problems whatsoever.…

title: A lovely week at this hotel
review: Hello Kim,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we are glad to hear that you had such enjoyable time and a wonderful holiday in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay! We will continue working hard on improving all elements of our service.  We will be looking forward to your return!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Very relaxing
review: I would like to say a great thanks to all the staff of the AluaSoul Alcudia bay. The stay was very good and as it a new branded  hotel I wish it the very best in the future and before you read all the bad review this must have been as it was in it transformation. It is now outstanding.It even has its own talented entertainment  team Mariela and her talented Mauro.

title: Not a disappointment
review: When we visited the Aluasoul, we were pleased with what we saw, after reading so many bad reports.  It was lovely and clean, not overcrowded, and offered a good selection of food.  We stayed half board.  We like to go out in the evenings so never really seen the entertainment at night but the daytime activities were adequate for what we had expected.  The only negative thing was the food was not hot enough for our liking. This may have been made worse because the air con in the dining room was always quite cool. Otherwise we enjoyed a quiet, relaxing break at the Aluasoul and would return again.

title: Hotel was very disappointing
review: Hello Audrey,  Thank you for your feedback, we are glad that you enjoyed your stay and had a wonderful time at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. We hope to have the chance to welcome you again sometime soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: All inclusive
review: Original room was disappointed with as staying for 2 weeks and the view was the street below .Reception did update us with a pool view at the extortionate cost of  196 euros which we were told was half price as it was a superior room .The only difference was it had a coffee machine which was so small and we were told we had to buy the coffee etc .not a good start. Also clothes hanging in the open no doors or drawers for clothes nothing about this hotel or the room said platinum 4star .We had been assurred the refurbishment was complete unfortunately this was not the case .They were still painting our corridor walls as an Asthma sufferer not good and pool bar they were drilling in so dust everywhere did not feel clean for 2 weeks .photos sent to tour operator as so bad. Everyone…

title: Don't know why this hotel has so many bad reviews
review: Hello Jack,  Thank you for your comment. We regret that your stay was rather disappointing. It is true that there were some teething problems due to recent refurbishment work, and our staff address the issues in the quickest way possible. Most of the issues have already been resolved. It is normal for a newly refurbished hotel to have this type of issues and we thank you for your understanding. We took note of your comments and will send them to our management team for future improvements. Your feedback is important to us, as we work hard on improving all elements of our guests' holiday.  We hope that you enjoyed your holiday and we invite you to return to the hotel so that we have the chance to demonstrate the improved service and provide you an experience of highest standards.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great holiday
review: I write this review as I have over thirty five years experience  as a chef  and like to give praise when praise is due the food is very good and well presented ,the fish is cooked to order and a very good selection from John dory to sole fillet.Please look after your young chefs as this the back bone of business from  Mr willies

title: FABULOUS HOLIDAY!!
review: We arrived back last Tuesday from a week's holiday at the hotel, was apprehensive about going after reading the reviews but couldn't fault anything, I really can't understand  what some people are thinking!! A Thomson Rep was in the hotel every day, should you require anything. All staff were efficient, friendly, great service from the checking in at reception, the bar staff, entertainment especially Mauro and all staff in the restaurants, Rooms:  Were very clean, light and modern, plenty big enough and enough storage, comfortable beds, no problems with the shower water going on to the floor, we had a room at the back of the hotel, which was quieter and cooler as the sun was not on it in the afternoon, towels changed daily and room cleaned daily no complaints. Food:  In the…

title: Brilliant Holiday!!!
review: Hello Sedgewick2016,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we are happy to hear that you had such wonderful time and enjoyed your holiday with Alua! We took note of your comments and will pass them to our management team so that they feel proud of our service and staff.  We will be looking forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: FANTASTIC HOTEL     HOLLAND 515
review: My wife and I had doubts when we read negative reports about this hotel but I assure you folks there is nothing to worry about. Staff are friendly, rooms clean, lovely big comfy bed, towels changed every day, restaurant food is good.  The staff at reception were very friendly and helpful.  As to the comments made by DerbyshireBliss is all nonsense.  We too checked out at midday and still received all inclusive facilities and had our lunch, evening meal and all drinks up till we got picked up from coach at 7.20 pm.  We were given a bracelet which was used to get into your room, there is no key so how some people are saying the bracelet didn't exist is rubbish.  There is reserved seating at restaurant and pool area.  If you don't know where these are then ask at reception which I…

title: Great Holiday
review: Hello Philip,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such wonderful holiday and enjoyed your stay at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay! We will continue working hard on providing the service of highest standards.  We will be looking forward to your return!  Kind regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: VERY RESTFUL
review: Just returned from a fabulous 2wk holiday which we nearly didnt go on after reading some of the stupid reviews by people either suffering from to much sun or under the influence of drink or even a different hotel.We would definitely recommend this hotel and are looking forward to returning anytime soon.If buy any chance you do have a query Jon the assist. manager is always out and about not sat in an office and is very easy to talk to.As for the other members of staff from the bar to the dining room nothing was to much trouble always smiling and helpful.As for the food we did go All Inclusive and would do so again as it was excellent lunch and dinner.Last but not least theres MAURO who made every single day a pleasure to be there.P.S. It was nice not having to get up at crack of…

title: Great stay
review: Perfect place for a relaxing stay at a clean and modern hotel, with a calm and spacious pool area. Recently renovated. Very nice and helpful staff. Sometimes a queue at the outside bar though. Restaurant has typical buffet choices. Very willing to hear any suggestions for any improvements. Overall a great stay. Would recommend.

title: Very good, exellent food.
review: Small, but very nice standard room. Pool area is really fine. The staff is so kindley. The breakfast is super, you can find a lot off thinngs to eat, doesn't miss anything. Quite hotell. Good lunch. Very good.

title: Amazing experience
review: Maybe the best hotel in my life. Execellt service. The breakfast is AMAZING,you have everything. Overall the hotel is very fresh and have a lot of activities. Really good food at the pool resturant. The poolarea is very big and quiet.

title: Very happy with our stay
review: Amazing breakfastbuffe and very plesant staff. Great Pool and very clean rooms. A very Nice atmosphere and a great mix of a calm and fun hotel. There are Always activties and something to do. We have had a great experimence living at This hotel.

title: Amazing hote
review: The room is fresh and new. The food is fresh and a lot of food to choose. The employees is lovely and cares about you and the experience is fantasric. The hotel is close to the alcudia beach. Just 3 min walk to the beach.

title: Fresh hotel
review: Went as a couple to relax. The hotel is so clean and modern and the staff are so kind and friendly. The food is great and I recommend the all inclusive. The hotel has a lot of activities like yoga, watergym, cooking class etc which was very fun.

title: Excellent staff
review: We are very pleased about the hotel. The room is lovely. The staff are very friendly, specially in the restaurant: JUAN, JOAQUINA, ANA and JOSE LUIS. But all of the staff are Attentive to all our requests.

title: Nice and tidy.
review: Clean and tidy rooms. Good food and  the hotelstaff was pleasant. The rooms have good beds and a good size. Can bee recommended. The hotel was plased in the middle of Alcudia, between the "dollar street" and Alcudia bay. Quiet place.

title: Lovely relaxing holiday
review: My husband and I returned yesterday from a week half board at the Aluasoul Alcudia Bay.  We arrived late in the evening after dinner but a cold meal had been prepared for us.  We could find no fault with the hotel, the staff or the experience as a whole. The food was good quality, the hotel spotlessly clean and without exception the staff were pleasant, helpful and welcoming. Pool area clean and pleasant. No problem finding a sunbed and beautiful beaches a short walk away. All in all a fabulous holiday - would definitely return.

title: Lovely staff
review: The service is very nice. We loved the balinese beds. The staff is lovely. We like how it has been refurbished. The lifeguard, Esther, is really funny and lovely. The staff made our holiday. The hotel is perfectly clean and nice. The people doing the room are lovely. Sofia and Jesus and the rest of the staff are very friendly and get people in the mood, make people have a better time. Really enjoyed it. We will come back again!!!

title: A great new find
review: I am writing to allay any fears regarding this hotel.  It is clean, bright and airy having undergone a recent revamp.  Much of previous criticism has arisen I think due to teething problems as a result of this.   The staff are amazing, the food is excellent - well cooked and presented with plenty of choice.  The pools are beautiful, fully completed and well maintained. My only criticism is that storage space in the rooms is a little lacking but the staff are doing their best to address such issues when brought to their attention.  There are plenty of free sun beds so no getting up at some ungodly hour as is the norm in some hotels.  A great find.

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Hello Jenny,  Thank you for your comment! We are happy to hear that you had such a lovely stay at Alua! We hope to have the chance to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Perfect
review: Went as a family of five. Upon arrival, we found that it was a fabulous hotel with warm, cheerful and friendly staff. The food was excellent all week and the rooms were beautifully laid out with really comfy beds. Overall it was a fantastic holiday and we would come again. Thoroughly recommend to everyone.

title: Great relaxing holiday
review: Hello Michaelathorn,  Thank you for sharing your comment, we are glad to hear that you had a wonderful time in the hotel and hope that your holiday was a great one.  Looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel
review: Staff are really welcoming, friendly and helpful. The room was a lot better than expected, good value for money. The hotel serves an amazing selection of good quality food, a step above your average hotel spread. Actually look forward to eating every morning/evening!   The beach is just a short walk away, with lots of activities available, there is also plenty of space even in the middle of the day.

title: Great holiday for mummy and baby bear
review: So after a lot of bad reviews we was worried and wondering what to expect... but of course there was no need.  The pool area, restaurants and rooms are very clean and well kept. A few great extras you get with this hotel is a powerful shower, free WiFi, safe, mini fridge, tea/coffee, slippers and a robe in your room on arrival. We arrived late to the hotel to find that reception had order us a cold dinner.   During our stay the balcony door and aircon needed sorting. This was in fact done within 30mins of telling staff members.   The entertainment team and staff here are fab and will do everything possible to make your stay enjoyable and relaxing. This hotel is situated in a great place if your wanting a quite holiday. Its also close to the harbour and bars.  Overall thanks for…

title: Good hotel
review: Hello Laura,  Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you had such a lovely holiday at Alua!   We hope to see you again some time soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing Hotel
review: Good family hotel with lots of different activities to do and an all round good family holiday. The food it also great with lots of different choices  Would highly recommend.  The rooms were excellent and the beds very comfy  The pool area is magnificent and the spa area is excellent

title: July - faultless
review: Hello Owain,  Thank you for commenting, we are glad that you enjoyed your stay! We will be looking forward to your return!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great hotel, don't listen to all the moaners
review: From reading the bad reviews before coming here I contacted Thomson's and asked to be moved hotels.  They wouldn't move us and I'm so glad they didn't!! This hotel is amazing, Reception very friendly & organised when we arrived late at night - even had some food waiting for us! Rooms are fantastic, can't fault them! Shower is great and the bed is huge and comfortable- can't fault it! Restaurant is great with lots of food choice. The entertainment is great both in the daytime and in the evening. We are a group of 9 aged from 16 to 89 and we are all loving the hotel. We especially love the fact that it's a small friendly hotel, no rushing for sun beds, the restaurant is a pleasant atmosphere! So far an amazing holiday!  You won't be disappointed!!

title: Great hotel!
review: Just back from a great week half board.  The hotel is lovely, rooms are very nicely decorated, (maybe another drawer or two might have been useful). They were cleaned daily, towels changed each night. The double bed was huge and so comfortable.  Pool area is very spacious, nicely zoned off into lounging and sitting areas. Food was good, typical buffet style with a great selection, for £3.75 per day extra you get free drinks with your meal (wine, beer, coke etc.) .  The staff really made the hotel, they couldn't do enough for you special mention to Katy on reception and Joaquina in the restaurant.  Location is also brilliant - right next to a bus stop, beach only 5 min walk, shops and bars on every corner.  Loved that it was adults only, meant the pool/jacuzzi/spa were quiet and…

title: Lovely newly refurbished Hotel
review: I'm writing this review on our last day of our stay. We have been here for a week and wish it was for longer. Everything is newly refurbished and beautiful. The room is very stylish and the bed huge (important as I tend to wake my partner up with my rolling about, but not on this super sized bed).  The food is really good. Tasty and plenty of choice. The staff are very friendly. Especially in the dining room. There is nightly entertainment, though we tended to enjoy from the balcony with a bottle of cava. Close to lidel for cheap beer and wine to stock up the good sized fridge in the room. The spa area is very nice. Funky lighting and smells like it is brand new.   The hotel is in a good location, 5 mins walk to the beach. A few good bike hire shops nearby, good for us as we…

title: Incredible holiday
review: Before arriving I was, like everybody else, apprehensive about this hotel due to the bad reviews. However, we are currently on our last day of our holiday and cannot say enough positive things about the hotel. It is clear the reviews have been taken into consideration. Water in the room was replaced when empty, the patio doors locked, and the air con worked for the full duration of our stay. There were plenty of sunbeds available at any time of day which meant nobody had to get up at the crack of dawn to reserve them. The staff were all incredibly welcoming and had constant smiles on their faces (especially Mauro and Mariela who put on a wide range of daytime activities, and made an effort to talk to the guests and get to know them a little). The location was excellent - a short…

title: A great vacation
review: We have stayed at this hotell for two weeks and could not be happier. The service is great and room is very nice. It is only a ten minutes walk from the beach. Recomend everyone to stay at this hotel, you will feel like at home.

title: Fab hol
review: We,'ve had a great time at this hotel the staff are amazing the hotel is clean the food is lovely something for everyone,hotel facilities include a spa and massage highly recommend plenty of sunbeds and activities will definately be back👍

title: Summer 2017
review: Staff are friendly and helpful. Facilities are very good and the hotel is very clean. The hotel is close to the beach and lots of shops and bars within walking distance. Food has been excellent. We will come back again.

title: BRILLIANT HOTEL!
review: Hello Grafield,  Thank you for your comment, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Alua!  We will be looking forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: So much care in everything
review: Visited for week as a couple, when we arrived reception was very helpful and the room was ready before we arrived at 11 in the morning which was a surprise as we've had to wait else where! ALL the staff are welcoming, helpful, polite and try to make an effort with you when possible. The pool bar staff especially are brilliant! MAURO, JESUS, FRAN AND SOPHIA are very welcoming and ALWAYS SMILING!  The pool and the room is very good also your almost guaranteed to get subbed any time of the day! No waking up at a ridiculous time to reserve one!   The food could have a wider range, slightly repetitive but it's the same as any all inclusive hotel! The food that's served is good!   Entertainment was good every night we stayed without fail, it caters for old and younger generations.  …

title: We don't understand the bad reviews
review: Hello Zach,  Thank you for your comment, we are delighted that you had such fantastic time at Alua! We will keep doing our best to deliver the services of highest standards!   We are looking forward to your return!   Best regards,  Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Fabulous holiday!
review: The title would be a good summary of our experience here. This is our first time in Mallorca, first time in Alcudia and definitely not the last in this hotel. We have received so much care and love from the staff here. This is a refurnished hotel and everything is new so for us this was somethhing good. The bed is really comfortable and the room cozy, clean and well designed.  There are two pools, one is big and the other one just 0,40m watter, nice for sitting there with a book and keep yourself fresh while you read.  There is a gym, they are still adding things on it but it is already nice, and also a spa with a jacuzzi and two baths.  So much choice for food, and the entertainment is very nice. There is one new girl so now Mauro has some help. They are adding some new games…

title: Relaxing place for couples
review: The rooms are very clean. The food is excellent, there is a good selection of food. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The poolside is relaxing and quite, they do a good job cleaning it 😎 It is well located, not too far you can go for a walk, the city is close too.

title: Great Holiday
review: Hello Emeakin2,  Thank you for sharing, we are happy that you enjoyed your stay at AluaSoul Alcudia Bay!  We will be looking forward to your return!   Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great location, wonderful staff
review: Overall a great holiday in a lovely hotel. Staying here for 18 days and having a good time with very good food and nice staff. Hopefully we can come back here very soon. Thanks for all and see you next time.

title: Reviews don't do this justice!!
review: Hello Fpilz2017,  Thank you for sharing your comment, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time at Alua, and we will be looking forward to seeing you again!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Amazing hotel
review: Great location in Alcudia close to the beach but quiet area. Food is OK, varied buffé with lots to choose from, even for no-meateaters. We had half board.
