The best part is the staff, in all areas, friendly and helpful, patient if you want to practice you basic Spanish knowledge. Most of them speak english and some even more languages. We arrived very late and was positively surprised to find a meal, prepared and waiting for us. Good start on our holiday. Typical standard evening shows, simple bar, nice small pool area. Room clean and all you can expect, no spectacular view, but still ok.

title: Much better than expected
review: Before travelling to Aluasoul Alcudia Bay I was very dubious after reading reviews submitted by other holidaymakers. Thankfully there was no need to worry. I spoke to other people staying there who were so worried that they had asked to change their holiday prior to travel but were told by Thomson that they would lose 80% of money paid and advised to ask for a move if they were dissatisfied on arrival!  I have stayed at numerous 4/5 * hotels and this is neither the best not the worst but perfectly acceptable. Rooms are clean and modern although a little more storage would be useful. Pool area is well kept and spacious with adequate number of beds,although they aren't the most comfortable. Food is varied but could be a little warmer and replenished more quickly at times. Gents…

title: Didn`t need to worry!
review: Stayed 14th ~ 28th June 2017. After what we saw on TV and comments made we were a bit concerned. Did not to need to worry it was brilliant. We stayed on the 4th floor after asking for a top floor room but it was ok. Staff were all excellent. Food in the restaurant excellent. Pool area excellent. Room excellent although you need the slippers provided as the floor gets quite dusty and needs a wipe over by the cleaning staff daily..Definitely Tui  Platinum.

title: Disappointing stay
review: Hello joshua36,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you are so pleased with your stay with us. Hope you highly enjoyed yourself in Majorca. We will make sure to pass your comments to our management team  We are looking forward to seeing you again Alcudia!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great food, great hotel, average location
review: Stayed here the first week in June, so a little late with review. Rooms - we had a pool view room. Large bed which was comfortable and room nicely decorated. Cleaning was pretty poor though and nothing is ever restocked. Facilities in room quite good, but staying all inclusive expected some stock in fridge on arrival (at least water). Spoke to reception who told me where Lidl was and that they were happy for us to bring shopping into hotel! Location - we actually found this a positive. No clubs nearby to keep you awake into the early hours, close to the port (approx. 15 mins walk), close to bus stops to go literally anywhere you wanted in Majorca and about a 20-25min walk to Alcudia old town. Food - Found this average to be honest, nothing too bad - you could always find…

title: Great hotel! Give it a chance
review: Dear tinker025,  Thank you so much for your opinion. We will make sure the management team gets your comments. We are working to improve our products and services for our guests to have the stay they're expecting.  We apologize for any discomfort the refurbishment caused you. Hope you give us another chance so you can see the improvements.  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resort

title: Great last minute holiday!
review: Me and a friend booked this a last minute getaway 2 days before we flew out. After reading some of the reviews on here I really wasn't sure what the hotel would be like, but upon arrival we were very happy with it. It is obvious that the hotel has undergone a massive refurbishment, it was all very modern. The all inclusive wrist bands were also your door key!   The rooms are lovely, with a gorgeous waterfall walk in shower. The pool area is lovely, plenty of sunbeds so you don't have to worry about getting to the pool early. The drinks included in the all inclusive were great, from branded alcohol, to cocktails, to spirits and cava! Drinks stop at 11.30 and the bar closes shortly after. But if you want more of a nightlife then you can walk 2 minutes round the corner to a few…

title: Aluasoul /beware
review: Hello Ellie J,  Thank you so much for your review. We are happy to hear you had a good time in AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. With every comment we get we'll improve our products and services for our guests.  Hope you consider to come to us again!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Lizf
review: Went half board had to pay for bottled water with our meals a glass of water with your meal is not free unbelievable.You book your room with a balcony pay extra and arrive to find 3 big bushy trees blocking any view and sun so be careful.When arriving no evening meal,as soon as you arrive be prepared to pay your spanish tax.The reception staff are not warm and friendly .The thomson reps dont understand anything and dont come back to you,find every thing out yourself,and arrange your own return pick up as wont be in the book as stated the reps do.No one tells you what events are happening in the hotel you guess and miss it.

title: Way below Thomson rating
review: Dear gilly1000,  Thank you for your opinion. We are sorry to hear you have that experience. We are working on improving our guests' stay so we will make sure the hotel's management team knows about your feedback.   Hope you give us another chance so we can show you all the improvements.  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Mis-sold by Thomson.
review: Arrived on 13th June for one week.  As everyone else we were expecting the worse. WRONG the hotel is clean, fresh and modern.  We had room 515 which had a perfect shower, large bed and pool view.  We never used the coffee machine but asked the maid for satchets of coffee plus more toiletries when required.  The patio door locked, the air conditioning stayed on when we left the room and the bracelet key is a great improvement on cards.  As we don't go on holiday to watch tv both BBC and itv was available on the flat screen tv. Free wi Fi works all over the hotel and bar area and the free safe is a bonus. Don't blame the hotel but Thompson for the miselling and enjoy your holiday.

title: Better than expected however slightly miss sold
review: After booking this hotel and reading recent reviews we didn't have great expectations of it. On arrival we were pleasently surprised at how modern and new it looked. The room was great and looked exactly like the pictures and did exceed our expectations apart from being slightly dusty. The bed was comfortable and very large with a great TV including plenty of UK channels. The bathroom had a brilliant and modern shower, however the glass screen on it wasn't big enough so the floor often became rather wet. The sink was also leaky which we didn't realise until the night before our last day however maintenance was up quickly to fix the issue.  The pool area looked nothing like the photos when we booked it and considering the image is still up of it on the Thomson website this could…

title: Great rooms! Amazing for couples.
review: Hello LEKA36,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for any maintenance issues during your stay, since the hotel is been recently refurbished the hotel. We hope we can improve our products and services with all your comments in oder to provide a high quality holiday experience.  Hope you give us another chance so you can see the improvements.  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Hotel just ok & miss sold to by Thomsons.
review: I had no expectations for this hotel, as it was booked the same day as I arrived and was amongst the cheepest one available for the selected days.  The pool- and outside area is not very impressive, but works just fine. The inside on the other hand is pretty okey. It looks as if they have upgraded the inside of the hotel pretty recently and just not managed to renovate the poolarea yet. My room was really tidy and nice. And their bathrobes was silky smooth and soft. I could not get the aircondition to work when I was not there though. You get keys as bracelets, and not as keycards, and it seemed as if the sensor noticed when you left. I never bothered to ask the employees.  The continental breakfast was good. The location is a bit outlying(from the sentrum and restaurants), but…

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: Hello jsnn,  Thank you for sharing your experience. We did actually refurbished the hotel and will keep working on improving the facilities for next season. We will be also improving our products and services, so we took note of your opinion.  We hope to welcome you again very soon!  Kind regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: All you need to relax
review: We arrived on 10/06 with little expectation of this hotel given some of the reviews on here but wanted to give it every chance. First impressions were ok, nice reception area very bright & modern.  We had a superior room which was nice with a very comfortable bed & a good shower. However, there was no English TV until our fifth day & the patio door didn't lock. The food & drink in general was fine although the prices for those staying half board were way over the top. As all inclusive guests we never had water or coffee replaced in our room. Now to Thomson who we feel have badly let us down. We had no welcome meeting at the hotel (it was only by chance that we actually found the rep) We were sold a superior room with reserved pool & restaurant area which never existed, there was…

title: Week in the Sun at AluaSoul - Majorca
review: We have just completed a relaxing week in Majorca, indeed I type this review on our last night before departing first thing tomorrow morning.  Given the array of different ratings, I feel compelled to write an early review.  Before we departed for Majorca we requested a change of hotel (this was primarily based on the reviews on Trip Advisor of AluaSoul).  Thomson were not interested in moving us, and went further by saying they did not recognise Trip Advisor reviews, which is just laughable given that Thomson has the Trip Advisor links on their website.   We were very concerned at the reviews, but we had no choice but to give the place a try.  I have to say that our experience bares no comparison to the vast majority of concerns that have been raised.  I would go further and…

title: Aluasoul alcudia bay
review: Hello Stephen,  Thank you for sharing your experience, we believe that your review will be very helpful for many travelers. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Alua. We are constantly improving our service, so we took note of the issues you mentioned and we will make sure that they are addressed.  We hope to welcome you again when you return to Majorca!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Better than expected
review: I've just spent a week away with the family to the very welcoming hotel,absolutely amazing rooms.the new Idea of a key on your wrist is a excellent idea. Food was great can't complain there's a choice for everyone. The bar staff were incredible lovely genuine staff that made us all feel welcome again as we previously came here a couple of years ago always been lovely and helpful it was sad to say goodbye to them all . Definitely coming back again next year for longer then a week. Only criticism would be the lack of entertainment on the night wasn't much but I do understand that there's work being done still so I understand apart from that it's been a pleasure to of been at aluasoul alcudia bay thank you very much. Lots of love

title: Set the record straight
review: Hello Lachlan,  Thank you for your comment and thank you for your kind words! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that you had a fantastic holiday! We will pass your comment about evening entertainment to our management team for future improvements.   We hope for your return, we will be happy to welcome you again at Alua Alcudia Bay!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Pros and a couple of cons
review: I was cautious on arrival due to the negative media attention surrounding the hotel regarding its completion. I was pleased to find the hotel finished and clean. The reception and dining area are modern and spacious. The buffet service was good- a wide selection of food in the morning and night.   The room I stayed in was beautiful. Although the bathroom tiles were not finished to the high standard of the rest of the hotel- the sealing was very sloppy and ruined the overall appearance, making the room look dirty- see pictures. I wouldn't expect this from a Thomson 'platinum' hotel but in all the circumstances I was expecting much worse.   Overall a very pleasing stay and I would recommend to all my acquaintances.

title: Bad treatment by Thomson
review: Came here as the hotel I should have been in not ready, but neither was this .   More furniture arrived each day we were there.   Food basic more like  2 star  than 4. Breakfast each day was a joke with us, saying  what is new today . Meat was often still raw . Don't expect different types of salads  or different things to try as it was 1 meat , 1 fish and 1 chicken dish. Had leaks over the shower  which we could see growing and reported 3 times but didn't bother  reporting 4/5.  Corridors dirty, floor covering  covered in paint and builders dust.  1 bar by the pool  that was also used for the evening .  Drinks very expensive if half board  Walk to the beach was 15 minutes away but another 20/30  to the  restaurants  and bars.

title: Fantastic Hotel, Must Read Review
review: Dear cheryldewy36,  Thank you for your opinion. We are sorry to hear you have that experience. We apologize for the all inconveniences. We have refurbished the hotel not so long so we are working hard on improving everything for our guests to enjoy their holidays. We will make sure the hotel's managing team knows about your feedback.  Hope you give us another chance so we can show you all the improvements.  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Clean but water isn't part of half board meals
review: We booked this hotel way back in January and were sold by the write up by Thompson gave with there 4 star platinum rating and the planned pictures they advertise. Throughout May (we travelled on the 30th) I became concerned by the negative reviews and comments on Facebook people gave for this hotel. All i can say is that these reviews must have been based on the hotel getting up and running because this hotel is fantastic! NOTHING to be worried about if you have a holiday booked here.  Hotel - Looks great. The designer did a fantastic job, the only downside would be the workmanship. Nothing greatly stands out, but you do notice messy work throughout the week in the neater details - not enough to spoil the hotels 'look' in my opinion though. On one or two days in the mornings…

title: Luxury - you are having a laugh!
review: Dear Luke,  Thank you so much for your feedback, we are very happy to hear you had an enjoyable holiday. We apologize again for work inconvenience, we know that can disturb some guests.  We are working hard on improving the products and services. We will make sure to let the hotel's manager and staff know about all your lovely comments.  We hope you come back to Alcudia, so you can see all the improvements that will make your next stay even better.   Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Chilled out week
review: It's clean, good location which reasonable facilities.  I can't give anything higher than 'terrible' to a place that doesn't let you have water as part of half board meals.   Food availability was dire if not in designated meal times.

title: An enjoyable stay!
review: My husband and I have just come back after spending two weeks at the AluaSoul hotel.  Luckily there weren't many reviews on Trip Advisor when we booked as I think we would have been put off however, we have had an enjoyable holiday.    The hotel itself is very modern, the beds large and comfortable and we found all staff to be friendly and helpful.  It is clear that as it is newly renovated, there were a few teething problems (toilet not fixed to the wall in spa) and some minor renovations still being done however, we did not let this affect our holiday.   The food in the restaurant was great with a wide variety being provided each day.  It was always hot and the waiting staff were very attentive.  The only thing we felt let it down was the fact that all drinks had to be paid…

title: Good hotel, but not quite ready....
review: Dear emma051188, Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to hear you had an enjoyable holiday. Sorry for the teething problems, we are working hard on improving the products and services. We will make sure to let the hotel know about all your comments. We hope you come back to Alcudia, so we can demonstrate all the improvements and all the hotel's potential so your next stay is more than satisfactory.  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Awful, avoid.
review: Me and my boyfriend arrived 27th of May at midnight. We had a superior room with breakfast only.   Cons:  We were met by friendly people at the front desk upon check-in. When we came up to our room we quickly noticed that there were some pipes missing from our sink. We went to wash our hands and the water came splashing at us. This happened because the pipe connecting the sink to the wall was missing.  We informed the front desk as soon as we saw this, but since it was midnight and no other superior rooms available at that time, we had to stay the night in a regular room for 1 night, which didn't really bother me and my boyfriend, so we were fine with it. The next day they had fixed the sink in our previous room so we moved to that room again. To say sorry for the inconvenience,…

title: Be better when hotel is totally refurbished !
review: Dear benedicte523, The hotel only opened recently, so we apology for the maintenance problems. We really appreciate you had time to comment. We are working hard on improving the products and services, since we hope to offer a high quality stay. We are glad you had such a good opinion about our staff and that you liked the rooms. Thank you for staying in our AluaSoul Alcudia Bay. We are very happy to hear you had such a great holidays. We hope all our guest can enjoy themselves as much as you did. We hope you come back to Alcudia again and have an even more amazing holidays!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Deeply disappointed
review: I'm going to list the bad first. Tiles in lobby cracked. Sink blocked. Paint over everything. Dining room like a bad Ikea canteen. Nobody asked  if we want drinks, we just gave up.  Food the cheapest they could do. Gave up with it and just ate outside. I've had better in a Romanian 2 star! It's beyond awful. I have to admit breakfast wasn't quite as awful but ain't great.  Cleaner threw out out some of our stuff. Thomson sold us that this was a Platinum Hotel with "elegant hotels, enviable service, relaxing and luxurious, a variety of explanations cruising" We will see them when we get home. We have spoken to various folk here on Thomson and all feel we have been duped.  Shower leaks water over the whole bathroom roof. Cleaner didn't give us 2 towels or replace the shampoo etc.…

title: Let down and miss sold by thomson
review: This hotel at most 2 or 3 star. The food was poor and basic in the restaurant, we were half board and only managed to get a drink with our meal 3 nights out of 7, no one was interested, staff in restaurant not very pleasant or attentive. The pool bar staff more pleasant!! but had burger and chips one day ,the burger was awfull,didnt taste right and couldn't get knife through it, we had our money refunded when we complained. One day we were lying on our sunbeds and they decided to trim some trees around us (really!!! when you are on holiday!!!) we were covered in dirt and had to move. The comfy sunbeds that were advertised!! were non existent. The rooms ok décor wise ,but the floor hadn't been cleaned properly dust and hairs were left which were still there the day we left,…

title: Thompson let us down
review: Hello arnmo, Sorry you had this experience. We are working hard on improving all the elements of our guests’ stay, taking into account all the feedback you are providing so we can change for the better. That's why we will make sure that the issues you mentioned are taken care of. We hope that at least you enjoyed your time in Majorca, since it's a beautiful island. Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Great holiday!
review: On arrival, midnight. Hotel like a ghost town. Hotel minimalist, needs little extras such as plants, flowers. Very clinical, thought I was walking into ikea. Rooms nice but no storage space for toiletries and clothing. Tea and coffee only available on arrival, but kettle provided ?. Rooms are clean along with the hotel.  Staff really work hard and are pleasant.  Slightly disappointed as a 4 star rating.

title: Thomson you let me down - completely miss sold
review: Hello Fagiej, Thank you for your comment. We are working hard on improving all the elements of our guests’ stay, taking into account all feedback; we will make sure that the issues you mentioned are taken care of. We hope that you enjoyed your stay at Alua and had a nice time in Majorca.  We will be looking forward to seeing you again at our hotel! Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: "Will not return!"
review: I decided to book this hotel even after reading the bad reviews on here. I didn't have any high expectations as I was looking for a relaxing holiday with my partner at an adults only hotel. I have noticed that most reviews on here are for people who went half board, etc, and I always go all inclusive which was within our budget. I knew that it was a newly refurbished hotel and many people complained about building works and noise etc. We arrived on 18/05 and had a warm welcome at reception. -we were told to pay a tourist tax, which I was not aware of but the receptionist said Thomson should have informed us, which of course they didn't! I wasn't happy about it at first as it cost 23 euros. However I learned that wifi was and use of the safe was free. We have had to pay for these…

title: Never again!
review: Arrived May 2017 to the newly refurbished 4 star hotel (basically everything painted white) to find out our room was not ready, finally went up to our room to find a nice large double room  with lovely rain shower and king size bed but the air conditioning was not working, no remote for tv, blood stain on bed sheet and disappointed not to get a kettle with tea and coffee (expected as this is was 4 star hotel!) Free wifi in hotel which is great - if only it worked sat by the pool! Carpet in corridor had paint on and fluff and bits everywhere, this didn't change any time during our weeks stay.  Went for our first evening meal, no one approached us for drinks order (we stayed half board) so we helped ourselves like everyone else, at the end of our 'meal' (food awful, not much…

title: Not as bad as we thought...
review: Hello Gluepen, We regret to hear that your stay was not as good as expected. We apologize for any unsatisfactory feelings that we may have caused. Thank you for your comments, we will make sure to pass them to our management team. As you said, the hotel only opened recently, so it is normal to have some teething issues, and we improve our service day by day.  Your feedback is important to us; we will take care of the issues you mentioned to offer a better service to our guests. Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: Alternative AluaSoul Hotel offered by Thomson
review: We stayed here for a week, prior to arriving we did read other reviews which did put us on edge on what we were to expect but when we did arrive it was not as bad as reported. Check in was smooth by Marcos and we went to our newly refurbished room. Yes the corridors did smell of newness but that did not ruin our holiday. The room was bright and we had a view of a side street, it was well maintained by the housekeeping staff. Breakfast was throughly enjoyable and there was plenty of choice, they catered for everyone. Dinner we only dined here a couple of nights even though we were on Dinner, bed and breakfast we just felt it lacked variety and the service was more catered for the guests on all inclusive. We ended up going down the Main Street where there is plenty of choice, and…

title: Fantastic apart from Thomson and 3 Chavs
review: Hello Cleater1984, Thank you for sharing your experience, we are sure your comments will be helpful for many people. We are delighted that you had a very enjoyable stay and wonderful holiday! We will continue working hard on improving the experience of our guests. We hope that when you come back to Alcudia, we will have the chance to give you another fantastic holiday! We will be looking forward to your return! Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: First Week Stay - Disappointed
review: Rooms excellent. Extremely large bed, good view of pool and local vista from Balcony. The Bathroom was let down by the shower cubicle which could not contain wash water which flooded the floor immediately adjacent to the cubicle. Parts of Hotel STILL not completed, with workmen carrying out work during our stay. Pool ares leaves a lot to be desired, with concrete slab flooring and NO Pool Bar (as advertised). In fact we could only find one bar in the entire hotel. Buffet food above average with lots of choice. Having originally booking the AluaSoul in Cala D'or, we were unsure what to expect in Alcudia, but the Old Town was wonderful and the Port d'Alcudia was good but Alcudia Bay was bereft of much atmosphere with limited amounts of Bars & Restaurants on offer. The "Strip" was…

title: First impression.
review: The hotel had only been open a few days after refurbishment, at first we thought we had arrived at Faulty Towers as we had problems with leaking sink pipes (2 seperate rooms) over the first few days but in fairness as soon as this was reported the maintenence team was there immediately and sorted this out, we had a superior room and asked for a kettle twice untill the 3rd attempt by the Thomson Rep got it sorted (it came with the room), after those first few days we realised that this will be a good hotel it is in a quiet area but just a few minutes from the main road where you can catch the main bus to other coastel areas and less than 10 minutes walk to the beach. It has a modern interior but just lacks a bit of colour ' too clinical, but this maybe still ongoing 'the…

title: Lovely
review: Hello Ani, Thank you for your comment, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Alua! We thank you for understanding - it is true that there were some teething problems during the first weeks after the opening, and we are doing our best to resolve the issues very quickly. We will pass your comments to our management team to continue improving the service.  We hope to see you again soon in Alcudia and at the hotel!  Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts

title: They are getting there.
review: I'd agree with the previous review, but having gone past many hotels with blaring music and organised activities I'd pick this hotel any day. It has a mellow atmosphere where we can chill and relax,the pool is ok lovely comfy sunbeds with plenty of umbrellas, I've used the sauna whirlpool and steam room all brand new and shiny. The double beds are huge and the most comfortable hotel bed I've slept in, the robe and slippers are a nice touch. It's not far from the beach there are plenty of shops bars and cafes close by.

title: DONT, JUST DONT
review: Hello Teresa, Thank you for taking time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear that your stay was wonderful and relaxing. We do hope for your return, we will be happy to welcome you again! Best regards, Alua Hotels & Resorts
